description: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN!From the writers of The Simpsons, comes the city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield! When Homer accidently causes a meltdown that wipes out Springfield, it’s up to you to clean up his mess… we mean, help him rebuild it!                                                                                                                                                                                           Collect Your Favorite Characters                                                                                                                  Help reunite Homer with his loved ones - Marge, Lisa, Maggie (and even sometimes Bart) – as well as his not so loved ones, like Ned Flanders. Re-populate Springfield with your favorite characters, from Barflies (Barney Gumble) to Wise Guys (Fat Tony). Add them all, we won’t judge! Dress your characters to the nines with options like Daredevil Bart or Lizard Queen Lisa, and relive scenes from your favorite episodes of The Simpsons!                                                                                                                                                                                                               Take Charge of Your SpringfieldCan’t control your own life? Now you can control the lives of the citizens of Springfield instead! Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at the Kwik-E-Mart, have Moe smuggle illegal animals, or make Homer toil poolside all day… that last one might not be so bad.Build Your Own SpringfieldThink Homer deserves to live next door to Moe’s? Or the monorail can survive a few more sharp twists and turns? Or Krustyland needs 40% more cartoon violence and 40% fewer health inspectors? Well you can finally make Springfield just the way you want it! Expand your town to the Waterfront, grow its businesses with the glamourous shops of Springfield Heights, and enjoy its sights, all with only a few taps.Experience Unique Simpsons StoriesCatch exclusive animated scenes and new hilarious stories from the writers of The Simpsons. You know they’re good because they write for The Simpsons! Tapped Out is the most life-ruiningly fun Simpsons game you can play! Always Something New for Your Favorite TownSpringfield might perpetually be on the verge of destruction, buy hey, at least it’s never boring. Whether it’s Halloween monster invasions, superheroes run amok, or chaos caused by one of Homer’s “great” ideas, you’ve got never-ending options to tap!**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 1.5GB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise it’s worth the wait).**User Agreement: terms.ea.comVisit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.Important Consumer Information.  This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.; Origin mobile services are included with this Application. See http://www.eamobile.com/origin and End User License Agreement for details; EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates; EA may retire online features and services after 30-days notice per e-mail (if available) and posted on www.ea.com/de/1/service-updates; Collects data though third party ad serving and analytics technology (See Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); Contains direct links to social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

recentChanges: Homer might’ve called it quits on rum-running (he loved the rum, not so much the running), but his life of crime is just getting started! Help Homer and your favorite Springfielders carry out international heists to fill your town with landmarks and treasures from the around the world! title: The Simpsons™:  Tapped Out

comments: Wow! Just WOW! I had been very skeptical about downloading this huge gigabyte and pay-to-win game, BUT after finally "trying it out to see" I am now hooked and now a believer of all of the hype! I have gotten pretty far so far and have a pretty decent crew and I have not had to pay a red cent at all. The grinding in this game is actually fun and I do not mind watching an ad or two for fuel. Simple concept, EXCELLENT execution!

Wow, I'm extremely impressed. The gameplay is very fluid (as it runs on a 60fps on my s9+) lagging and unrealism is unheard of. Also, the soundtrack throughout the games retains just as much excitement as you'll feel beginning the game, viewing car selecting and racing. A must have game for car/racing/gaming enthusiast's. Very additcting.

Ok, my game is back but I'm missing a lamborghini 700-4 that was decked out completely with fusion parts maxed out and stage 6 nitrous and tires. So, you owe me a what, 4 start or 5 star car decked as my car was you took from me. I bought crates with money real money for that car. So I want the closest thing to my car the same as it was. Thank u

I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!
description: CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGONSetting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!REAL-TIME RACING• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.CAR CUSTOMISATION• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE• Car upgrades are only the start. descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy
developerAddress:
6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN
recentChanges: Prepare yourselves for the latest, very exclusive cars that speed into CSR2 in this fresh update:
EXCLUSIVE LAMBORGHINI CARS:
In partnership with Lamborghini, CSR2 brings you a double world exclusive from the 2018 Geneva Motorshow! The Lamborghini Urus and the Huracán Performante Spyder.
ASTON MARTIN VANTAGE & LIBERTY WALK AUDI R8 V10:
CSR2 is thrilled to bring you the new sleek Aston Martin Vantage and the aggressively styled Liberty Walk Audi R8 V10.
summary: Race your way to the top of the leaderboards in your custom supercar with CSR2!
title: CSR Racing 2

comments: My first played MOBA. This is excellent game and there's nothing could beat this game. Otherwise, please make improvement like losing stars cause of that AFK player. Deducting credits may not the good way to discipline afk players. Its good if no one's lose or gain star either win or not. Make it the game not counted so players not waist time to pursue the game. I'll give 5 stars if 5 theres improvement. Thanks!

MOBA with analog is really a big joke. The graphics is trashy. Hero and skin are hard to unlock. There's a kind of in game power up that could be bought with real money. The only reason this game has so many player is the game size & device compatibility. If your phone is capable of playing "the famous 3v3 moba", you'd better play that game

This game is so cool. Only noob will say it hard to play or hard getting hero/skin. Maintain the gameplay and everything will be alright. Sometimes we win and sometime we won't. Only the graphics need to be improve. Come on! It's 2018 already! Make a tournament cause i wanna join!!. (Give me free skin. I give u  5 stars bitchhhhhhhh)

Why don't you try real super hero characters that we know like from dc anime etc such as. Dragon ball naruto bleach justice league avengers try doing it new heroes are good but if there are some like worldwide famous heroes also then it would sound much more  interesting

I love this game, I've been playing this for over a year and I still play it daily! All the skins and heroes skills are amazing. But please don't  let me team up with low level players it's affecting my game and stats when I'm trying my best to carry they would just afk which can be frustrating. But overall it's a good game

I hv been playing this game for two years alll good perfect game perfect graphics..bt there should be some changes for the afk players... strict steps should be taken towards for these afk players not bye lowering credit score by banning from game for a period of time so that they won't be spoiling game any further
description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!Your phone thirsts for battle!Features: 1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.6. Smart Offline AI Assistance In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.Contact Us You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
descriptionHTML:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features:

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

summary: Enjoy the Classic MOBA on Your Mobile. Challenge Top Players All Over the World!
title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

To be fair, guess you would pick it up sooner or later ; (

Great game love it, but now we're getting a merge, FWI 4399game don't make all the players go back to level one Plz! No one wants to start over because of merging players! It's not appropriate, and why, again Why do we have to start over! PLZ CHANGE YOUR MIND PLZ! 😢

So far so good. An easy game to play while doing other things like watching shows/homework/ect. Lot of people complain about the auto-play. But you can turn it off if you want. I actually like the auto feature. To each his own

comments: This is a great game for any Bleach fan   Don't listen to the people who say developers don't care and only want money... this game was originally Japanese and they are transferring it over to English and this takes time.. this game is great the characters look great the game play is very good and even... lvl system is easy n fun and you get what u put into the game. Yes some characters are harder to get then others but that's what makes the game fun and worth playing.. yes the game has a VIP system for those that want to spend money to get better things or characters but that doesn't mean you have to do it to enjoy the game...

I used to love this game but after two app reset wipes, I'm over it sorry going to brave souls who's with me?! Update: after reaching out to the admins on I was able to recover my data from my Google account. The data can not be transferred from ios to Android but that's fine. Thank you admins, sorry for the salt.

Even though the descriptions and dialogues in the game are bit off it doesn't completely take away from the experience of the game. It still does have some bugs, like the dialogues for instance, but the game is really addictive. It's one of very few games that I've been playing religiously for the past few months, probably longer. That's the one of the main reasons why I'm giving 5 *'s. The game has an ENORMOUS amount of potential, I think if the devs got licensing rights then it would improve the game so much more. One thing I really do not like about the game is that it is kind of a pay-to-win game. You have to spend real money to advance quicker or become stronger in the game faster. Other than the cons, it really is a fun and addictive game. If you love anime, if you love fan service, if you love action games, if you just love Bleach in general then you will definitely love this game.

Not very good it fell short of the other apps...it still missing half the content of the others while making it impossible without paying to collect keys.. shard collecting is lacking ...unless you want to pay for anything halfway decernt gameplay you won't find it here

Been playing for the past month. I've had zero issues that I can think of that I've read others having. It's a fun and addicting game. I can't wait for all of the other characters to be added in, only thing I dislike is wanting to play them but they aren't in it. Though I understand why. Great game would certainly recommend.

Only installing because i spent hundreds in the last one. Devs only care about your money, don't fix or take forever to fix issues, and the game is basically pay to win. Yiu can still get decently for free, but don't expect to get to the top that way. Take the 1 star reviews seriously... A lot of ppl stopped playing because of this games BS...

comments: Warning! Once you start playing Angry Birds Match you'll never want to stop! I love this game. I have been looking for a game that isn't so easy I get bored or too hard I get angry! This game is perfect! The only thing I would like is could you possibly offer other ways to get more lives? Like watch a video to fill up ( like angry birds pop) or spin the wheel? I just hate waiting soooo long when I run out of lives, because I want to keep playing!!!!

I've enjoyed this game, but I haven't been able to open it for several days. I hate to uninstall and lose all my progress. Any help would be appreciated. Ok, so after about a month of not loading it started working...for a month now it's down again. I upgraded today, 2/19, and still won't open, grrrr! Help!! Changed my 5 stars to 1! The game constantly freezes, closes and then won't reload. I've reinstalled 4 times and that's it I'm done. Really disappointing as when it runs it's so much fun.
For some reason right in the middle of playing it has been quitting and then I lose that life. Very frustrating. Is there and update available?

I love this game but for like 3 months since i updated I can't play and I just updated again and still the same doesn't let the game download it frozes, can you please fix that, or let me know what i can do, I dont want to uninstall it so I don't loose my progress.  Starting to get aggravated.  Thank you.

I like this game a lot and would give higher reviews but a lot of times if I am playing a level and have one move left it ends the level and I never get to make the move. It's some kind of glitch in the game. I think it's trying to get me to buy gems and coins. Very frustrating and annoying.
It seems to me that the objects to move are too small, it is always moving wrong way that I am trying to move. You should be able to select move by tapping, then swipe.
description: Match the toys, stars, stuff and things to collect everything those cute baby birds from the Angry Birds Movie ask for! Because who can say no to a face like that?The pigs are trying their hardest to ruin the Hatchlings’ party, but nothing can stop these little guys! Of course not without some help from the big birds. Red, Chuck, and Bomb are there to help the Hatchlings whenever they get into trouble... which is pretty often. It’s going to take a lot of matching, a wide variety of outfits, and heaps of help from you too, but we just might be able to get this party started! FEATURES:– Meet over 50 delightfully darling Hatchlings!– Find the Hatchlings to earn valuable gifts!– Visit the Hatchlings to try out new outfits, or just say hello!– Simple, fun, and casual match three gameplay!– Match 4 or more items and bring out the Angry Birds!– Over 1000 fun and challenging levels, and more to come!– Different challenging puzzles await – pop pigs, collect delicious treats, and more!– Use cool Boosters to best even the trickiest of levels.– Connect to Facebook to synchronize your progress!– Play offline!– Warning: Critical levels of cuteness.-----------------------------Need some help? comments: Game is amazing Love it. Customer service well you have none. All you get is automated message and no way to speak to someone about any issues. You give them what they need and no one fallows up on it. All you get back is the same automated response. Then they remove your ticket. So if you have problems with the game don't bother contacting them it's a waist of your time. THERE'S NO ONE THERE FOR YOU. Can't get my account back. That's all I want. It's simple NO???????

Another month, another violent smash and cash grab. Putting an entire LT behind a character requirement that 99.9% of the player base has next to no chance of getting with obfuscated "odds" that require one to spend 1000s of dollars for a "chance"(not even guaranteed) to get a character. At this point, I'm only updating the game to keep my reviews more relevant and higher weight.

It's a good game. Awesome graphics, great gameplay,amazing superstar etc. But not good for free player because you don't get good superstar and rate of getting better superstar is very very low. Even some time in 4 pulls. I didn't get any 2 star silver card. Please make rare superstar drop rate more or I can't go any further in this game and make this game more free player friendly.

Basically I have been playing this game over the past year... It is a totally addictive and 100% entertaining game... Only downside which has forced me to stop playing is that I have just acquired a new phone and attempted to load the game with my login details (for both Facebook & Google) but have found that I now have to start from the beginning again... I've now become mildly disappointed unless this can be fixed I don't think I will be playing again as I put too much time into this for me to start from the beginning again!!!

It is my favrt game ever when i play this i stuck with this game I want to say something  now it's giving  too many ads and a problem  when I log out it says only one thing again and again that this account using on another device  but it's not real and what I do I am help less and I can't get new powerful superstars 😭😭😭😭😭when I open with cash he always give me duplicates.. Give some new cool events like wrestlemaina T-shirts..

Love playing this game until google services crashed my phone and when I came back on to the game after having to reset everything, I lost access to my account. I have contacted customer services and all they do is send a pregenerated message that answers and resolves nothing!!  5 days and still receiving the same message back.. Even my faction leader has provided information to determine that my account is indeed my account and that I am active in his faction. But still SCOPELY send the same annoying generated message. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICES EVER!!!
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers Spring into action with this special 50% value-added WWE Champions Acrobat pack to upgrade all of your favorite Acrobat Superstars.  Use your Acrobats in the King of Wrestlemania event starting March 23.  Your WWE dream rivalries are happening live in WWE Champions, the free action puzzle RPG game that pits the WWE’s greatest Superstars of all time and today against each other in the ultimate quest for stardom. Collect WWE Superstars from Raw and Smackdown Live alongside your favorite Legends, fighting your way through generations of the greatest WWE Superstars and all out mayhem.Send your team into a WWE ring to test your fighting skills. Win, and your WWE champions will live on as immortals. Lose, and face defeat at your opponent’s hands. Team up with other WWE fans to battle for reputation, power and bragging rights in WWE Champions! #LetsSettleThis==WWE CHAMPIONS FEATURES==WWE Role Playing Game• Use RPG skills to earn XP by fighting in the ring and upgrading your WWE champions to increase their power and customize epic fighting RPG moves.• Fighting RPG gameplay lets you combine a variety of skills and upgrades to create a completely unique team to defeat your opponents.MATCH 3 Game with Signature WWE Moves• Match 3 pieces and obliterate rivals with signature WWE moves like John Cena’s Attitude Adjustment and The Rock’s legendary Rock Bottom.WWE Champions and Events• WWE Champions is always evolving, so join the WWE Universe in weekly bouts and fighting games.• Re-create upcoming WWE Monday Night RAW and Smackdown battles, enter monthly title events and recruit up-and-coming WWE Superstars. COLLECT Iconic WWE Superstars• Collect tons of WWE Superstars and assemble your dream roster of champions from the 80s, 90s and today.• Collect WWE favorites like The Rock, Undertaker, Macho Man Randy Savage, John Cena, Triple H, Big Show, Andre The Giant and more. BATTLE in 1-on-1 or Tag Team Online Games• Match 3 puzzle pieces to attack, build up energy and even pin your enemies using signature WWE moves.• Battle skillfully to unleash devastation on your rivals in epic battles that you can finish in less than five minutes.• Online team-ups with friends -  tag team against rivals or battle against your friends for ultimate bragging rights.CREATE the Ultimate Alliance• Form a super team with your friends to take over the WWE Universe!• Heal each other's injured Superstars and give gifts to your teammates as you fight for dominance in and out of the ring!STRATEGIZE with your alliance members in the Faction Headquarters• Players can coordinate to complete exclusive Expedition missions for rewards, earn faction lockboxes in the Head Office, and earn Faction coins that can be redeemed for valuable items in the Swag Store.WWE Champions is the ultimate puzzle RPG to feature all of your favorite WWE heroes. Enter the brutal world of the WWE, play puzzle games to defeat your rivals and collect new WWE Superstars to build the ultimate team. Download for free and start battling today!
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers
Spring into action with this special 50% value-added WWE Champions Acrobat pack to upgrade all of your favorite Acrobat Superstars. Use your Acrobats in the King of Wrestlemania event starting March 23.

Your WWE dream rivalries are happening live in WWE Champions, the free action puzzle RPG game that pits the WWE’s greatest Superstars of all time and today against each other in the ultimate quest for stardom. Collect WWE Superstars from Raw and Smackdown Live alongside your favorite Legends, fighting your way through generations of the greatest WWE Superstars and all out mayhem.

Send your team into a WWE ring to test your fighting skills. Win, and your WWE champions will live on as immortals. Lose, and face defeat at your opponent’s hands. Team up with other WWE fans to battle for reputation, power and bragging rights in WWE Champions! #LetsSettleThis

==WWE CHAMPIONS FEATURES==

WWE Role Playing Game
• Use RPG skills to earn XP by fighting in the ring and upgrading your WWE champions to increase their power and customize epic fighting RPG moves.
• Fighting RPG gameplay lets you combine a variety of skills and upgrades to create a completely unique team to defeat your opponents.

MATCH 3 Game with Signature WWE Moves
• Match 3 pieces and obliterate rivals with signature WWE moves like John Cena’s Attitude Adjustment and The Rock’s legendary Rock Bottom.

WWE Champions and Events
• WWE Champions is always evolving, so join the WWE Universe in weekly bouts and fighting games.
• Re-create upcoming WWE Monday Night RAW and Smackdown battles, enter monthly title events and recruit up-and-coming WWE Superstars.

COLLECT Iconic WWE Superstars
• Collect tons of WWE Superstars and assemble your dream roster of champions from the 80s, 90s and today.
• Collect WWE favorites like The Rock, Undertaker, Macho Man Randy Savage, John Cena, Triple H, Big Show, Andre The Giant and more.

BATTLE in 1-on-1 or Tag Team Online Games
• Match 3 puzzle pieces to attack, build up energy and even pin your enemies using signature WWE moves.
• Battle skillfully to unleash devastation on your rivals in epic battles that you can finish in less than five minutes.
• Online team-ups with friends - tag team against rivals or battle against your friends for ultimate bragging rights.

CREATE the Ultimate Alliance
• Form a super team with your friends to take over the WWE Universe!
• Heal each other's injured Superstars and give gifts to your teammates as you fight for dominance in and out of the ring!

STRATEGIZE with your alliance members in the Faction Headquarters
• Players can coordinate to complete exclusive Expedition missions for rewards, earn faction lockboxes in the Head Office, and earn Faction coins that can be redeemed for valuable items in the Swag Store.


WWE Champions is the ultimate puzzle RPG to feature all of your favorite WWE heroes. Enter the brutal world of the WWE, play puzzle games to defeat your rivals and collect new WWE Superstars to build the ultimate team. Download for free and start battling today!

comments: After the latest update, I've only gotten one set of daily quests which populated right after the update. After that, I haven't received any additional daily quest where I can win some gems. Why is that? Now the only way for me to earn more gems os through the free gems  (by watching adds), getting a high enough ranking in battlez, or buying them.

I think the new update is nice battlez is awesome and the good news is that my phone doesnt crashes anymore and when I played Inzanity it did'nt lag great rework but 1 question, WHY DID YOU REMOVE ULTIMATE BATTLE AND DEMONSTRATION MINI GAME THEMES TO EVERY WORLD?? Im sick of every level with just only themes

I think the new update is very cool. It adds some multiplayer into the game. When I heard of this new update I rushed to my phone and started playing. It turned out to be good I was happy and thought it would turn out well. Then after that I remembered pvz one. It's multiplayer mode was much better. One player would be plants and the other zombies. Why could they not have made that. It was such a good idea. I would personally play that mode more than this. But it's just my opinion. Thanks for reading.

I HATE YOUR UPDATE. Battlez mixed battle between players who bought plants with money with the players who don't is totally unfair. There are many players out there like me who play everyday collecting coins by coins and gems by gems patiently waiting for a good plant offer that we can buy with gems. Buying plants with money is not on the budget. I'm not angry. I'm sad. Because PVZ is always one of my top listed games. Now it's pathetic. Crashed. Unfair. Expensive.

Just like.But EA just want money right? You just wasting money.Money cause something bad.This wirld need to follow the truth path.Not money path.I dont like those plant,pinatas and more that need to buy with money.Useless.

Since last update it is very unstable and keeps crashing. Also every time i finish the last inzanity it crashes then once reloaded says expired so ive lost out. In fact im not that interested anymore. Im not a fan of battlez and it all seems geared to that now so had fun while it lasted.
description: Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain. 100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads. Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game InformerWinner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – MashableWinner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to PlayDISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIESCollect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens! GROW POWERFUL PLANTS  Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world! EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOGStumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.
descriptionHTML:
Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain.

100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads.

Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game Informer
Winner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – Mashable
Winner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to Play

DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIES
Collect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens!

GROW POWERFUL PLANTS
Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!

JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME
Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world!

EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOG
Stumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.

Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Battlez is here! Get ready for brand-new ways to play in our biggest update since launch. Now you can:
· Compete against other players to climb the leaderboard
· Battle relentless waves of zombies to get high scores
· Earn coins, piñatas, gauntlets, and other astounding league rewards
· Put your leveled-up Power Plants and zombie-bashing skills to the ultimate test
· Play all-new Daily Activities in the Travel Log
Thanks for playing!
summary: Defeat zombies throughout the ages in this fun, action-strategy adventure.
title: Plants vs. Zombies 2

comments: One of the best game i've played, so many reward systems, good control and great graphics. Keep up the gpod work, hope to see more new hero. One last thing, the co-op mode has some bug where u created the room but unable to start the game even when u have enough player. Please fix that, thank you.

I think it's a good game. Suck that you have to pay money to go up against other people that already have SS Hero's. Just wanted to say y'all should make at least more S hero's that are FTP so y'all can get people to get back into the game I don't want this game to die off.

The game is really addictive. Hours of game play and activities. I really like it. However, since it's international the time for coop game should be more flexible so i can join with my friends at suitable time. Tournament matching is a little bit unbalanced, either it's a raid or it's a total defeat. And heroes skills should  give more details on stats, so we can plan effectively. Thank you for such a good game.

They are about to make it more of a money trap with an update that screws f2p and budgeted p2w. They say they have free events and events so part time p2w have fun. Then why are people talking about quitting? These are high paying players. I know you plan on making it so hero's bought for special skills like stun and silence won't work if there's a big gap. You've made it so hero's bought for the purpose of moving these budgeted p2w are useless. So it's in favor of real p2w. It should be a reverse. Make the lower people have a better chance not a worse one.

I found an issue, when I defeat the boss by bleed damage, the victory screen doesn't show up. It just stuck at the boss level with its dead body lying on the ground. I hope you fix this. Great game by the way.

Heroes Night Watch unique skill is not working. It stated any enemies that hit the magic barrier will be stopped immediately but when I use it in arena enemies pass the barrier like nothing. It had been a month and nobody seems bother about this.
description: TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!ALSO FEATURES•Simple Control, Super Fun:Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection: Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your StrengthPlay Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroesOur service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com• Device Permissions:[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

• Device Permissions:
[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
developerAddress: Room 18S, 27/F Ho King Commercial Centre, 2-16 Fa Yuen Street, Kowloon, HK.
recentChanges: Network frameworks reworked that may improve performances in various multiplayer game modes.
Fixing solutions for many of the known issues related to Arena, Guild Wars, and Friends/Chat channels.
New Festival events, heroes, and promos.
summary: Hyper Heroes is a fast-paced Action RPG mixed with unique pinball-like gameplay.
title: Hyper Heroes: Marble-Like RPG

comments: Good app but few glitches. One day I was playing against computer. It made a miraculous move of eating my pawn at a place where none of my pawn ever existed. Awesome. :P Net connectivity is as good that when other apps show good connection under high speed wifi, ot shows no connectivity. Lol

Freakking great. Best chess app EVER!!!!. I have the free one and it can teach you tactics, help you in situations and if you dont want that no need to do it. You can even costumize your wallpaper or theme. Skill ratings 100-2600 playing real people. Or you can play a computer, 400-1200 or 1400 i think. Great app, get it you wont regret it.

I think this app is horrible simply.. I'm a diamond member, but I don't think i will be for much longer. There's other chess sites that don't disconnect and lag so much. Main dislikes is the constant disconnection, no order at all in the videos section. Tactics, lessons and drills bugs and crashes when turning the mobile or screen goes off. Specially drills bugs and just repeats the same one over and over when you finished instead of going to the next one. Also, app was unhappy I was logged in on my turned off computer.. come on..

I cannot respond to chats. The support team promises they will fix the issue, but it's only lies so that I can give the app a decent rating. Now my custom board, pieces, and background settings get reset every 2 days. Frustrating app.

The last update sucks! Premove is not at all intuitive. It now just shows the block which we want to move the pawn and doesn't move the pawn itself like before. The toast message that showed 'challenge rejected' was better than the current one. Dislike it!!
I have no connection issues but some times game discontinues with showing no n/w.pls solve otherwise good game Finally uninstalled... Worst team.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

description: From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

• Easily sync the game between devices when connected  to the Internet

comments: This game is amazing a full on batlle with strategic ways to beat your opponent. The only thing im concern with is not seeing much to do in an alliance than donating troops. I would like to see a way were you can team battle and get awards but other than that its a five star game

This game is amazing! But enemy units keep getting stuck behind walls Also there are a few enemy lands that are not responding when you tap on them. This didnt happen before.  I think updating attack list would be good. So you could see who you have attacked, not just who attck you. Just  a thought

It's a great game but I think it be better if you created workers and mined,  lumbered, and gather favors or technology like warcraft use to be like.  The commands are also touchy and the battle displays for viewing if kinda difficult to  keep up with. But it's fun and a little bit addictive.

Amazing graphic but really poor gameplay... Even lowest level, it's hard to complete easy campaign. Every win need to paid. Useless to raid... Uninteresting how the mission needed to complete... Disliked this game bcoz of the poor gameplay and the way of how to complete the mission.

Awesome graphics. Awesome concept. You actually choose your tactic. Not just...."I'm going to send a march at a castle and hope for the best" like so many other games do now. In my opinion, its a very nice single player game. Only things that would make it more intriguing would be the addition of defensive towers or being able to attack at same time with an ally. Other than that, great game. And you don't NEED to spend money!

Ive been playing this game a very long time now. definitly a 5 star game in every aspect. only issue is.. i spend money on this last event.. 3 raids left to get 14k reward for the 4 star poison ranger.. the bloody game hang again..manage to log back only when the event was over..!!! Now i have this 2 useless relics taunting me.. Almost felt like deleting the game..

descriptionHTML:
A top 10 strategy game all around the world!
4.5 stars! A top-rated game!

Are you ready to step into the pit and punch someone? Your favorite Clash of Lords 2 Heroes are fighting in a free-for-all frenzy against a force of frightening fiends! Control the action and become the greatest warlord in all the land. To survive you’ll need wit, will, and we couldn't think of a word for strength but you get the picture. It's time to Clash!

Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

Game Features:
✔ You control the action! Activate Heroes’ skills in real time!
✔ Pair Heroes and Troops with our unique Mercenary system!
✔ Play it Your Way! With over 10 PvE and PvP modes, there's always something fun and different to do!
✔ Fight alongside your friends! Join a Guild, and clash with players from all over the world! You can even battle against players from different countries!
✔ Free to Play! Log in every day to win free Heroes and Jewels!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2

This is definitely a fun bingo app. Where it's lacking or otherwise could be improved, comparatively to ther Bingo games, is the daily spin wheel & daily sign in bonus. Daily 24hr sign in should provide a much larger number of free tickets & include daily free power ups. Earning one or two power ups w a single spin of the wheel is anticlimactic! Power ups are a vital way to  daily tournament advancement, bingo wins & simy make playing more fun. Completing a pizzule is impossible without power-ups or making a purchase. However, a big win for this app. is the ability to sign in each new day to a new tournament which helps level the playing field. Special tournaments and/or the add' side bonuses, like the "turkey daub" made playing & making a purchase worth wild!

Good, keeps me coming back for more. The only thing I don't like is there is no way of getting that many puzzle pieces in the time. Could you maybe let us play till we get the Puzzle Complete to get the rewards.

I am addicted to this game. I think you should get more power ups instead of ticket's. Cause you run out of power up's. I feel you should get bingo power up's instead of ticket's. On the bonus spin they should add bingo power up's of 4. I need more bingo power up's. And would like to get power up's for daubing every number called each game. I need more power Up's. And the game should give you tickets when you get every number that is called correctly on each card every game that you play.

The new additions of the outlaws was great, but then you added all these "special" days that serve no purpose but to make people spend money. I have spent plenty already but not for every game. Sorry guys, bad move. Too greedy.

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.
description: The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! Become an admiral of invincible navy fleets in the best 3D interactive strategy game of naval warfare. Build your naval base and lead your powerful fleet into countless epic sea battles. Grow stronger by forging alliances with friends and build an empire together. description: Battle enemy pirates and join a pirate alliance to dominate the ocean. Dive into epic quests with your favorite pirates and relive their tales in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War.In this real-time strategy game, you’re the captain of your own pirate haven. descriptionHTML:
Battle enemy pirates and join a pirate alliance to dominate the ocean. Dive into epic quests with your favorite pirates and relive their tales in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War.

In this real-time strategy game, you’re the captain of your own pirate haven. Build your pirate base and recruit notorious marauders to join your mighty corsairs. Battle supernatural creatures and fearsome pirates to dominate the ocean!!

Relive the classic stories from Pirates of the Caribbean and battle alongside some of your favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner and many more. Join them in epic quests on the high tides in the story mode.

Become the most cunning and fearless pirate that ever lived in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War!

Game Features:

THE OCEAN IS YOURS TO RULE
✔ Start your adventure in the most original pirate war game!
✔ Become a legendary pirate captain and choose your own portrait.
✔ Obtain equipment to customize and strengthen your captain.

BUILD YOUR PIRATE BASE
✔ Build a powerful fleet and recruit fearless pirates for the battles to come.
✔ Build and defend your base from incoming enemy pirates looking to loot your resources.

PREPARE FOR A PIRATE BATTLE ROYALE
✔ Plunder your enemies to become the one and only PIRATE CAPTAIN of the Caribbean.
✔ Plan out assaults against millions of other pirates from all around the world.
✔ Dominate the ocean by creating or joining a pirate alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.
✔ Battle against supernatural creatures and other sea rovers on the open seas.

RELIVE THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW
✔ Immerse yourself into the story mode.
✔ Dive into EPIC QUESTS featuring Pirates of the Caribbean movie plots and characters.
✔ Partake in the great tales of favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, Captain Barbossa and more!

Download now to start your Pirates of the Caribbean adventure!

Customer Support: https://tidesofwar.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: http://policy.joycity.com/en

◆Access Authorizations in JOYCITY Games
1. Access to Make and Manage Phone Calls (READ_PHONE_STATE)
(When the game starts) It is essential to be able to identify the device for Guest Login (immediate start). Access to [Make and Manage Phone Calls] includes information to identify the device, and you will be unable to login to the game if you deny the access request.

2. Access to Photos, Media, and Files (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
(When game updating) We need your permission to save the update files onto your device's SD card. [Pictures, Media, File Access] includes the authority to access SD card. If you refuse the request, you will be unable to login.

* Phrases used in [ ] may differ based on the device and OS version

comments: It's pay to win for sure. However, if you play daily and stick to monthly and quarterly cards you'll rack up gems and heroes quickly. It took me over a year to get my VIP high enough to get the monthly meta heroes. I get an hour or two a day out of it and even when I didn't have the monthly paid heroes I had a fun time. I don't mind spending $15/month for the amount of time the game helps me kill.

I'm a paying customer, which they call "VIP" but you best believe you are far from important. I had an issue with a purchase in December, but support takes a week per message to reply and isn't useful at all about the issue and tells you they can't help. Should have let Google refund the money before the 48 hours instead of giving their support a chance.

Don't download the game . If u want to win u must spend thousands dollars. A huge skins with control every month 2 new heroes with amazing power. Every month making new heroes and the old ones getting trash. Random game no strategy. Just click for pic. Ucool don't do anything. Don't download!!! I played more than one year and every month it's getting worst. The forgetting about players. They think only for cash. Ucool one of the worst organisation..if u don't spend a money please don't start the game .nice pictures  and that it )))

This game was a very well balanced game between free play gamers and those that put money into it. Not anymore. If you want to be competitive you must put handreds of dollars each month (no joke). Very dissapointed in the way this game has become.

A very good game but a pay to win. I myself paid 73$ and I am VIP 8. This game can be fun without paying but to get the most out of it atleast  buy an annual card for 30$. If you have even more to throw away try buying all the cards when they run out get a new one. (Mainly Annual and Season Card. Week card isn't a must have). Also if you are new to the game wait for a new server to start. That way you wont fall behind. I am on server 210 and have also played on server 207. I was in this game when it was brand new and purple heroes were the best. I was in 1 of the 1st servers and f2P I quit the game at lvl 50 though. All in All if you want to play this game prepare 100$

The menu is very unresponsive when scrolling. Also, when killing enemies, particularly after using a special ability, the enemy simply freezes and then fades away - there's no animation for the death of the enemy and this is disappointing and detracts from the immersion. Otherwise it's a good game, but significantly more heroes would be necessary to keep me interested.
description: Join with your friends in the best and latest action RPG multiplayer online battle arena, HEROES CHARGE! Collect and train your heroes, gather your teammates, strengthen your heroes and wipe out the enemy in thrilling, addictive and fast-paced games. Over one hundred quests for you to partake in the story that YOU tell. Which heroes will you choose? = AN EXCEPTIONALLY RICH AND ADDICTIVE GAME = - Choose between over 50 unique and varied Heroes, from melee bruisers, agile archers and powerful mages - Fight and explore through the world of Kron, find rare heroes and see if you have what it takes to persuade them to join you! - Develop and upgrade your skills while collecting equipment sets that infuse your heroes with power over your foes! - An immersive experience with friends or go solo on your own in numerous battles - Blend cooperation with your friends as you battle against competing guilds for elite prizes - Develop team play and strategies to rule the world of Kron - Build or join a guild of friends - Fight through the PVP Arena for awards fame! - Collect and develop rare heroes! - Fight against a horde of enemies in challenging special events! NOTICE: Heroes Charge is a completely free-to-play game, however there are some game items that can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. Also under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Heroes Charge.

comments: If you don't mind a game with terrible customer service, and you enjoy games where you have to spend 1000s of £ to get anywhere this is a great game.. Expect shields to drop hours before they should and expect it to always be you, the players fault. Never the games

comments: Good time waster. I bought it just to get rid of the ads. I have a shop now and the game is more fun. Update : they updated the game, but STILL didn't add any new levels! Come on, Devs. Update- new levels finally, but don't know what they are- not enough money to see them!

It's okay, should have more items in the storage bays, it's supposed to be just like a regular storage unit and it's not even close to that. And I believe the other buyers could say different things instead of the same phrases over and over. Maybe y'all can make it a little more realistic.

Fun until you get to Miami.. absolutely impossible to make 100 000.00 to unlock the next level.  Computer outbids or up bids you so that you either give up or lose your money.  No daily incentives to keep brining you back.  Unless you are willing to spend real money for boosters and money to move on.. play to Miami and then delete.. impossible to move forward after that.

The game was addictive and fun until you get to Miami. 100k to unlock that level is absurd and unrealistic. Its to hard to make that kind of money playing and now its just playing the same level over and over trying to get enough. Now its boring!! I'm disappointed, I really enjoyed playing until that point.

Was a great game until I got to Miami level 19 now just bloody stupid & waste of time. I went to 4 straight auctions couldn't buy a unit because competitors bid more than what the units worth how are you suppose to level up & move on when the designers of the game make stupid unrealistic flaws in the game no bidder is going to bid in real life on items they can't see or know are there so why put this into the game? Fix this issue & I will adjust my review accordingly!
Good game. I like the game however  this is the 4th time it has asked me to do a review. I have done this all 4 times with no reward and it still keeps asking me to do  it. Very frustrating
description: The greatest risks always lead to the biggest payoffs, but only to the select few bold enough to take them! Venture into the high-stakes world of storage auctions, run your own pawn shop and build your reputation as the smartest and quickest bidder on the scene!  HIGHLIGHTS - OUTBID your opponents in thrilling storage auctions! Time is money, so you only have a few moments to make your decision: use your intuition and be quick! -COLLECT hundreds of items from diverse sets: you can get everything from old basketballs to rare antiques and even alien artifacts! -PROFIT lots from your lucky choices and get invited to the most exclusive auctions in many different cities! -BECOME the richest bidder and challenge legendary gamblers to show them no one can best you in an auction! You never know what precious antiques or incredible treasures might be hidden behind those storage doors. Every single one of them is a chance to earn tons of cash and make a name for yourself as a top profit maker! Can you take the risk and become the biggest winner? Going once, going twice....Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description:
Google Play’s Halloween Campaign - Spooky updates you can’t resist.
New gameplay, special events, special chest, you name it. 
Invasion is a war-themed MMO game that challenges you to conquer and battle your way to world domination in the midst of a global apocalypse.
    Features:
✔Battle enemies in nail-biting RTS combat to rule the apocalypse!
✔Build and customize your base!
✔Fight for every inch of land and expand your guild’s territory!
✔Upgrade warfare tactics and cutting-edge technology help you collect intel!

✔Battle online in alliances and crush each guild in your way
✔Alliance hub features live chat to find the perfect team!

Fight to become the most powerful military commander in the world as you march your way to victory! Do you have what it takes to survive in this world at war?

description: Your story begins here!Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?The choice is yours!The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!◆Campus Hacker◆Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.◆Untold Darkness◆Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.How does this incident affect your life?And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.- Work hand and win the journalist competition!◆Yearbook◆Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.Will you succeed in saving Daisy?Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!◆Hit the Floor!◆Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.- Work hard to sign the record deal!- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?◆Features◆- Add stories weekly.- Offer HQ graphic.- Divide up into genres.- Customize the look of a protagonist.- Change storylines depending on options.- Choose appearances depending on occasions.- Bookmark your favorite episode!Official Website: http://myshelfapp.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_SolmareInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/◆About Us◆NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!
descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!
