comments: I love this game! But, there's not enough energy or chances to win energy or earn it. 10 isnt enough!There's times when I'm out of energy and have done everything I can do and have to leave the game but still feel like playing. I've spent money on this game but I don't always have money to buy energy or coins to buy energy. There should be more give-a-ways, prizes, little games, etc to earn more energy so I can keep playing!! Also, I'd like to be able to friend request other players and send them things. Like people on my team on here.  Thank you! Lynn Mauger

Amazing! It is an amazing game that you go and figure out the death of somebody. You go through stages and different areas and you must find hidden objects. You get coins and bucks that you spend on things to make your world. Great time taker.

There are quite a few objects that are incorrectly identified. For example, there is a screen used for changing clothes behind, but it is what you need to find when asked for a "lamp."  The pace is not good. In gameplay, you collect coins used for buying decorations. You have to place decorations to advance the gameplay. But if you have no coins and are at an impasse in the gameplay because you need decorations, you're stuck unless you lay down real cash.  A lot of the problems the developer is aware of, because their next game like this, June's Journey, is much better.
For some reason the game is frozen and won't  go past  the wooga screen it is also doing it on  June's  Journey  please fix because I  really  like  to  play these games
I really like it. It's something different every time your finding new things same things different order etc lots of fun
Very addictive. Not enough hours in the day.
description: If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite! Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal. Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL* ● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENESAn epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems. ● BUILD YOUR PARADISE As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!~ Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name. As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits. --------------------------------------------------------------- Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelpBecome a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here: http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperilVisit us at http://wooga.com Like us on facebook.com/wooga Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.Terms of Use: http://www.wooga.com/legal/terms-of-use/Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

comments: Absolutely sublime! This game is so awesome it's exactly what I want in a dragon game! Although there are microtransactions, you can absolutely play this game without spending a cent to progress! I have never ever payed real money to purchase gold, food and all other resources and I've played this game for almost two years The two tips are a little bit of patience and to keep on breeding. Even if you've already bred a certain pair of dragons, selling unwanted eggs is the best and quickest way to make gold

Once you get to level 100, breeding a dragon is almost impossible to nil. Very frustrating. My roommate and I started this game the same time. I am level 115 and she is on 83. We will breed the same dragons at the same time, she will succeed 85% of the time on the first try, it will take me over 10 times if I even get it, this started after level 100. Good luck long term players.

The events are annoying. I have reached the max on collecting eggs. I just gather then from doing tasks. Does that mean I can't participate anymore and am just stuck. I don't understand. Why would you limit the gathering of items?

Have been playing this game for a couple of years now and I love it! Sometimes it's frustrating - especially when you'd need to buy something to be able to get all the prizes during events - but it just makes it more challenging.  VERY happy with the customer support. I had an issue with a gift not being added to my totals, so I emailed them and they fixed it without issue.

The game is definitely addicting. But when I went into the Egg-straordinary Egg hunt island and tapped on a activty, it said their was a wonky spell and it completely stopped the whole game. I've tried different things different times, and it still won't work. I have played this in the past and the same exact thing happened, but with something different.

This game is AWSOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOme. I had 1023 gems saved up and then it glitched and now I only have 34. I love this game so much! Please help me get my 984 gems back! I don't want to rate it lower than 5 stars, but this has happened twice now...😟

comments: At first I thought it was great, but now I realise it's just another PAY-TO-WIN game... You've got no chance if you come up against a paid-for character like Batman. It's such a shame this is the way game devs are heading these days.

*Update Very greedy company-> bad rating from me! They sell packages for 200-300 dollars! What's worse is that there are people who are stupid enough to pay for it. Aside from that a very cool game. To be at the very top it is pay to win. Besides that really cool. Lots of heroes and therefore possibilities.

It's a great game don't get me wrong but as I wrote in previous reviews they just went completely pay-to-win. Nowadays you cannot win not only because you don't have the latest gacha heroes, you just can't win because they released Batman for $160 to be competitive, most broken character ever. They are also releasing legendary pets... For $400 each. So yes, forget about having a fun competition, some players are simply out of you range by how much money they have spent and that ruins the experience.

My first review disappeared so I will leave another.  This game was great at first, then it started inserting the buyable characters such as Batman, Assassin's Creed and they are so over powered, one of them can take down your whole team without taking any damage.  Game is now so unbalanced that it isn't worth playing.  Until they fix the game, it worth playing.  Unless you like wasting money to feel like a god with over powered characters.  Game is dead, play something else.

definitely one of the best game if not the best game ived ever played on mobile. when you pull a hero for free the feeling is incomparable. the strategy you need to bring down other tougher players/guilds, its all here i tell ya! and to cap it all off the customer service is GREAT. you have concerns they reply ASAP what more could one ask for?!  install now! =)

Had the potential to be good but they care more about money than a good game, once you progress so far you will constantly lose to ppl who have bought characters that are vastly over powered. They will auto reply and say plenty of ppl still have fun without out paying, I made it to level 65 and it's just not true.
description: Welcome to a world of Holy Paladins, Deadly Dragons, Evil Wizards and over 50 other playable heroes! Conquer kingdoms lost to a mysterious curse, and find a new adventure around every corner. Create and lead your party of legendary Heroes into battle!Join the 80 million players already experiencing this unique Action-Strategic RPG!In partnership with Ubisoft, Lilith Games is proud to announce that the Prince from PRINCE OF PERSIA joins Ezio from ASSASSIN'S CREED as a playable hero in Soul Hunters. ［LEAD YOUR OWN EPIC PARTY］- Choose from over 50 Heroes, from Stone Collossus to Ice Dragon, Sun Goddess to Wolf Child.- Strategically build your party with Tanks, DPS and Support Heroes. Form Your Own MOBA Party!- Collect Soulstones scattered throughout the world to upgrade your Heroes into an unstoppable force. ［MASTER THE TACTICS, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY］Create the perfectly balanced party to overcome the most powerful foes and legions.Master your Heroes’ abilities to protect your allies, interrupt your opponents’ attacks, or deal massive damage.  ［LEGENDARY  BATTLES］ -Challenge  players from all over the world and become Master of the Arena.-Advance to the Epic Arena and earn the title of Elite Soul Hunter.-Create or Join a Guild,participate in raids, and earn exclusive rewards! Clash with other Guilds in the weekly Guild Wars! ［A UNIQUE IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE ］-A dark curse has been cast upon the kingdoms and it’s up to YOU to Unite the Heroes and Break the Curse!-Real-time combat with captivating visual effects and extremely deep strategic gameplay.-Explore mysterious and magical lands to find and collect new Heroes in a captivating campaign.FOLLOW US at:Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soulhuntersmobilegameTwitter @HuntersGlobalHomepage: http://www.soulhuntersgame.comInstagram #soulhuntersSUPPORTIf you encounter any difficulties or require support please contact Customer Service by tapping on your in-game Avatar and then Support.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a world of Holy Paladins, Deadly Dragons, Evil Wizards and over 50 other playable heroes! Conquer kingdoms lost to a mysterious curse, and find a new adventure around every corner. Create and lead your party of legendary Heroes into battle!
Join the 80 million players already experiencing this unique Action-Strategic RPG!

In partnership with Ubisoft, Lilith Games is proud to announce that the Prince from PRINCE OF PERSIA joins Ezio from ASSASSIN'S CREED as a playable hero in Soul Hunters.
 
［LEAD YOUR OWN EPIC PARTY］
- Choose from over 50 Heroes, from Stone Collossus to Ice Dragon, Sun Goddess to Wolf Child.
- Strategically build your party with Tanks, DPS and Support Heroes. Form Your Own MOBA Party!
- Collect Soulstones scattered throughout the world to upgrade your Heroes into an unstoppable force.
 
［MASTER THE TACTICS, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY］

Create the perfectly balanced party to overcome the most powerful foes and legions.
Master your Heroes’ abilities to protect your allies, interrupt your opponents’ attacks, or deal massive damage.
 
 
［LEGENDARY  BATTLES］
 
-Challenge players from all over the world and become Master of the Arena.
-Advance to the Epic Arena and earn the title of Elite Soul Hunter.
-Create or Join a Guild,participate in raids, and earn exclusive rewards! Clash with other Guilds in the weekly Guild Wars! 


［A UNIQUE IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE ］
-A dark curse has been cast upon the kingdoms and it’s up to YOU to Unite the Heroes and Break the Curse!
-Real-time combat with captivating visual effects and extremely deep strategic gameplay.
-Explore mysterious and magical lands to find and collect new Heroes in a captivating campaign.

FOLLOW US at:
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soulhuntersmobilegame
Twitter @HuntersGlobal
Homepage: http://www.soulhuntersgame.com
Instagram #soulhunters
SUPPORT
If you encounter any difficulties or require support please contact Customer Service by tapping on your in-game Avatar and then Support.

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.
Nice that this game is helpful to a point. Yes could be a little bit more forthcoming about items and there do's and don't on Upgrades and applications
Just getting started I guess

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

[Google pre-registration]

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants

- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

Not a great game. Played for half the day. Game will no longer start and tells me to make sure I'm connected to the net. Oh I'm really that dumb. World chat is more like a dating site and is not child friendly. The admins do nothing to stop the behaviour in world chat. I strongly advise you not to allow your kids anywhere near this game

If your hobby is watching paint dry this is the game for you. This game is entirely too time consuming for anyone with a real life. Which I guess is why no one is here for the game . Everyone playing is here to get credits in another game .  Which is why this game has so many downloads  not because it's actually good. The over-sexualized comments in the chat rooms are ridiculous. Parents if you are reading this I would not allow my child to play this game unless you are going to sit with them every moment. If you have to do that is it even really worth allowing your child to play the game.

Basically clash of clans looking ads, plays like just any other mmo. Another Mr steal your money if you wanna get good game. If you want something thats fun and never ever going to try to take your money, play clash. 5 years of playing it and ive only bought a 5$ thing bc gems just come so easily and im a lvl170 th10 . No need to spend money to get good

Ummmmm basicly Clash of Clans COPY CAT!!! The adds almost match precisely. If anything download Clash of Clans. I mean this is just insulting to clash of clans and how hard they worked to make clash of clans... lazy! I just downloaded the game to rate it... enjoy my one star review lazy jerks... rate this a one star and download clash of clans.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

description: A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTSPlay unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM  The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.“I’ve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!”— Magnus Carlsen“The Future of Chess!” — Rob, App Store Reviewer You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!FEATURES- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each. - Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike. - Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIPThe app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members. Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels. For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:- 1 month- 12 months- LifetimeTERMS OF PAYMENTPayment will be charged to your Google Play account after you’ve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active. It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. For more information:Terms of Use - http://www.playmagnus.com/termsPrivacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy www.playmagnus.com
descriptionHTML:
A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!


UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTS

Play unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.

Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.

Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.


FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM

The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.

“I’ve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!”
— Magnus Carlsen

“The Future of Chess!”
— Rob, App Store Reviewer

You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!


FEATURES

- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each.
- Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.
- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike.
- Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!


REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIP

The app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members.

Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels.

For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:
- 1 month
- 12 months
- Lifetime


TERMS OF PAYMENT

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account after you’ve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active.

It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

For more information:
Terms of Use - http://www.playmagnus.com/terms
Privacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy

www.playmagnus.com

description: Enkelt & Fengende OrdspillOrdmester tilbyr det klassiske gameplayet til et ordspill på en ny og morsom måte.  Du kan enkelt dra bokstaver for å sette sammen forskjellige ord. Det er enkelt å spille og gøy å mestre. Du vil helt sikkert bli hektet på ordsøk-moroa i dette ordspillet.Mer Enn 2.000 NivåerStart med enkle og dagligdagse ord. Vårt ordspill leverer tusenvis av ordutfordringer på forskjellige nivåer som du kan spille. Prøv å utfordre deg selv til å finne alle de ekstra vanskelige ordene for en bonus. Setter du deg fast på visse ord, kan du bruke "Omstokk" eller "Hint" for å komme videre. descriptionHTML:
Enkelt & Fengende Ordspill
Ordmester tilbyr det klassiske gameplayet til et ordspill på en ny og morsom måte. Du kan enkelt dra bokstaver for å sette sammen forskjellige ord. Det er enkelt å spille og gøy å mestre. Du vil helt sikkert bli hektet på ordsøk-moroa i dette ordspillet.

Mer Enn 2.000 Nivåer
Start med enkle og dagligdagse ord. Vårt ordspill leverer tusenvis av ordutfordringer på forskjellige nivåer som du kan spille. Mange flere nye nivåer vil bli lagt til i fremtiden.

Utfordrende Å Finne Alle Ordene
Holder det ikke å finne ord på de enkle nivåene? Prøv å utfordre deg selv til å finne alle de ekstra vanskelige ordene for en bonus. Setter du deg fast på visse ord, kan du bruke "Omstokk" eller "Hint" for å komme videre. Det kan overraske deg stort hvor enkelt et ord du ikke finner kan vise seg å være.

Beste Hjerneøvelser
Ordspill er best for trening av hjernen og staveferdigheter. Vårt ordspill er et av de mest spennende ordblandings- & ordsøkespill for å utfordre ordsøk-ferdigheter for alle aldre.


FUNKSJONER
- Dra bokstavene for å sette sammen ord
- Finn Ekstra ord for å samle mynter
- 2000+ NIVÅER som du kan spille
- GRATIS å få Daglig Bonus-mynter
- Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene
- Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder
- Passer for både barn og voksne som vil forbedre sine ordsøkeferdigheter
- Nettverk er ikke påkrevd, og du kan nyte ordsøk når som helst
- Simpelt & Lett å spille, vanskelig å overvinne gameplay
- Fullstendig GRATIS for alle spillere

Hvis du liker kryssord eller ordsøkespill, bør du definitivt prøve dette ordspillet. Det er enklere å komme i gang med enn kryssord, og mye mer fengende.


KONTAKT

comments: Love it to pieces. The characters are loveable and the stories are fun. I got through three to four in a few days I can't put it down. The only downside is certain decisions cost gems. Major ones are fine and expected but to have to be a jerk to someone because you don't have enough kind of sucks a little. But it's not often and by no means a deal breaker.

Actually, I came here because I'm a fan of Jakayla Toney. I'm a reader from wattpad, and I'm checking out her story here as game. 😂 Anyways, I finished one chapter and I'm enjoying so far. Gotta check out other book after I'm done. Looking forward to this app, though I don't really like the choices costing gems.But its okay, still like it. 😊

Every GOOD choice involved money.  Hard to find one interactive story game that doesn't involve money so much.  I don't mind paying for extra bonus scenes in the end but at least give us some GOOD selection WITHOUT charging!  Then maybe I'll rate it higher

I've really enjoyed reading All the Wrong reasons.  The author is very talented, a true story teller.  As I was reading I felt like part of the story I was so enveloped in the lives of the characters they were alive and real. I was sad when the story ended wanted to keep reading.  I was overjoyed when K. I. S. S.  came out by that very sane author who transported me to a whole new world yet again. I look forward to reading more from this amazingly talented storyteller!!

I'm frustrated by the fact that this is supposed to be a choose your own adventure game, but all the choices that make the most sense to me are stuck behind a paywall, requiring me to purchase those choices with a currency called diamonds. I get the story passes, and I would have been fine if that was the only barrier to read the story, but to require you to pay money for making what you feel are the right choices is just greedy.

The only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because the chapters update too late that you lose interest and sometimes forget what's happening in the story. If the chapters were to update on a regular basis then readers would feel the need to keep this app and will constantly play instead of playing the waiting game. However the content is good and most storylines get you hooked.
description: Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!Chapters Features:- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.- All stories come with info directly from the author!- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!  50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess? ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?And more interactive story games with fun choices!Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories

Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:

ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS
- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.
- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.
- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?

DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS
- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.
- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.
- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.

SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS
- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.
- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.
- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.

HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK
- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school
- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.
- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess?

ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES
- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.
- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.
- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.
- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"

SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL
- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.
- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.
- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.
- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?

And more interactive story games with fun choices!

Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.

Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories

descriptionHTML:
★★★★★Happy 5th Anniversary!!!★★★★★
Build your army, plan your attack and deploy your forces for an all-out, modern war game that spans the entire world, from the deepest ocean to the skies above!

Battle against the KRA, a rogue army with invasion plans for every nation. Only you and your allies have the power and skills to wipe them out in the exciting Solo Campaign mode. But you can also challenge your friends for fun and glory in the challenging multiplayer mode that truly tests your strategy.

Take advantage of the rich social features to find allies and devise your next cunning strike with the chat feature. Then join or create your own Faction to combine forces and truly become a force to be reckoned with! You can even make your name known on the leaderboards by challenging rivals and skillfully stealing their resources.

FIGHT FOR FREEDOM. FIGHT FOR FREE!
√ Enjoy a free world war simulation game with brilliant graphics, stunning animations, and realistic modern military units & buildings.

PROSPER & PROTECT
√ Build up your base by constructing and improving facilities that unlock new weapons, technology and tactics.
√ Collect resources to fuel your military nation, upgrade facilities, fuse army units and complete numerous achievements to earn free bonuses.

A TRUE WORLD WAR
√ Engage in innovative battles across the globe and on various terrains including scorching deserts, urban cityscapes, ocean depths and anywhere else the war spreads.

AWAKEN THE SUPER SOLDIER
√ Immerse yourself in the only modern-war strategy game on the market that offers deep-sea exploration and battles!
√ Construct the new super unit: Atlas. This immortal war robot is a relic from an ancient nation, but can be the ultimate game-changer in battle!

THE FACTION FACTOR
√ Form a Faction with your friends and allies to pool your powers, talk strategy, help each other out, and achieve levels of power that would be all but impossible alone.
√ Connect with your friends via Facebook and call for reinforcements from their units during battle.
√ Build a Faction Base where you and your allies can build and shared facility that you must all help to protect from invaders.
√ Contribute units to become the invader and strike rival Faction Bases for huge rewards and ultimate bragging rights.

World at Arms is perfect for armchair commanders, fans of military strategy games, modern warfare games, tank games, submarine games and tycoon games, as well as anyone who loves giant robots, cunning tactics, and fighting for domination in a mobile MMO. Download World at Arms for free and enjoy probably the best modern-war strategy game on the market!

comments: I have really enjoyed this game from the first week it dropped. Never spent a penny. Most things I can compete in. What players say about pay2play is true though.  If you want to play at the highest level you HAVE TO PAY! There is a very clear pay wall and everyone knows it. If your starting off and your free to play it will take you awhile and I don't even think it will be work it unless you plan to put at least 6 month in to be somewhat relevant.

Stop doing these tutorials that force you to select their options, if I need a tutorial I'll use the tutorial, if I want to just play the game and figure it out along the way let me do that.   I'm so sick of these games that don't give you any option. Is there anyone that likes tutorials that are done like this?

Pros: • Semi-Balanced pvp. • Tons of characters. • Fun leveling system. • Entertaining in-game events  • Challenging story mode. • No need to pay to become very strong.  • Auto-battles that save time.   Cons: • Constant Pop-ups reminding you to purchase loot boxes. • You will get wrecked by serious pay-to-wins. • Impossible drop rates for 5☆ characters and Chaos/Order heros. • Paying to unlock 5☆ heros that may or may not be 5☆. • The company spamming copy pasted messages to players who have beef with thier game instead of constructive replies.  Overall: Still a pretty cool game.

A game with buckets of potential, led astray by poor decisions & short term constant cash grabs(multiple times a week)  Poor balancing - stat accensions, Crown dust upgrade costs ( when even  avip 10+ lvl60 developer acc hadn't upgraded any crowns..I've checked dozens of high vip lvl 60s 0 upgraded crowns) 6* artis are pointless & don't feel worth owning.  Constant pop ups, easily 40-50 store pop ups per day sometimes multiple times within a minute.  the Lucky 7 quest was criminal, horrendous design & I won't be spending a penny with you guys again until I see you go down a better path.   the positives, autoing but being able to leave the game. Festival/ hero events are pretty damn good although it be nice to see different style events that 'have gameplay'  Characters are well designed & are extremely fun to use.   To summarise, has some excellent features but it's let down by some horrendous balancing & constant cash grabs that would get EA taking notes.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Alliance: Heroes of the Spire, the latest action-packed RPG! Collect powerful Heroes and create the perfect superhero team. Gather your Alliance to challenge fearsome enemies, develop cunning strategies, and clash with other players to prove your strength!

Alliance: Heroes of the Spire is available in 7 languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Russian.

Meet players on our official forums: alliance-community.rumblegames.com/forums
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/alliancegame
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/Alliance_HOTS


Collect and Upgrade:
● Over 400 unique Heroes available to build your ultimate team
● Craft Heroes to continue expanding your collection
● Ascend your Heroes to unlock strong new Skills
● Skill Up your Heroes to make them more potent in combat
● Choose from 19 unique Equipment sets which provide bonuses to your Heroes
● Combine Equipment sets for epic bonuses
● Socket Jewels to make your Equipment even more powerful


Fight!
● Continue your battles when you are away from the game with Offline Battle Mode!
● Face off against the elements of Fire, Water, Nature, Order, Chaos, and Shadow
● Optimize team strategy based on Hero Skill synergies
● Explore countless Rifts and claim their treasure
● Defeat mythical boss encounters for legendary rewards
● Conquer other players in the Arena and Tournament


Hero Events:
● Fight Heroes from many worlds for a chance to secure their allegiance and summon them to your Barracks
● Progress through Hero Event Rifts to try your hand at obtaining the most powerful Heroes in all of Fracture
● New Heroes released each month!


Alliance War:
● Battle against two other Alliances to seize control of territory
● Hold your position on the battlefield to earn Banners for your Alliance and secure victory
● Earn rewards for your entire Alliance - the higher you place, the better the spoils of war!
● Climb through the ranks to fight against the toughest Alliances in Fracture


Co-op Dungeons:
● Grab an Alliancemate and take down the strongest bosses in Fracture together
● Challenge yourself to conquer higher floors of the Co-op Dungeon for better rewards!
● Equip your Heroes with Crowns and Crown Jewels to boost their strength further


Social:
● Join an Alliance, or create one of your own
● Level up your Alliance to unlock additional benefits for all members
● Share your latest strategies and Hero builds with other players
● Challenge Alliancemates and friends to PvP duels
● Make new friends across all of Fracture!

comments: The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.
description: Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.DOMINATIONS FEATURES:GREAT LEADERS!• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!BRAND NEW EVENTS!• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger. FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!Download now to start building your civilizationNOTES:A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.Privacy Policy:https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/
descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

description: Build your very own collection of winged horses, vampires, unicorns and other magical creatures. If your adventures and battles prove successful, you will ultimately be able to tame even the superior beasts - the Dragons of Elements!Have you ever dreamed of commanding mighty dragons?Can you picture yourself taming a dragon? It might be a huge dragon or a small drake — no one knows, since all of the creatures in the game evolve and change, and it’s up to you whether your pet will be a cute little creature, a frightening beast, or something completely new. The game offers you about 200 unique creatures, each of which can be improved.Various game events to keep your adventures fresh and exciting· Regular quests will allow you to find scrolls for new spells and start your quest for the Golden Egg!· Portals to the world of Arcana will unlock for you a new element of creatures, and help you find the path to the Mother of Dragons. Only she can hatch ancient eggs.· Most spells are unlocked after your character reaches level 5. You will be able to enhance your creatures or throw your enemies out of the arena by using the most powerful spells, together with your friends!· From level 5, you will be able to engage other players in duels. But you’ll need to make sure you’re well prepared.· The Ancient Libraries will allow you to change the skills of your creatures, but before you can do that, you’ll have to fight the opposite faction.· Watch out for attacks from wild monsters at all times! The winner will get runes for spells.· Discover all of the treasure chests in the area. If you’re lucky enough, you might find in them artifacts that will unlock new options for your character.Video game or weight loss regimen?GPS navigation and an interactive map allow you to explore your city and see it under a completely different light. Ordinary places that you’ve walked through a thousands of times, will now hold magical and wondrous secrets. This game will get you to walk and enjoy the outdoors, as well as meet and interact with your friends a lot more, which is far more exciting and fun than going to the gym.What to play it onYou can play DraconiusGO on your favorite device, but you will need Android 4.4
descriptionHTML:
Build your very own collection of winged horses, vampires, unicorns and other magical creatures. If your adventures and battles prove successful, you will ultimately be able to tame even the superior beasts - the Dragons of Elements!

Have you ever dreamed of commanding mighty dragons?

Can you picture yourself taming a dragon? It might be a huge dragon or a small drake — no one knows, since all of the creatures in the game evolve and change, and it’s up to you whether your pet will be a cute little creature, a frightening beast, or something completely new. The game offers you about 200 unique creatures, each of which can be improved.

Various game events to keep your adventures fresh and exciting

· Regular quests will allow you to find scrolls for new spells and start your quest for the Golden Egg!
· Portals to the world of Arcana will unlock for you a new element of creatures, and help you find the path to the Mother of Dragons. Only she can hatch ancient eggs.
· Most spells are unlocked after your character reaches level 5. You will be able to enhance your creatures or throw your enemies out of the arena by using the most powerful spells, together with your friends!
· From level 5, you will be able to engage other players in duels. But you’ll need to make sure you’re well prepared.
· The Ancient Libraries will allow you to change the skills of your creatures, but before you can do that, you’ll have to fight the opposite faction.
· Watch out for attacks from wild monsters at all times! The winner will get runes for spells.
· Discover all of the treasure chests in the area. If you’re lucky enough, you might find in them artifacts that will unlock new options for your character.

Video game or weight loss regimen?

GPS navigation and an interactive map allow you to explore your city and see it under a completely different light. Ordinary places that you’ve walked through a thousands of times, will now hold magical and wondrous secrets. This game will get you to walk and enjoy the outdoors, as well as meet and interact with your friends a lot more, which is far more exciting and fun than going to the gym.

What to play it on

You can play DraconiusGO on your favorite device, but you will need Android 4.4

7 Florinis Street, Greg Tower, 2nd Floor

summary: Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of augmented reality that surrounds you!
title: Draconius GO: Catch a Dragon!

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.
description: Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!   FEATURES★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes! ★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat★ Experience deep RPG leveling★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINSRecruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDSHarness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers. App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.Developed by Demiurge StudiosINSTALL MPQ TO UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPER HERO AND BECOME PART OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!© 2017 MARVELGAME SOFTWARE © 2017 D3 Go!

comments: Verdt hver krone. Utrolig innovativt og gjennomført.

Lærerikt spill som blir drevet av å finne ordene til en bok. Ungene brukte litt tid på å utforske alt annet, men etter hvert var det uten tvil hovedmålet som var motivasjonen. Fortsettelsen på historien skulle de ha.   Kunne hatt litt bedre forklaring på enkelte oppgaver, så det blir noen spørsmål underveis, spesielt fra de minste.   Flott spill på alle måter.
Sønnen min har prøvd spillet  på iPad og ble veldig begeistret. Endelig har jeg kunnet laste det ned på mobilen! Årets mest spennende lærespill :-)
description: Lesespillet Poio passer for 4-9-åringer og skaper leseglede hos store og små. Spillet gjør lesetrening til en lek! Denne lese-appen passer for både dem som ikke kan lese og de som kan noen bokstaver og ord. Selvstendighet, utforskning, og lek er nøkkelelementer i Poio. Barna styrer leslingene, de søte figurene som spiser vokaler gjennom ulike verdener og samler bokstaver og ord som samles i en bok.Barna får stadig mer utfordrende leseoppgaver som er tilpasset eget tempo. Målet er å lese den 300 ord lange eventyrboken på egen hånd!Å knekke lesekoden dreier seg om å trekke sammen bokstavlydene til ord. Repetisjon og mengdetrening er nøkkelen til å mestre.Egenskaper:- Innovativ læring gjennom utforskning og lek- Samle alle de 9 norske vokalene og de 15 vanligste konsonantene- Gir leseglede gjennom egen utforskning- Innred husene til leslingene- Foresatte får rapporter om fremgangen- Selvstendig lek og læring med mulighet for involvering og samtaler rundt spillet- støtte for å bruke flere fingre slik at barn og foreldre kan spille og stave sammen- Ingen kjøp i app- Ingen reklame i appen- Opp til 5 barn per enhet (kan lagre sin progresjon)
descriptionHTML:
Lesespillet Poio passer for 4-9-åringer og skaper leseglede hos store og små. Spillet gjør lesetrening til en lek! Denne lese-appen passer for både dem som ikke kan lese og de som kan noen bokstaver og ord. Selvstendighet, utforskning, og lek er nøkkelelementer i Poio.

Barna styrer leslingene, de søte figurene som spiser vokaler gjennom ulike verdener og samler bokstaver og ord som samles i en bok.

Barna får stadig mer utfordrende leseoppgaver som er tilpasset eget tempo. Målet er å lese den 300 ord lange eventyrboken på egen hånd!

Å knekke lesekoden dreier seg om å trekke sammen bokstavlydene til ord. Repetisjon og mengdetrening er nøkkelen til å mestre.

Egenskaper:
- Innovativ læring gjennom utforskning og lek
- Samle alle de 9 norske vokalene og de 15 vanligste konsonantene
- Gir leseglede gjennom egen utforskning
- Innred husene til leslingene
- Foresatte får rapporter om fremgangen
- Selvstendig lek og læring med mulighet for involvering og samtaler rundt spillet
- støtte for å bruke flere fingre slik at barn og foreldre kan spille og stave sammen
- Ingen kjøp i app
- Ingen reklame i appen
- Opp til 5 barn per enhet (kan lagre sin progresjon)
developerAddress: Poio AS ved Startuplab, Gaustadalléen 21, 0349, Oslo
recentChanges: I denne oppdateringen har vi:
* Fikset flere feil som førte til at figurer satt seg fast i fjell og sugerør.
* Ryddet litt i ordlisten.
* Fjernet bakgrunnstøy etter man hadde besøkt et hus
summary: Crack the read code a breeze!
title: Poio

comments: To the guy that says stop bitching cuz it's free. Reviews are so they can get feedback to improve the game. What good is the game if you can only play 2 games a day? There are too many other games out there that are free that customers can get chips to play for hours. This game should take care of their loyal customers before they move on to some of the other games. So many have posted about the small amount of chips received and they added the spinning wheel, maybe by reading the reviews they are listening and trying to improve chances of getting more chips. If everyone continues to give low reviews, maybe just maybe they'll increase our chances to get more daily chips!

Purchased 90 rockets pack. Explained to me how I used all 90 in one game? Smh, that's too much.. So y'all want ppl to purchase rockets each hand. Y'all can do better. Chip packages as well. Maybe u will get more to contribute to the game. Smh, better chip packages probably will definitely help this game. Especially the price of chips to play verses what the rooms payout... Really is at a disadvantage to players to even purchase.

I usually love this game. However, today I decided to treat myself and purchase some chips to get the last two battle ships that I needed to get 800 chips. The game is so frigging rigged it's just sad. It took all 600 chips that I bought and all that I won trying to accomplish a goal.  I will NEVER purchase chips again, especially in this game.

Most of my purchases lately have been strange disappearing chips and rockets i have spent SO much  money on this game!!! and another thing i could not access any games for 2 days now but it TOOK ALL MY CHIPS AGAIN SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE I HAVE ALREADY CONTACTED YOU IN REGARDS TO THIS.

Good variety of games. Not many free chips once the first few rounds are played when compared to what the rounds cost. Be ready to buy, buy, buy if you aren't patient. They have added many more chances for free chips. Thank you guys.

I love the game again.  I'd been struggling with glitches and now they're fixed  I'm especially loving the free chips you give sometimes daily!  I've become re-addicted to it!  The new format IS easier to see, but it gets slightly boring when the two cards you CAN daub don't get any numbers!  It looks as if you're phasing out the gems, which is fine with me; I'd rather have all free daubs, chips, and only a FEW coin power plays.  The free daubs make all the difference between winning and losing.  Also, would like to see winning bingos actually give me the items I need to complete rooms and for you to increase the daily chips for every completed room.

comments: For a free game? I can't complain too much especially if i don't pay for it. The containers are actually a good addition to this game since you get containers for free. If you're lucky enough you can win a premium tank and those things are not cheap! But wargaming actually give them away for free. The event is impossible to finish if you don't pay with gold and to win a tank you must pay a huge amount of $$$. But for casual and f2p players? I think you'll enjoy it. It's a game guys, play for fun!

The game is good compared to the game i often play online. I could have rated this game all five stars. The controls for driving must have other options to choose from. And its not suitable for android phones that has 5 inches sreen display. My thumb keeps slipping off whenever i try to maneauver the  vehicle. On Pc's much more easier to handle using a keyboard and a mouse.

Hello. I love WOT and trying to play together witg my son. But we've chosen different servers (Europe & Russia) and now i cant find him in the players list to be able to join one platoon. I also cant connect to his server and he cant connect to mine cause system doesnt allow it. can you please suggest how we can join one platoon in this case? Thank you.

Best mobile game I've played, more fun than the PC world of tanks for sure. Only real complaint is that it takes up a lot of space on my phone... It's worth the investment in memory though. Make sure you're in a good wifi spot and have a portable battery and happy tanking

Not a bad game.  I'm a little sick of the unrealistic tanks.  Also the unrealistic play in some ways.  I wish there was a mode that limited you to real tanks of the same time period and had more realistic damage based on the weapons.  For example, I don't want to see the Dracula tank and the 88mm on my Tiger should blow a Sherman away in 1 shot at point blink range, not 6 shots...

Why is 6 of my team on one area while I am in the other. Because of this spawning system I died literally 5 seconds after the battle started. Great game though. Why is there so much lag. And why are my controls frozen. I move forward a  little and then I move 50 feet away from my spot. Fix this and then you get a big fat 5 stars.

Witness historical vehicles and models from other popular universes face off on the battlefield. The game features more than 250 unique vehicles!• Dynamic 7vs7 battles in different modes and in more than 20 game locations. comments: I got this game about a month after it was released.  Everything was awesome, the support was phenomenal and worked well together fixing bugs and listening to players.  They have done many great things, but the support more on non existent except for those who put thousands into the game.  I've dropped about $600 and the ignore my mails, msging via messenger.  Fun game, support is AWFUL

The trailer ad for this game shamelessly plays Pirates of the Caribbean soundtrack, and graphical assets in the actual game are similarly copied from other people's work. And by that I mean not influenced, by but blatantly ripped off. Hellooo lawsuit...

Developer has long history of poorly coded apps with server stability issues as well as loss of purchased game credits and lack of proper support.  Pick a game by a developer who actually SUPPORTS their app instead, you'll be much happier.

It was Great, until the stupid game started crashing every day!  I spent cash on this, and to lose so much due to it glitching and crashing is unacceptable!  I'll give more stars when this issue is fixed... until then if you don't wanna lose your money die to crashes and glitches DO NOT INSTALL!   Update , I wish I could give negative Stars,  it is continuously CRASHING if my troops die due to FAILURE which is caused by the developers faulty upkeep this time, I'll quit and never play another game made by this company again!  SIMPLY FIX THE ISSUES ON YOUR GAME OR REDUND OUR MONEY, YA CROOKS!!!!!!😠😠😠😠😡

Game was great. But now has to many glitches. Hopefully you don't have a problem because the support team is non existent. They never get back to you when you email them. I personally have list alot of troops because of glitches. 1 month ago I would have said download this game but I wouldn't now untill they fix the glitches.

customer service is a joke. hard to find a game where owner/developer cares about their players that spend $500 to keep their servers running. player community great. rest sucks. I deleted this app after crashing almost everyday for a week

descriptionHTML:
An epic strategy war game you absolutely can't miss! War Of Colony takes you back to the age of colonization!

Assemble your army and plunder resources to fuel your conquest!
Build your base and repel invaders; your army needs your full efforts to grow stronger!
Work up from Private 3rd class to Grand Marshal, and expand your territory to every corner of the world!

Game Features:

Base Development
World conquest starts with building a formidable base.
Increase resource production and storage; soldiers are no good on an empty stomach!
Upgrade castles, barracks and technologies to improve your base's defenses and military power.

Troops
Units have their own strengths and weaknesses. Use this knowledge to counter your enemies!
Generals each have their own special skills!
Excellent commander utilizes the battlefield environment to maximize the effect of troop deployment. Learn to get the best results with minimum costs!

Battle:
The age of colonization is an age of war!
PVE, PVP, 1v1, or even World War; the choice is yours!

Alliance
Join an Alliance to speed up development!
Rally your allies to attack and defend simultaneously. Strength in Unity!
