comments: Starting my second character. Look to all you perfect people out there who never do anything wrong and have it all figured out. This game isn't perfect but have to say that it's the only one I can think of that I have played for more than a year straight and have now started a second! Even my Wife started playing her own character and that is saying everything if you new her. P.S. Good luck if you are ever unfortunate enough to meet me on the field of battle.

The game itself is good fun, but it's ruined by anything but normal missions can't be completed without buying gold from the Gree store, the most frustrating thing is the constant crashes. I am running a completely up to date, vanilla Pixel2 and a 25mbps network and it will crash almost every time, no amount of updates to the game over the past 3 or more years, or my multiple platforms, has changed this. There is massive lag everytime you conduct an action, or change screens. Please, please make it more quick & stable!

Gree support sucks. They don't typically solve problems, or even provide appropriate responses to questions. Tapjoy doesn't pay out gold offers and isn't held accountable by Gree to stand by their offers. Game has come down hill over the years.

Game was good when was under the hands of Funzio.unfortunately ever since Gree takeover, there had been nothing but glitches, dishonest scrupulous non-ethical in-game strategies to trick players of their progress and money. I wouldn't advise players to continue spending or start playing this game

Very slow, lags, when you tap on anything, attack, raid, change base, deploy units, buy units.  Just takes forever. That's on Android phone, and on iPad 2, takes 5 mins to start, then will just crash, used to work sometimes.  I have been playing for a few years, and it just gets worse.  Otherwise would be good, but if you spend money on gold, it should work.

Gree either just doesn't care about the customers that play this game,  or they have  hired a bunch of bumbling idiots. Always have the same mistakes and problems every time anything is changed, new campaigns, etc. Hard to advance if you don't spend real money, but why spend money on a game with such a crappy team running it?? Don't waste your time unless your goal is aggrivation and frustration.
description: Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE! World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.Taking over the world isn’t for the weak. Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during monthly three-day World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern War, it’s not enough to want power, you have to take it.Features:• Free-to-play MMORPG military combat game• Form a faction with friends and other players• Fight in monthly LIVE World Domination events• Attack rivals for control of countries and territories• Run a command center and build fortifications• Get elected as a faction “Defense Leader”• See your winning faction’s name on a world mapVisit our Forums: funzio.com/forumFollow us on Twitter: @ModernWarLike us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEModernWarWatch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgamesNOTES:• This is an ONLINE ONLY game. You must be connected to the Internet to play.• Modern War - World Domination is suitable for fans of strategy, rpg and mmo games.
descriptionHTML:
Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE!

World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.

Taking over the world isn’t for the weak. Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during monthly three-day World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern War, it’s not enough to want power, you have to take it.

Features:
• Free-to-play MMORPG military combat game
• Form a faction with friends and other players
• Fight in monthly LIVE World Domination events
• Attack rivals for control of countries and territories
• Run a command center and build fortifications
• Get elected as a faction “Defense Leader”
• See your winning faction’s name on a world map

Visit our Forums: funzio.com/forum
Follow us on Twitter: @ModernWar
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEModernWar
Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgames

NOTES:
• This is an ONLINE ONLY game. You must be connected to the Internet to play.
• Modern War - World Domination is suitable for fans of strategy, rpg and mmo games.

comments: I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
Game is great. Love building games. Only letdown is that is pay-to-win. It would be better if non-paying players would have little more easy time with game, like give more builders at least... 😉
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint

recentChanges: Our Easter Event The Phoenix Cult is available! Log in now and get some great new and unique buildings for your city!

summary: Create a flourishing fantasy city and discover a magical world full of mysteries
title: Elvenar

description: An immersive combat game in a massive multiplayer online world, War Commander: Rogue Assault delivers a stunning, fully 3D battlefield experience like nothing you've ever seen on mobile. Command your army and launch strategic strikes against your enemy for control of War Zones.As one of the few surviving commanders after World War 3,  defend your base, customize your units, and attack enemies to survive. Become the ultimate warrior in this online military strategy game by battling to gain control of the world.Rogue Assault is the most realistic military game on mobile to date. With direct control of your tanks, helicopters, and infantry, shoot your way through enemy hordes and become a master of combat.       • Immersive 3D multiplayer military strategy game      • Individual or player-vs-player combat      • Real-time, individual unit control      • Immediate access to riflemen, heavy gunners, and rhino tanks      • Level up for access to powerful units and military mightWebsite: http://warcommander.com/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RogueAssault/Twitter: https://twitter.com/rogueassaultDeveloper: https://www.kixeye.com/ Build an EmpireBuild your base and lead your army to victory. Discover new defense systems, research state of the art weapons, and destroy any enemies that stand in your way.Fight in Strategic BattlesBlend foot soldiers, light vehicles, tanks, and aircraft to coordinate devastating strikes. Attacking the enemy never felt as good as in this realistic military game. Defend your FortressCustomize your defenses to repel enemies and control the world’s last resources. Alternatively, play offense and use your army to turn around, attack, and take what’s yours.      • Infantry: Standard warriors required in any battle. Exceptionally well-rounded and diverse, they are great for attack or defense.       • Aircraft: Perfect for launching surprise strikes against an enemy base. The right aircraft can provide a strategic advantage over grounded units who can’t shoot from so far below.       • Vehicles: The backbone of your force. With huge damage output and defensive capabilities, these units are a must have for any invasionNo Build TimesDon’t have time to assemble an army the old fashioned way? Don’t worry. With no build times, you’ll be ready to get into the action in no time.Join an AllianceForge strategic alliances with other soldiers and form battle tactics in the group chat, or seek advice from a pool of commanders in the live world chat. Those who join an alliance are better set up to thrive in this war-torn world.Monthly in-game EventsShow off your military prowess in monthly events. Fight strategic worldwide battles to top the world leaderboards.
descriptionHTML:
An immersive combat game in a massive multiplayer online world, War Commander: Rogue Assault delivers a stunning, fully 3D battlefield experience like nothing you've ever seen on mobile. Command your army and launch strategic strikes against your enemy for control of War Zones.

As one of the few surviving commanders after World War 3, defend your base, customize your units, and attack enemies to survive. Become the ultimate warrior in this online military strategy game by battling to gain control of the world.

Rogue Assault is the most realistic military game on mobile to date. With direct control of your tanks, helicopters, and infantry, shoot your way through enemy hordes and become a master of combat.

• Immersive 3D multiplayer military strategy game
• Individual or player-vs-player combat
• Real-time, individual unit control
• Immediate access to riflemen, heavy gunners, and rhino tanks
• Level up for access to powerful units and military might

Website: http://warcommander.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RogueAssault/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rogueassault
Developer: https://www.kixeye.com/

Build an Empire
Build your base and lead your army to victory. Discover new defense systems, research state of the art weapons, and destroy any enemies that stand in your way.

Fight in Strategic Battles
Blend foot soldiers, light vehicles, tanks, and aircraft to coordinate devastating strikes. Attacking the enemy never felt as good as in this realistic military game.

Defend your Fortress
Customize your defenses to repel enemies and control the world’s last resources. Alternatively, play offense and use your army to turn around, attack, and take what’s yours.

• Infantry: Standard warriors required in any battle. Exceptionally well-rounded and diverse, they are great for attack or defense.
• Aircraft: Perfect for launching surprise strikes against an enemy base. The right aircraft can provide a strategic advantage over grounded units who can’t shoot from so far below.
• Vehicles: The backbone of your force. With huge damage output and defensive capabilities, these units are a must have for any invasion

No Build Times
Don’t have time to assemble an army the old fashioned way? Don’t worry. With no build times, you’ll be ready to get into the action in no time.

Join an Alliance
Forge strategic alliances with other soldiers and form battle tactics in the group chat, or seek advice from a pool of commanders in the live world chat. Those who join an alliance are better set up to thrive in this war-torn world.

Monthly in-game Events
Show off your military prowess in monthly events. Fight strategic worldwide battles to top the world leaderboards.
developerAddress:
KIXEYE, Inc.
268 Bush St., STE 2008
San Francisco, CA 94104
recentChanges: - New base upgrades have been added for CC10. Take your gameplay to the next level by building these upgrades that improve your offensive and defensive power.

- Added directional arrows to the War Zones highlighting the attacker and defender in PvP combat. This will help make War Zones activity more clear, and let players identify who they are being attacked by even faster.
summary: War Commander: Rogue Assault is a fully 3D, real-time combat strategy game.
title: War Commander: Rogue Assault

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍
description: PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!  Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!  Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you. Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin! Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! comments: This game is a great way to pass the time but the controls leave something to be desired. Frequently you will click on the wrong thing whether it be a building, tourist, or pop up. Its also far too easy to accidentally spend resources you didn't mean to or without the intended outcome.

Halfway in the game my sicial capabilities have been blocked due to suspicion of cheating. I dont even know how one can cheat on this game. I love the game but will not recommend it due to the fact that you get suspended for no reason at all and support does not provide feedback

I liked the 1st one. This 1 has some bugs to fix. Not getting the credit for viewing the ads and not able to complete tasks because the people aren't showing up. Some tasks, I have done 10 times and for some reason, the task won't complete either. Gets frustrating.
Couple of minor glitches. Couple buttons r hard to get to respond. Only just started and not so aggrevated i have deleted yet..... Like the game n graphics and story.

This is a fantastic game very time-consuming and relaxing great graphics not only myself but my grandkids enjoy the game thank you for making it thank you for making the game just wish it didn't have energy so you can keep playing for however long you want to

Stupid game!! Had finally over 400 crystals and some stupid thing popped up and when tried to close it, instead it pressed button next to it and used up almost all crystals!! So stupid that there is so much things on the screen you dont have space to click what you need!! Biggest waste of time i ever had in my life!!

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the legendary game that captured the hearts and minds of over 100 million players is here!

Warning: Paradise Island 2 is highly addictive even if you’ve never played this kind of game before.

"Paradise Island 2" is a game for everyone who loves the sun, the sea, and the sand!

Tear yourself away from work and build your own resort on a sunny island and become the ultimate hotel mogul!

Don’t you think it’s time to start your own business? Wealthy tourists are already flocking to your sunny shores! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, build hotels, restaurants and stores, and provide plenty of amusements! Build your own empire of entertainment! Turn your island into the best resort empire and learn to manage your own business.


Key features:

✔ Build over 300 buildings drawn in a unique style.

✔ Improve and develop your island, invite and entertain guests, and earn huge profits!

✔ Help and feed animals in danger, build your city in tune with nature.

✔ Save an adorable leopard cub and get a loyal pet in return.

✔ Assemble a collection of unique animals and natural phenomena.

✔ Find all the hidden ancient treasures.

✔ Play fascinating mini-games (arcades, platformers, puzzles, pairs, PvP, PvE and more) with daily rankings of the best players and their achievements.

✔ Complete ambitious projects: find and rebuild ancient pyramids, abandoned farms, and world wonders!

✔ Take part in competitions against friends and other city managers for the best places in the game rankings.

✔ Win in fun PvP fights called Beach Battles.

✔ Play in offline mode. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!

✔ Play with your friends: visit friends’ islands to find hidden objects and receive gifts!

✔ Unique events with special game mechanics and lots of amazing quests.


Build your own tourist city with luxury hotels, receive guests and complete exciting tasks. Paradise is within reach! Take the reins of power and show the world that you can be a successful magnate!

The long-awaited sequel to one of the best economic city-builder simulation games!


"Paradise Island 2" Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/ParadiseIsland2/

Official page of "Paradise Island 2" simulation game http://www.game-insight.com/en/games/paradise-island-2

comments: I thoroughly enjoy this game.. graphics are smooth and bright, gameplay is fantastic.. a highly recommended mobile game.. perfect mix Action/RPG.. Great XP Farming Levels.  This game can be very difficult, I suggest you do not just auto-battle everything.. Take some time to learn your characters and all the glyph combinations.. Its almost endless. You will enjoy this one much more!
So far it is very addicting. My number one issue is that it constantly "goes out of sync with the servers". Also, maybe I'm just early in the game but coins should be easier to obtain than they are

Evolution is retarded, seriously. Having to sacrifice 2 other creatures of the same level to evolve makes the game insanely difficult for noobs to get anywhere fast. Come on devs, that's just bald faced greed, try a little more finesse if you ever want to see me invest in this game.
Great disappointment, when I heard that this game would come I expected something epic like heroes of might and magic V. Not this generic game that looks like all other games in the play store.
New to the game but so far so good. Some of the rules are a little vague but YouTube is filing in the gaps. Lots of variety. Well put together.
Summoners war clone with all the same problems...get lucky summons or lose...spend 10 minutes and all your crystals upgrading a rune 1 lvl...the game is all luck no skill

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians - a fast-paced strategy RPG based on the medieval fantasy realm of Might & Magic.
Journey through enchanted lands, collecting fierce and fantastic elemental creatures, and evolve a team of mighty warriors to summon to battle on the path to victory.

ENROLL IN THE ACADEMY OF MAGIC
• Create, customize and level up your own hero
• Choose a House of Magic: Materia, Chimera or Anima
• Use the mystic powers of your House to triumph in the arena

SUMMON A LEGENDARY TEAM
• Discover and collect hundreds of fantastic beasts and iconic creatures
• Watch their evolution from cute companions to legendary war allies
• Equip your team with arcane Glyphs to enhance their abilities

TRAIN & BATTLE
• Level up your creatures to unlock their true might
• Compete in the PvP Arena to rise up the league leaderboards
• Participate in Live Events to win epic prizes and rare items

LEAD YOUR TEAM TO VICTORY
• Face fierce opponents in fast and strategic RPG battles
• Use the elements of Fire, Water, Air and Earth tactically to gain the advantage
• Cast epic spells and use magical abilities of different elements

BECOME A HERO OF LEGENDS
• Journey through the fabled fantasy realms of Might & Magic
• Complete diverse daily quests and earn special rewards
• Enjoy beautiful graphics and unique creature designs

Compatible with Android 4.3 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy in-game currency. In-game currency can also be collected by playing the game without requiring any purchase.

comments: The recent update changed the way you deal with Chef Panda and make and receive items. I was making something before the update, when I played the next time Chef reminded me my item was finished. I clicked on him an was taken to a totally different layout. I have clicked on everything and nothing happens. How do I collect?
Need to turn off hints. Comes up straight after I have my go. Very annoying. I do want to play without hints or delay the timing.
The updates are better, still addictive! Good, fun game, can be annoying at times. Improvements and more rewarding would be to earn coins after a level or when you move on to the next island.
Better than Candy Crush and other Match 3 games!!! One of the few I have stuck with. Awesome graphics and not overly difficult to pass levels!! Great job Dev!
I only wish we could get coin rewards every time we either complete a stage or replay it successfully so we could farm our coin amounts faster. Can you allow us to have such feature, please?
Please bring back the 2× animation speed!!! It's so much slower now and makes me boring. We need 2x animation speed!!

comments: I can't get in the game its get stuck on the loading screen 3/25 Loading it shows and stays there it doesn't load past 3. I have tried uninstaling and reinstalling it does nothing so I don't know if it's a problem on my end or yours.

This last update has broken a major part of the game. Spirit Rest runs rely on speed and now it seems after 10-15 minutes (of inactivity, in an idle game) the game becomes unresponsive until you force close and restart, potentially losing what progress you had made. I know this is an implementation to stop bots but it has only made the game more cumbersome than ever before for living players. Please reverse this Ekkorr! Surely you can find some other way to combat bots without placing such a heavy burden on the rest of us.
I used to love this game but I had to re-install it to re-download another app, and when i connected it to facebook again my progress wouldn't load. If this issue is fixed I'll give it 5*s.
I have changed my review after one hour update. Now i can enter again my two years games.
Would be a great game in not for the American flag being replaced with a fat bashing insult image. Regret making in app purchase, would not recommend to friends.
I found out the solution just uninstall the game and then install it again dont pick any google acc just skip it and then it will work again sorry for bad english

descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]
Inquire the device information for the advertising services provided within the customer interaction and game. (Manufacturer, model, OS version, etc.)

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: Sometimes it's fun and most of the time will really piss you off. Like as soon as you log in someone has already got 20 kills. Or you get matched up with people that are at a much higher level. It can be very frustrating,  my guess is that there trying to get you to spend lots of money.

I think this game is awesom.. sometimes I get in a shootout and I'm taken out before I can get a shot, that just makes me want to shoot better.. but most the time I'm battling it out till the till the time play stops, then I get to view everyone's score on both teams and see what rank did what.. Not only is this game  challenging and exciting,  but NO ADS.  5 stars from me
Sometimes opponents do not die even after hitting 10-12 headshots.. quiet unfair check on that.. I would give you 5 stars
Everytime I'm on this game I can't put down the phone. I have to charge my phone or I get disconnected by the Wi-Fi Z

Great way to kill time. Not loaded with ads. Easy to earn upgrades. Really fun game. Was fun then came all the useless changes. Points. Cups. Penalties. It is a punishment to build a squad from the ground up these days

Seen advertisement to this few times thought I'd give it a look & I'm not very good at these type of apps but this is certainly worth a try the team element gives it more of an edge definitely recommend those wanting a sniper challenge to download!
description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/
descriptionHTML:
Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!

• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.

• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.

• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.

• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.

This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.

For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

I love the story Line just like I've been reading in the comments the energy sucks I know it's just to keep us from reading the story so fast an to blow our money on, but if there was another way instead of us waiting for so long for just a little energy it's defently keeping me from downloading another game like this.. it takes so long to receive the 300 energy I done forgot an really not into the story Like I was when I 1st downloaded it.

The story and art art great, like in the other game, and I love the music too.  I have 2 major complaints though: 1. It's not indicated anywhere in the appstore that this is a work in progress (there's currently 4 chapters in English). This particularly bothers me since I bought energy so I could get immersed in the story, only to be torn out of that immersion by an incomplete story. 2. The energy system. I mentioned this in my review for the Drogo one as well, and plenty of people pointed it out here so I won't go into detail.

I think all of these Is it love stories are absolutely amazing. The writing has given me inspiration to read more romance novels. But I don't like the energy system. I foolishly paid a lot of money to read/play longer and I'm glad the author and developers get the money for a product I thoroughly enjoy. I just wish the daily energy was 1000 or something

Amazing story... When will there be more chapters?! I also don't like how I have to buy energy in order to not just have five minutes (maybe) of reading the story and making decisions. Please come out with more chapters soon!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!
description: Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!Story:"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? descriptionHTML:
Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.
Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.
In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!

Story:
"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...
However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? Will he confide his darkest secrets...?"

Strong points:
✓ Meet with Vampires and Witches.
✓ It's your game: Your choices influence the story.
✓ A 100% free Otome Game in English
✓ A new visual adventure.

An Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) depending on the choices you make (choice game)

✓ Like love stories or stories about Vampires and Witches

✓ Discover a new otome in English

I love this game. There's just a tiny problem, the screen. I can't see half the stuff on it, and sometimes all I can see is just the character's and there name's. My screen won't move n I don't know how to fix it.

Why is that i have 397 thousands cp.. Before the reset.  .  Then it turns to 386 thousands!!  You all deducted 10thousands ?? Is it a bugs?? Or what ?? I will change my rating if you fix that problem.. Thank. You .

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! 👍🏽

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050

title: Fallout Shelter

comments: Last comment 2/19 I was in board 1170. Today 3/12 I am on 1240. Pkease fix the boards with the water buckets... The pieces fall on top of each other which prevents proper play. Also, when making moves the move I make is not the move that happens. Also, when watching the video for the xtra coin: when the video ends the game restarts taking me back to tohome screen to press play to enter back into the game.. Thank you loyal player!!

The sound effects of the tornado is kind of frightening but I don't fear because all the characters are near as I ease on down the road. The characters interactions will assist if I follow the yellow brick road. "I can't wait to meet the wizard" I believe I'm going to be granted more golden bricks to extend the yellow brick road. I'm curious like a lion. Lol. The best for the whole family. Thanks!

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!
description: Match 3 down THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD™ in a magical puzzle adventure game featuring DOROTHY™, the SCARECROW™, the TIN MAN™ and the COWARDLY LION™! Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie! Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure! The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match Features: MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!- Match 3 with new and unique gameplay based on the beloved Wizard of Oz movie and characters!- Matching brings you farther down the Yellow Brick Road with hundreds of exciting levels to overcome on your way!- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level! BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat. ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go. COLLECTIONS - MOVIE FACTS & MOMENTS!- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!- Learn fun facts about your favorite movie! Collect each type of Reel containing Moments to complete Sets for big rewards and to unlock the full magical experience! DAILY REWARDS AND EVENTS!- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!- Come and take part in weekly events, where you can face off against the Wizard of Oz himself, and other fun characters!   Download The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match and relive the magic of The Land of Oz today! Already enjoying The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match? Like us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on the latest content, newest levels, exciting contests, and more. https://www.facebook.com/TheWizardOfOzMagicMatch/ ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. comments: The good:  Better than WB1 where the same words kept showing up throughout even at difficult levels.  It's also nice that it shows your previous progress in a puzzle after you're forced to clear/restart it.  And although you'll still see lots of words that aren't part of the answer, the puzzles are themed so you can ignore those non-answers.  The bad:  The ads are very loud and you can't always silence them before they play.  It does not remember your sound choice so don't even think about playing this in the library.  Also, the game now has a ridiculous background that obfuscates the answer boxes making the game almost unplayable.  Finally, there are way too many boringly easy puzzles that you have to go through before you get to see the fun ones.  I almost uninstalled before getting there.
Really makes you think this game really makes you think it's mind-boggling
First time I've tried a game like this and I love it!
I love this game.when we are free we play this game any time
Good exercise for the mind.
I'm back!!! No other word game comes close to the challenge wordbrain2 offers.

descriptionHTML:
Guns, cars and zombies! Who wants more?

Smash through zombies in this action-packed post-apocalyptic racing game. Pimp your ride, mount your gun and drive through various dangerous locations full of deadly enemies. Do you have the skills to survive the attack of zombie hordes on the road?

Guns, Cars, Zombies! is the most epic post-apocalyptic racing game where you have to battle zombies for survival.


▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CARS ◀
Choose your style and build your unique zombie survival car!
Muscle cars, hot-rods, sport cars, pickups and other crazy vehicles to choose from.
Every car is fully customizable with dozens of unique parts.

▶ DEADLY WEAPONS ◀
Mount various weapons to the car to be more deadly.
Shoot zombies to survive.

▶ PLAY THE STORY ◀
Play through four campaigns and complete more than a hundred levels.
Each campaign has its own location to drive through, special enemies to kill and unique missions to complete.

▶ FIRE AT WILL ◀
Get out of the driver’s seat, hop in behind the turret and shoot down all of the zombies!

▶ SCAVENGE ◀
Visit abandoned places to find loot

▶ CHALLENGES ◀
Can you survive a road full of zombies and obstacles?
Challenge your driving skills on dozens of special levels.

▶ ONLINE TOURNAMENTS ◀
Compete against other real players and win big prizes in daily tournaments!
Climb up the leaderboard, get promoted to higher league and show the world that you are the best survivor of the apocalypse.


▶ HOW TO PLAY ◀
Hit zombies and avoid obstacles on the road
Shoot zombies for bonuses
Build a zombie-proof car to be unstoppable
Collect resources to purchase, upgrade and customize your vehicles and arsenal

▶ HINTS ◀
PLAY every day for valuable free rewards
Complete QUESTS to get resources
FORGE resources to craft powerful items
Visit the BOUNTY HUNTER for rewards
Buy LOOT BOXES to get tons of resources
KIll a lot of zombies to activate THE BEAST inside you


Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and link the game to your Facebook account to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE, this game is free to play and everything can be unlocked for free with a reasonable amount of effort but it offers items and packages which can be bought using real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

★★★★★ Please rate it to support cool new updates and write an honest feedback to make the game even better!

The game was fun for a little while, but it becomes quite monotonous. The game isn't interactive enough to keep you coming back for more. You more or less just watch your heroes battle which takes a lot of possible fun out of the game right away. If you spend any cash at all on the game, you unlock the ability to "raid" your already completed missions. So then when you need items, you will just mash the raid button until your energy is gone. And the energy recharges VERY slowly. You can play for free, but will progress substantially slower than the pay-to-play player. So overall, it's fun for a short while (a week or two), but you will quickly grow tired of it due to poor interactivity. If you are looking for a game similar to this that will keep your interest and has much more to offer, I would recommend Summoners War.

Game apparently 'malfunctioned' and the heroic chest kept saying open free.  This was after I spent $25 US dollars so of course I thought why wouldn't I get some free opens?  I didn't know they were charging me 200 emeralds a pop.  Customer service was NO help.  Hopefully I can get a refund from Google Play.  Don't download!  Bad programming, scam in game purchases!
While the game seems nice enough, it is nothing like the advertisement I watched. Complete misrepresentation gets one star.

descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!
★ Multiplayer war breaks out across the world. Will you come out on top?
★ PVP combat challenges you to earn valuable loot by defeating fellow players in head-to-head battle!

Defense and offense are critical – which strategy will you use to conquer the world?

Battle to conquer the world with advanced warfare tactics and a powerful army of infantry, tanks and helicopters. Combat multiplayer opponents in PVP strategy games, build the ultimate base and lead your team of mercenaries to global domination.

Download League of War: Mercenaries and become King of the mercenaries!

comments: Excellent Mmorpg. Definitely best of its kind. Not to big of a dowload. It is only about half a gigabyte. Very complex upgrading systems compared to most. Enjoy many story line quests. Many other missions. Mount system. Many martial arts. Pets. Marraige system. Guilds. Many shops. Nice vanaties. Multiple classes. Definitely a must download. Best of all progression may take time but does not require top up.  Edit: please fix keyboard. Barely works since update.

Great game over time, fast paced so you should have the best device and connection, the game provides most features others don't.. its almost perfect, spend most money and you will be at the top rank, the game is mostly fighting, nothing else.. just fight fight and fight. After the server merge recently, the game usually gives yellow ping.. so.. thats just about it.

descriptionHTML:
The New update for Age of Wushu Dynasty is finally coming to Android platform! Be prepared for the challenge from the legendary faction, Murong Manor. Test the skills of a true master in the new mode Survive In Impasse. Obtain hidden martial art scroll the Great Vajra Finger. Get in the adventure full of dice, sand, and gold. Learn the fourth internal skills, Indefinite Breath Skill! Are you ready to Overturn Heaven and earth?

"An awful lot of things just right!" – Pocket Gamer
"Best Mobile Game at E3” – OnRPG
"Excellent visuals and aesthetic martial arts!” – Touch Arcade
"Sure to be a gorgeous, action-packed game for all to enjoy!” – App Advice

Enter a Stylized World set in Ancient China

Explore a visually stunning virtual world filled with peaceful peach blossom orchards, bustling city streets, and scorched battlefields! With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!

Struggle for Power with 7 Schools

Choose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. Join a school, master the arts, and compete with opposing schools to discover your destiny!

Heart-pounding Revolutionary Combat

Become a true master of martial arts with Age of Wushu Dynasty’s revolutionary combat system. Go beyond simple hack ‘n slash mechanics with tactical real-time combat. Block incoming attacks, time your parry, and execute feints to break through defenses and defeat your opponent. Master unique skill sets to fight with blades, staffs, daggers, and bare hands! Ignite your Kungfu fire with powerful Rage attacks and destroy your adversaries!

Challenge Rivals in PvP

Who will be the ultimate champion of Jianghu? Enter a cut-throat world of ninja assassins and Kungfu heroes, as players battle it out in organized and open world PvP. Fight your way to the top in 1 on 1 Arena battles. Sneak behind enemy lines with Spycraft, and join together in Guilds to battle for supremacy in PvP Guild Raids!

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Age of Wushu Dynasty: http://aowd.snail.com/en/
Join the Age of Wushu Dynasty community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ageofwushudynasty
Community Forum: http://aowdbbs.snail.com/en/

comments: Challenging game against live players. Lots of contests and bonuses. Levels of play from beginner to world class. One drawback: all levels are open entry, so more experienced (and less ethical) players will enter into Beginner to collect quick victories. The designers should change the game so that once a badge is completed, players should not be able to enter games on that level again. This would be fair play for beginners, encouraging them to continue playing. Hope this is implemented in an update.

Game graphics and play are great. However dice rolls are seriously flawed. Doubles way too often. Not even close to real rolling. I've seen 2 sets of doubles in way to many starts of the game. If doubles are so common why don't you ever see 3 doubles in a row to start. Don't ever leave a piece open because the next roll will knock you almost every time. The developer obviously likes frustration proven by the childish limited chat emojis.
They need to fix the dice roll. Its absolutely a big cheat...no way can some roll exactly what they need to get out of a tight position that often. Its really horrible it ruins the whole game.

I think it's safe to say based on the dice timing, that this game app, like all the rest, is favoring a particular player in order to end the game quicker. The auto play is annoying and not possible to turn off.. but the layout is nice.

It's the worst game i have ever played , they are thieves , when you double and you lose they deduct twice the bet and when u win they only give you 45 percent of ur total winning money.I played a game and won 255 thousand , but they only gave me 120 thousand , and when i lost they took out 255 thousand from my money.If you dont believe me count ur chips and see.They suck so go to hell with this lame unfair idiot game.
The dice rolling is not random at all !  It gives ridiculously lucky dices and game over in 3 or 4 turns. Do not play it. NO RANDOM DICE, NO FUN AT ALL !!!

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.😢 I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!😀

Most stories are good but its Very very very pay to read. With weekly and yearly subscriptions. After reading every story in 1 day, i canceled my free trial and uninstalled. I refuse to pay 3 dollars a week. Or even 50 a year to just sit and wait for them to come up with more material. On top of the subscription cost they ALSO have gems you buy and spend on making the fun choices in the stories. So my advice it to start your free trial, cancel it, read every story in a day. And then uninstall and thank me for not spending money to wait weeks for one more story.

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.
description: READ the chat stories that everyone is becoming “addicted to” and people  “can’t stop reading”. Snoop on thrilling conversations as they unfold before your eyes. description: Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires! There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends. ★	BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!★	JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!★	PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES  from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!★	UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!★	MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!★	EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them! ★	CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe  ** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!
★ JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!
★ PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!
★ UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!
★ MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!
★ EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them!
★ CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!


BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe

comments: Not really easy to understand how to get started playing the game. I had to figure out a lot of it for myself but having to do that got frustrating so after a few days I just decided to uninstall it. It presents as cute and entertaining but trying to learn a game with minimal instruction doesn't give a great first impression

This is one of my favorite mobile games. My only issue recently is I spent money on coins after a level to finally finish it but the game crashed and I ended up having to start the game over smh it keeps crashing but this is the first time it crashed without fixing itself...hope you guys do something about that

Update: I read where you stated" Our developers only release levels after they personally ensure that levels  are beatable without the use of purchase's".  I was wondering, do they play a level for a week like I am so far trying to complete it? Are they really playing or it's what the computer tells them? I doubt that any of you are actually playing this game.

I have played this game for months and it was fantastic until the last 2 updates. After those the levels became so hard it's impossible to beat them without spending money. If you enjoy playing the same level for weeks at a time then by all means download. Otherwise don't waste your time unless you want to spend money.

Fun game but today while I have been playing, when I hit give up it keeps going to the 25 coins for 5 more moves no matter how many times I hit it. I have had to exit the app and reopen it to play the level again without spending coins. I hope this is just a glitch and not trying to get people to spend more money.

I love this game however, it has taken multiple lives from me for no reason. The game starts you off with 5 lives & then I accrued 10 lives from winning multiple lives from extra spins. All of a sudden the lives just disappeared and I was reduced to just 5 lives again. This is the 2nd time this happened to me which sucks cause the game is fun as hell.

comments: The game is great! Love the handling and graophics... But I would suggest making the drift angle wider. So instead of hitting 90° and then the counter says "combo broken" it could be something like 100°! Cause I mean... Reverse entries are awesome! And you should make the hoonicorn Mustang 4wd instead of rwd in the drift setup!!

I really enjoy this game. Ive maxed out purchases on tracks n cars, modified them all. Now its TOO hard to gain coins to open cars and much exciting tracks.. no updates on additional tracks.. think the optjons should be reviewed. Its now once you get where you are the only way to gain more is to go online to TRY and get coins to get anywhere... which sucks!!!!!

This game won't let me purchase anything. Everytine I start the app I get the "validation error" pop-up. I've sent mails to support, left multiple comments but nothing happens. I just get ignored. I am truly over his game with the level of support I am receiving, which is absolutely ZERO!

One thing: (two things actually)  Please make the drift school car available to buy with at least in-game cash maybe for a limited time? And please add a feature that gives you the ability to save replays, that would be really cool.

I think it should have ALOT more cars. I also think that they should alow custom decals and visual upgrades. Also a better online platform. Like a real time multiplayer. Other then that it's an OK game.  Its not been over a year and...it seems like they update this game every...6-7 months, really bad. Gets reallly boring 🤦🏽‍♂️

Love the game! But since the update I'm unable to purchase cars/cash. Every time I open the game it says I need to connect to the internet to make purchases even though I'm connected and can still play multiplayer etc. Any help would be great
