comments: This game is awesome. The girls are beautiful and the songs are nice. There are a couple of errors I be having with the game though. I would have liked if they had subtitles to the songs so we know what they are singing. Also give us a chance to earn more gems and scouting tickets.The scouting I think is also not fair. I would scout single ten times and not get anything but a rare. While my friends do single scouts and get ur and SSR. YOU won't get goods cards unless you pay or do the 11 scout. The pricings also could be improved

I like music game in general, it's hard to get the game right on mobile. but they manage to get it right here. The LP system prevent you to play continuesly unless you paid. But in my experience the amount is decent enough (this make you enjoy the music more since you dont have to restart to achieve perfection). The card mechanic is added bonus where you can spend hard earn cash. I can see people still enjoying the game without spending anything.

Warning! This game is freakin' addictive. Good graphic with cute characters. Recommended for anyone who loves idol genre ... Suggestion: please fix the lagging. The circle disappear sometimes during the live show. Sometimes the app even doesn't recognize my finger touch that makes me miss a circle. But overall. It's a good game  .... ALL HAIL PRINTEMPS AND GUILTY KISS

I love the game definitely but with the new update, it keeps telling me that there's a transmission error then when it went through and finished connecting, it said that the data transfer was successful. I haven't transfered anything to a new device or anything like that. The only options I'm given is to contact support and start a new game in which I definitely don't want to do. It isn't my connection because everything else on my phone that requires WiFi is fine and I can use it. Is this because of the new update?

I love the game and it's wonderful!!  But...  I had i don't know like a glitch or something.  When started to play the rhythm game while I playing suddenly the icon that I should press came faster all or a sudden. But the song is still OK.  After the glitch it becames back to normal.  This happen me for 3 times on the same day. Please fix it. And Thank you.

It's so addicting and a fabulous rhythm game. One thing I'm really picky on is that you press the circle on the beat and this is the only game so far that has stayed true to all the notes being on the EXACT beat. Other games don't do that and it bothers me to no end bc I don't know when to press but this game is great and I love it dearly. Also cute girls.
description: A massive hit game app in Japan, now available worldwide!Featuring Aqours and μ's from the Love Live! series, as well as game-original characters. Support the school idols and help them make their dreams come true!Simple and fun to play. Just tap to the rhythm!----- Original Rhythm Action ——Live shows are performed by tapping the screen to the rhythm. Better timing can earn you higher scores. String combos together to gain even more points!There are over 80 original songs to choose from.----- Create Your Own Team ——You can pick and create your own teams from Aqours, μ's and many more original members.Create teams best suited to your favorite songs or events, or just with your favorite members. It's all up to you!------Improve Your Members———Improve your team members by "Practice." The better they get, the greater their performance scores will be!When you "Special Practice" two of the same member, they become idolized with cuter costumes.------Full Stories With the Official Anime Voice Actresses———The main story is fully voiced by the original Aqours and μ's voice cast.------Side Stories for Each Member———Each and every member has their own story to tell. Deepen the bond with them to unlock the side stories.Side stories of Aqours and μ's members are also fully voiced by the anime series voice cast!***Recommended screen resolution***640 by 360 pixels or higher(This game is not supported on rooted devices.)
descriptionHTML:
A massive hit game app in Japan, now available worldwide!

Featuring Aqours and μ's from the Love Live! series, as well as game-original characters. Support the school idols and help them make their dreams come true!

Simple and fun to play. Just tap to the rhythm!

----- Original Rhythm Action ——
Live shows are performed by tapping the screen to the rhythm. Better timing can earn you higher scores. String combos together to gain even more points!

There are over 80 original songs to choose from.

----- Create Your Own Team ——
You can pick and create your own teams from Aqours, μ's and many more original members.

Create teams best suited to your favorite songs or events, or just with your favorite members. It's all up to you!

------Improve Your Members———
Improve your team members by "Practice." The better they get, the greater their performance scores will be!

When you "Special Practice" two of the same member, they become idolized with cuter costumes.

------Full Stories With the Official Anime Voice Actresses———
The main story is fully voiced by the original Aqours and μ's voice cast.

------Side Stories for Each Member———
Each and every member has their own story to tell. Deepen the bond with them to unlock the side stories.

Side stories of Aqours and μ's members are also fully voiced by the anime series voice cast!

***Recommended screen resolution***
640 by 360 pixels or higher

(This game is not supported on rooted devices.)

comments: This game is rigged!!!!  Get dealt two seven of clubs as a pocket pair.  Get a seven of spades on the river and lose to someone that had two pair.   And I have a pic saved of my pocket pair.   Last time I checked it is impossible to be dealt two of the same card.   And in what world does a three of a kind lose to two pair.   Will never spend money on this app again!!!!!!!    So glad to receive a generic response...   It would have been nice if you actually read the review.  It doesn't matter how lucky you are. You cannot get get 2 of the exact same card dealt in the same hand.  And no matter how lucky you are 3 of a kind shouldn't be losing to two pair.  That just the rules of poker.

Use to be Terrific, last 2 weeks the game froze on my winning hand causing me to loose to Those Ugly Figurines..... No matter how my h or how I play this game is RIGGED to have those Monsters, break you...  Every Time ...... Beginning Not To Respect This Money Vaccum
After new update  very slow loading and can't play game very upset please fix problem ASAP
Game is fun to play. Sometimes a little frustrating on the out come of the deal.
Hard to  win any hands , the give ok money  bonus.  Win maybe 2 hands out 100, unless you buy.

This is the most Awesumness game ever. Highly addictive, I wanna play thee other games but mop in this is just so Awesum, Fabulous n really funny n entertainin... Bravo Murka.on a game Sooo Entertainin. :)

comments: This is an updated version. My last post was from I think September or maybe October, but this game is truly AMAZING!!! The story line itself is great as well as the side story's that you can read as well. This game has changed so much from when I started playing this game in August. The events are great but I think the developers can give a little bit better rewards then just XP juice and more jewels as well as heart stamina, but other than that the game is perfect no glitches and non of that stuff. The one year anniversary was amazing thank you for that!! I can't wait for season 10 and the future seasons of Moe Ninja Girls!!!

There really isn't anything negative to say about "Moe! Ninja Girls" the story is great, every character is deep and likeable, even if you're a free player each chapter is long enough to keep you coming back and paying is definitely worth it,too. It looks great and sounds great to boot. I honestly don't like mobile games at all but this is amazing and would be even it were a console or pc game. To me this is THE perfect app on mobile so download it now! And devs: I hope you continue to support the game because if you guys keep making seasons,I'll keep playing. Love you guys! <3

The story is really the best part of the whole game. The ninja fighting seems to be arbitrary , as you can have high stats and still lose a match. Collecting new gear is fun but you don't get as much new gear as you would like. Sometimes the game stretches the abilities of my Amazon fire eight and crashes under Google Play add in. This story definitely makes it worthwhile playing though it's funny and titillating!  ;-)

Amazing story! Great characters. Other similar apps dont compare. Im playing completely free so far, just finished Season 1, and many awesome event stories. Well worth my time. Yes you have to wait 4 hours between chapters, but who cares. Its actually a nice pace.

Cute anime girls. Only things is that the gameplay was really simple. I've played some dating games before and usually there's more options or they appear more frequently. And the ninja fight mini game was also simple. I don't know. This game seems to get good reviews so maybe it's just me.

The game's quite sensational! You wouldn't believe how hooked I am to this game when I finally found it then played it. The story is quite good, the cast are very unique. All in all, a great game. Oh, it would be nice to add some mini-games that allow players to gain nineys/gems other than the ninja fights. Also, there were some hick-ups with some of the dialogues where the words don't make sense but it's still readable.
description: Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 5:00 PM (PST) and get $20 worth items and Akari's avatar for FREE! Don't miss the hottest deals on the starter pack SALE either!From the creators of visual novel games for women “Shall we date?” with <32 million DLs> comes the newest title FOR MEN!!WHAT’S THIS GAME?:The ending of the story will change based on the choices you make during the story. Your own, unique story awaits you! These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable. Get close with your favorite girl and enjoy school life.ABOUT MOE! NINJA GIRLS:You're a genius ninja that hides your true identity and transfers to Mizaki School.Surrounded by girls your age, you finally get the peaceful everyday school life that you've always longed for. After a series of events, you end up starting a "Ninja Seeking Club" at school to find ninjas! As you spend your days busy with girls and club activities, you start to discover the true identities of your fellow club members... Can you unmask your favorite girl's identity? And what's the big secret behind Mizaki School?	YOUR CUTE GIRLFRIENDS:Akari Hanao – “We're in the same class...and our seats are so close...it's gotta be fate, right?!”A classmate of yours. She always thinks positively, though sometimes she is too starry-eyed. Active, athletic, and relatively smart, she livens up the party, while also sometimes getting herself and the people around her in trouble. She admires ninjas and comes up with the idea to set up a "Ninja Seeking Club".Enju Saion-ji – “Oh well... If you're having trouble, I suppose I can tell you whatever you need to know.”A classmate of yours. She is a member of the student council and is smart as well as agile. Can seem commanding at times, but is actually caring by nature, so she takes care of Akari despite often being dragged into trouble by her. Does not show people how she lives her private life. Rumor says she comes from a millionaire family.Ricka Machiyuki – “No problem. Don't think about who is behind you. Just take your lessons.”A classmate of yours, who transferred right after you. Always stays quiet and poker-faced, creating a mysterious mood around her. From time to time she says things that sound unsettling, but her classmates hope that she is only joking. Likes video games. descriptionHTML:
Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 5:00 PM (PST) and get $20 worth items and Akari's avatar for FREE! Don't miss the hottest deals on the starter pack SALE either!

From the creators of visual novel games for women “Shall we date?” with <32 million DLs> comes the newest title FOR MEN!!

WHAT’S THIS GAME?:
The ending of the story will change based on the choices you make during the story. Your own, unique story awaits you! These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable. Get close with your favorite girl and enjoy school life.

ABOUT MOE! NINJA GIRLS:
You're a genius ninja that hides your true identity and transfers to Mizaki School.
Surrounded by girls your age, you finally get the peaceful everyday school life that you've always longed for. After a series of events, you end up starting a "Ninja Seeking Club" at school to find ninjas! As you spend your days busy with girls and club activities, you start to discover the true identities of your fellow club members... Can you unmask your favorite girl's identity? And what's the big secret behind Mizaki School?

YOUR CUTE GIRLFRIENDS:
Akari Hanao – “We're in the same class...and our seats are so close...it's gotta be fate, right?!”
A classmate of yours. She always thinks positively, though sometimes she is too starry-eyed. Active, athletic, and relatively smart, she livens up the party, while also sometimes getting herself and the people around her in trouble. She admires ninjas and comes up with the idea to set up a "Ninja Seeking Club".

Enju Saion-ji – “Oh well... If you're having trouble, I suppose I can tell you whatever you need to know.”
A classmate of yours. She is a member of the student council and is smart as well as agile. Can seem commanding at times, but is actually caring by nature, so she takes care of Akari despite often being dragged into trouble by her. Does not show people how she lives her private life. Rumor says she comes from a millionaire family.

Ricka Machiyuki – “No problem. Don't think about who is behind you. Just take your lessons.”
A classmate of yours, who transferred right after you. Always stays quiet and poker-faced, creating a mysterious mood around her. From time to time she says things that sound unsettling, but her classmates hope that she is only joking. Likes video games. Loves fried noodle hotdogs.

FEATURES:
* FREE to play!

* In-game events frequently held with exclusive prizes

- Want to have a love affair without anyone knowing
- Are crazy about Ninjas

- Enjoy reading fiction with grand setting

descriptionHTML:
The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!

= Features =

Construction of naval base!
All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.

Naval construction!
Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.

Form huge Alliances!
Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.

World War!
As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.

Research cutting edge technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

comments: I had to do this for a Tapjoy thing and I spent ALL DAY trying to get past stages. They are way too difficult before 100, that shouldn't be. Normally, I tough it out with offers but this one is not worth it even if it's 200 points. This game is UPSETTING

Over engineered upgrades which are clearly done as a gold mine for DroidHen. Result is you either pay to win or massive grind. Defender II was more balenced in this regard but still a huge grind too. I think World Raid is a myth since it has never worked. It apperently lasts about 30 second but I don't know since it mostly throws an error. I've gotten in twice and it immediately goes to Stage Cleared with >97% beast life left.

Bug that you have to wait endlessly to enter daily raid seems to be partially fixed. But: 1. Raid is even more fraudulent than before...no mattet you defense, dragon will one hit you. Fraud, there is no reason for a mechanic you cannot do anything about except exploitation! 2. I have all the upgrades and do pretty much max dmg, but there seem to be people out there that do 20 times the amount I do...except they don't, because they simply DO NOT EXIST!!! AS IN BATTLE MODE THEY ARE SIMPLY MADE UP BY THE DEVS! THEY ARE NOT ACTUALLY REAL PLAYERS!!! 3. The skill that decreases % of all dmg does not do so...it virtually does not reduce damage at all, but still it costs 50 crystals per % point. Also fraud! 4. You pay for somethin but you cannot keep it. If you change your phone, everything is lost forever! This is criminal behaviour! CONCLUSION: Probably the most fraudulent and criminal organisation out there. BEWARE AND DO NOT INSTALL, AND FOR CHRISTS SAKE, DON'T SPEND MONEY ON IT!!!
Great game. Was able to transfer data when I upgraded my phone. Simply and easy. Just sync with a FB account and load saved. Great time killer. Just need a better method for material farming
Great time killer.  Love the game play.
It didn't give me my epic bow it promised to give me when I downloaded it.

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTS💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: This game has had me hooked for almost two years now. There is always something to work on and improve. For long time Final Fantasy fans, this is the ultimate fanservice. I found this game to be more nostalgic than even other Final Fantasy crossover games like Dissidia and Theatrhythm. My only gripe is that I wish there was some sort of non-battle exploration aspect. A chance to explore the 3d FF games in 2d, even if they were brief and not the whole worlds, would be a nice touch. Highly recommended if you're looking for an addictive combat-focused rpg to devote yourself to, and super recommended for Final Fantasy fans.

Some minor technical issues with hanging or loading forever screens... but overall superb job with the idea, and best part is not needing to gatcha for your fave ff characters. Prob the least p2win of the top mobile games out there

I would rate it a 5, but the problem is that after the 6/8 update, the game ended up being super slow.  Extremely slow that I had to set my battle speed to 1 just to perform a blatant laggy action.  If you fix this issue, then I'll be happy to re-rate it a 5, but for now, you deserve a 3 unless you resolve it.

A fun game that makes you think about playing other Final Fantasy games. I have become invested in various characters and I am interested in Ffiv. The sprites do not work for all characters as it is hard to see differences between characters such as Vayne and Larsa. The game has missed an opportunity to create a storyline to bring the various games together. However it is a fun game that makes you want to play the full range of the Final Fantasy franchise.

I can't remain as positive as I used to be towards the game. With the various app issues such as excessively long loading times, poor performance, and issues with in-app purchases, I have soured on the game as a whole. The lack of daily missions that the japan side of the game received with the FF3 Onion Knight event that we still haven't received reeks of greed and deprives us of about 100 mythril (the in game currency) compared to where we should be.   The game itself, when it runs properly is still excellent. And it is awesome to use your favorite Final Fantasy characters, or become new fans of some. But DeNA has treated the Global version of the game as an afterthought as of late.

I gave this game 5 stars on EVERYTHING! But... I have some criticism. Some of the dungeons are completely too difficult. I've been playing the game for 2 years now DIEHARD and i still can't get even close to beating some of the bosses.
description: *** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE *** Gigantic update! RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper! Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again. ======= "FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade  "FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat  "...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15 ======= FEATURES • RELIVE THE MEMORIESBattle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!  • CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAMPut your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!  • FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAYExperience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle! • SPECIAL EVENTSWith special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities! ======= STORY In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next. The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world. That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin. The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.  Defend Your Legacy. ======= EXPERIENCE A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY! FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse… And many, many more...  © SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.© DeNA Co., Ltd.
descriptionHTML:
*** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE ***

Gigantic update!

RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!

Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again.

=======

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat

"...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15

=======

FEATURES

• RELIVE THE MEMORIES
Battle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!

• CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Put your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!

• FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAY
Experience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle!

• SPECIAL EVENTS
With special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities!

=======

STORY

In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next.

The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world.

That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin.

The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.

Defend Your Legacy.

=======

EXPERIENCE

A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY!

FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…
FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…
FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…
FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse…

And many, many more...


© SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.
© DeNA Co., Ltd.
developerAddress:
665 3rd St, STE 150
San Francisco CA 94107
recentChanges: • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: RPG with heroes from across the history of FINAL FANTASY! Defend your legacy!
title: FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper

description: 세븐나이츠 4주년 업데이트!각성 태오와 Smart 세나를 만나보세요!▶ 구사황  각성하다 ◀파괴의 힘을 받아들인 태오!한층 더 강력해진 태오를 지금 만나보세요.▶ 4주년 업데이트 기념 이벤트 ◀ 루비 5000개, 스페셜 영웅6성 겔리두스 장신구 선택권풍성한 이벤트로 4주년을 맞이해요!▶ 더 편해지고 Fun해졌다! ◀ 더 이상 지루함은 없어요!매일 반복해야했던 숙제같던 콘텐츠가어떻게 바뀌었는지, 확인해 보세요!!4년동안 많은 사랑에 감사 드립니다.앞으로도 다양한 이벤트와 업데이트로보내주신 사랑에 보답하겠습니다.■■■■■ 게임소개 ■■■■■ 비주얼이 다른 전략! 거부할 수 없는 초강력 비주얼 RPG 세븐나이츠 for kakao 1. 수백 명의 영웅들과 팀을 만들어 모험을 떠나자! 2. 쉽고 빠른 자동전투로 누구나 손쉽게 즐길 수 있는 게임! 3. 다이나믹하고 다양한 게임모드! - 모험모드: 13개의 영지를 정복하며 나의 영웅을 성장시키자! - 결투모드: 자웅을 겨루고 최강임을 인증하는 결투장! - 무한의탑: 나의 한계는 어디인가! 도전하고 또 도전하자! - 요일던전: 매일 다른 영웅들을 조합하여 공략하는 재미! - 공성/길드전: 길드원과 협동하여 최강의 길드가 되자! - 보스전 : 극강의 보스를 물리쳐 최고임을 증명하라! ■ 상품 정보 및 이용 조건 안내 ■ ※ 유료아이템 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. - 공급자 : 넷마블게임즈(주) 대표이사 권영식 - 이용조건 및 기간 : 게임 내 별도 고지된 내용에 따름 (사용기간이 표시되지 않은 경우, 서비스의 종료일까지를 사용기간으로 간주) - 결제금액 및 방법 : 상품 별 별도 고지된 결제금액 및 결제방법에 따름 (외화 결제 시 환율 및 수수료 등으로 인해 실제 청구금액과 다를 수 있음) - 상품지급방식 : 게임 내 구매한 아이디(캐릭터)로 즉시 지급 - 넷마블 고객센터 : 1588-3995 (평일 오전9시~오후6시 상담가능) - 최소사양 : CPU 듀얼코어 1.2GHz, Ram 1GB - 주소: 서울특별시구로구디지털로300 - 사업자번호: 105-87-64746 - 통신판매업번호: 제2014-서울구로-1028 호- 사업자 이메일: netmarbles@igsinc.co.kr개인정보 취급방침 : http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp?locale=ko서비스 운영 정책 : http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp?locale=ko■ 접근권한 안내 ■   ▶ 필수적 접근권한       저장공간       - '단말기내 프로그램 설치 및 데이터 저장' 등을 위해 필요합니다.       휴대전화 상태 및 ID 읽기       - '이용자 계정 생성 및 확인'을 위해 필요합니다.     ▶ 접근권한 철회방법       - 운영체제 6.0 이상 : 설정 > 어플리케이션 관리자 > 앱 선택 > 권한 > 접근권한 철회 가능       - 운영체제 6.0 미만 : 접근권한 철회가 불가능하므로, 앱 삭제로 철회 가능----개발자 연락처 :개발자 연락처 : 02-1588-3995 서울시 구로구 디지털로 300 지밸리비즈플라자 20층사업자 번호 : 105-87-64746  통신판매업 번호 : 제제2014-서울구로-1028호

Everything you love about bubble shooter games and much more! 🍬🍬 Just Like a Candy! 🍬🍬 Crush the evil forces and save the world from the dark mist together with the good witch Light Sentinel! comments: Updated This game has become about how much time and MONEY you can spend on it. They don't care about issues in game or what feed back they get. There are hundreds of issues that don't get addressed they just add more and more content hope people ignore the issues. Thed new content creates new issues and in some cases makes old issues worse

Don't bother. Pay players only do well. And it's expensive! Devs have it programmed for pay players so you fall far behind and can't catch up. They match you against pay players that are always stronger. Contests are extremely difficult. Been playing for 2 years so I know what I'm commenting about.

Ever since the new owners took over, content has lessened. Although new heroes appear, it is all about money scams and contests. Turned down drop rates make it nearly impossible to upgrade with dropping piles of cash.
Used to be a fun game with silly characters and lots to do. Since sold by per blue game quality has plummeted. Deleted and moved on to other games that run smoother and appreciate customer feedback.
The text in game as become tiny almost unreadable since last update. Am I the only one? I'm playing on galaxy S8.

One of my accounts was stolen, I had it connected to FB, Google & Email, I have gotten an email asking for things they need to verify, I sent what I could, name, server, etc, I also sent pics of the name it was when I had it and the name they changed it to, also the guild name, still not heard a thing back? It can't be that hard to get it back, I known a few ppl working in the gaming area, and they say it's pretty easy that you guys probably could care less, as long as you get your money...I really like playing it, I've put money into it, but security is horrible if I can have it connected to 3 things, yet someone can still steal it???.....Very disappointed now.
description: Battle dragons and monsters in DragonSoul, the epic fantasy RPG stuffed with amazing heroes, legendary monsters and fantastic loot! Battle online to earn legendary heroes and power-up to brawl your way through multiple fantasy game modes. Roleplay through the many Campaign chapters, test your skills against real DragonSoul players in PvP battles, and take a break from your quest to battle in the Boss Pit! Even team up with other players by joining a multiplayer Guild!With all new heroes, gear and maps to grind, DragonSoul is a ridiculously fun and epic role playing adventure!DragonSoul Features:Strategy RPG with Over-the-Top Battles!+ Collect and choose your 5 best heroes to wage war against monsters, dragons and even other players online+ Roleplaying games and campaign battles come with a ridiculously epic twist+ Strategy is key to beating tougher and stronger opponents!Battle in Weekly ‘Guild Wars’ Fighting Games!+ RPG fighting games give you a shot at squaring off against other players+ Battle dragons and other amazing creatures in updated challenges+ Multiplayer RPG games allow you to compete against other players for top ranks, prizes and bragging rightsEpic Heroes & Powerful Runes!+ Heroes have at least 4 deadly skills and 14 rarity levels+ Collect Heroes to build the ultimate lineup+ Battle with awesome gear like Laser Kittens, Enchanted Elbow Pads and Lucky Orc’s Foot+ Legendary heroes get even stronger with the addition of RunesBattle Dragons & Legendary Monsters!+ Battle dragons and monsters by fighting in combats+ Monster RPG becomes real! Strategize with your heroes to battle your monsters in this RPG+ Heroes clash with epic monsters in battles like you've never seen with unique & awesome gearEpic Hero Quest!+ Battle dragons and monsters as you collect Soulstones to free and unlock Heroes from the clutches of the evil dragon, Umlaut!+ Roleplaying as five main heroes; you’ll battle dragons and grab rare lootAmazing Graphics!+ Explore a rich fantasy world filled with gorgeous environments, hilarious characters, astounding effects, and stunning graphics.Long ago, fearless heroes ruled the land with mighty powers. Then the jealous dragon Umlaut captured the heroes, trapping them in Soulstones. Now, only few heroes remain. Only YOU can take the remaining few on a journey from a scrappy band and turn it into an unstoppable army as you unlock Soulstones in each battle. Explore an original world with fantastic characters while fighting your way to the top, freeing heroes and defeating evil along the way!Fantasy RPG games will never be the same! Battle with your legendary heroes and become the best in this monster RPG!Download DragonSoul today!DragonSoul is available in multiple languages, including: Spanish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian.
descriptionHTML:
Battle dragons and monsters in DragonSoul, the epic fantasy RPG stuffed with amazing heroes, legendary monsters and fantastic loot!

Battle online to earn legendary heroes and power-up to brawl your way through multiple fantasy game modes. Roleplay through the many Campaign chapters, test your skills against real DragonSoul players in PvP battles, and take a break from your quest to battle in the Boss Pit! Even team up with other players by joining a multiplayer Guild!

With all new heroes, gear and maps to grind, DragonSoul is a ridiculously fun and epic role playing adventure!

DragonSoul Features:

Strategy RPG with Over-the-Top Battles!
+ Collect and choose your 5 best heroes to wage war against monsters, dragons and even other players online
+ Roleplaying games and campaign battles come with a ridiculously epic twist
+ Strategy is key to beating tougher and stronger opponents!

Battle in Weekly ‘Guild Wars’ Fighting Games!
+ RPG fighting games give you a shot at squaring off against other players
+ Battle dragons and other amazing creatures in updated challenges
+ Multiplayer RPG games allow you to compete against other players for top ranks, prizes and bragging rights

Epic Heroes & Powerful Runes!
+ Heroes have at least 4 deadly skills and 14 rarity levels
+ Collect Heroes to build the ultimate lineup
+ Battle with awesome gear like Laser Kittens, Enchanted Elbow Pads and Lucky Orc’s Foot
+ Legendary heroes get even stronger with the addition of Runes

Battle Dragons & Legendary Monsters!
+ Battle dragons and monsters by fighting in combats
+ Monster RPG becomes real! Strategize with your heroes to battle your monsters in this RPG
+ Heroes clash with epic monsters in battles like you've never seen with unique & awesome gear

Epic Hero Quest!
+ Battle dragons and monsters as you collect Soulstones to free and unlock Heroes from the clutches of the evil dragon, Umlaut!
+ Roleplaying as five main heroes; you’ll battle dragons and grab rare loot

Amazing Graphics!
+ Explore a rich fantasy world filled with gorgeous environments, hilarious characters, astounding effects, and stunning graphics.

Long ago, fearless heroes ruled the land with mighty powers. Then the jealous dragon Umlaut captured the heroes, trapping them in Soulstones. Now, only few heroes remain. Only YOU can take the remaining few on a journey from a scrappy band and turn it into an unstoppable army as you unlock Soulstones in each battle. Explore an original world with fantastic characters while fighting your way to the top, freeing heroes and defeating evil along the way!

Fantasy RPG games will never be the same! Battle with your legendary heroes and become the best in this monster RPG!

Download DragonSoul today!

DragonSoul is available in multiple languages, including: Spanish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian.

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent....   Maybe a later update brings a fix..................

This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yet😁

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.
You can't get anywhere unless you actually use money to buy the power ups to bet the levels. It's a waste of space for any device
Hate it. Too difficult. No helping aid. Not funny, but stressful. I left the game at level 83. Why you made it ugly like this?
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.
description: **CELEBRATE SPRING WITH OUR LIMITED-TIME OFFERS**Ready, aim — pop! Embark on a colorful, bubble shooting adventure with all your favorite Smurfs in Smurfs Bubble Story! Travel with Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Clumsy and rest of the Smurfs family, on a quest across a forbidden forest, mysterious meadows and rushing rivers to pick up the other Smurfs kids who have gone lost.  Join these little blue folks on an amazing magic adventure as they discover new Smurfs, explore the Smurf world, and go toe to (smaller and very blue) toe with Gargamel.  Earn rewards, unleash special moves, and expand your Smurfs collection as you puzzle pop your way to victory!  Line up the perfect shot and trigger massive chain reactions by using each Smurf's individual amazing abilities.  --FEATURES-- MATCH BUBBLES - Pop matching bubbles to collect tons of magical items. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions.  FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more. HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles. EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie. PLAY BOSS BATTLES - Face off against Gargamel and his minions in bubble blasting showdown to win special booster powers! COMPLETE BONUS MISSIONS - Limited-time challenges to unlock exclusive rewards and new Smurfs! GET SOCIAL – Connect to Facebook to play your friends and gift extra lives. CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Beat your friends at collecting the most Smurfs.   If you have issues, questions, or comments please email us at SmurfsSupport@spe.sony.com. We want to hear directly from you!   NOTE: If you uninstall Smurfs Bubble Story (or if your device is lost, stolen or destroyed), all unused consumables (In-app purchases) will not be refunded and cannot be transferred to new devices or accounts. To exercise certain choices regarding interest-based advertising, visit www.aboutads.info/choices. You may also download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices. comments: 5 min for 1 bar of energy is too long to wait. Loose interest.. when you level up the energy bar stays the same. It doesn't refill or increase.  Which also annoying as takes too long to complete timed tasks.  Frustrating as hell as decent game but as states above is a disappointment. Improve on these factors and you have a decent game until then there's no point in playing as everything is LONG and boring

I love that this game features the cast of Desperate Housewives - they look so similar and it makes me remember what their voices on the show are like. I think it's great that the game can be played Offline and how there is a storyline with mystery involved. I've played most of the game and just play the new episodes as they come. 4 Stars!
I don't understand why you don't get a refill of energy when you level up. It takes so long as it is to full up.... give us a freebie when we hit a milestone!

Its ok...a bit. The concept is interesting. But the game is getting too monotonous. .. and also do something about the energy refill.  It takes too long. Overally its an ok game but there is room for improvement.

Y'all need to hurry up !! I already completed Chapter 14. Like what are y'all waiting on ?! Don't make a game so damn addicting and have people waiting to see what's next. Get a move on. Until then you only get 3 stars.
Only issue is you have to wait so long for energy..  Only get to play for a few minutes..  Then wait on energy!  Would be willing to pay for it for a better deal :) but still gets a 5 star!!

comments: 1st the game is no longer about skill its all about spending money, if you dont regularly spend large amounts of cash you can't compete. 2nd rewards are obsolete after 2 weeks. 3rd support is useless, all they do is say sorry but they never actually do anything.
Expensive game to play, long build time, no protection for lower level playes. You spend money you will do fine major lag when playing
wasted of time and money becuase of the scripts which you cant kill it amd make this game clean and fiar,,we coined alot and we just lost our miney and anothers got what we coined free from scripts,,

It would be nice if you got rid of all the inactive player's, but I do like this game, ive been playing for over 3 year's now . I recently lost my  phone, when i got a new phone i had lost my account but a very nice guy called Neil at rockyou sorted it for me so I can't complain.

MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS Been playing over 3 years its time they need to merge servers. At most 50 active players on w14. Would be obvious but most have 10 alternate accounts making it harder to see how dead it has become. The select army function has been broke for months even tho they have updated to make map look like snow and buildings animate faster. Pointless... Lag is even worse and now impossible to do anything when attacked you have to exit game and reload to hopefully have anything left. Theres been multiple hacks making armys instant return to there death. Nothing waz done to fix it. Very expensive packages are rigged to only give one commander but imply that you recieve the 32 needed to complete one. Experimentals fail even at 110% chance success. The players are great community and support slightly improved. It is a very complex game with many things to keep u busy forever. To many issues to list all most of all need to MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS
Its my favourite game but it is lagging all the time pls fix it and 5 stars..also the building takes so long..why so much time?

descriptionHTML:
Build your military empire and conquer your enemies by becoming a war mastermind. Raise a powerful army and join an alliance to take over the world in this free-to-play MMO Strategy game.

NEW – Report to Alliance Base, one of the biggest game expansions yet! Explore new environments, construct new buildings, and collect new resources in your march to victory. Then, vanquish your enemies in epic single-player Campaigns and recruit new Commanders, Specialists and Implants to seize the day.

=WAR OF NATIONS FEATURES=

EXPLORE AN OPEN WORLD
Build up to 11 outposts on a giant world map occupied by other players. Strategically choose the best coordinates by building on rare resource patches and avoiding enemy territory.

BUILD & MANAGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
Coordinate attacks with up to 50 players around the globe. Join a strong Alliance to protect each other and devastate enemy bases.

BATTLE IN SINGLE-PLAYER MODE
All-new Single-Player Campaigns will challenge players like never before! Come back daily for new missions and rewards!

MANAGE YOUR ALLIANCE BASE
Introducing an all-new hub for your Alliance. Build the powerful Alliance Command, Monument and Material Compound to get the leg up and enable team boosts.

DEPLOY BATTLE TACTICS
Overwhelm your enemies with different battle strategies by stealing, raiding, capturing, or occupying enemy bases. Level up your defense by building base shields or teleporting outposts.

RECRUIT UNDEAD SOLDIERS
Recruit new Zombie Commanders to lead your army and devastate the enemy.

UPGRADE & FUSE YOUR STRONGEST COMMANDERS
Artificially fuse & equip your commander with hi-tech gear. Send the toughest ones with your units to conquer your enemies.

UNLOCK POWERFUL HI-TECH UNITS
Research to unlock up to 18+ powerful units with multiple levels of upgrades.

ENGAGE IN REAL-TIME EVENTS
Display the power of your alliance in World Domination, King of the Hill, Players Arm Race & more.

ACCUMULATE VIP POINTS
Collect rewards for playing, including larger armies, Commander upgrades, exclusive events and much more.

Conquer the world with high-tech weapons, powerful Commanders and vicious specialists. Level up and explore to gain the upper hand, and crush the opposition.

Download War of Nations and claim your territory today!

comments: I was having so much fun with this app today after the updated it on my S3 Galaxy tablet! Seriously!! This is dope! I can't wait to level up my grade from 3 & move forward to grade 5! When I watched the ATIS video tutorial,  I was blown away! It seems that "Expert Server" is becoming much more awesome with their new feature added in the server!! I really can't wait to get there! This is awesome update FDS!  Great job!  Keep it up! 😊😎👍👍👌👌🙌🙌

This is truly a step up over your average plane simulation games. With Global release and many changes that have taken place it truly is the best out there.  My only gripe is that there is not enough focus on African Airlines. The new update has totally been focused on American and European Airlines. Most African airlines already have aircraft listed in Infinite Flight but yet aren't added. Sad really, hence the 4 stars

Its good to hear that ur asking for our feedback. First of all let me tell that u guys are doing a superb job...keep it up and lots of love to u all who developed this simulator. One request to the admins that atleast reply to what we are asking, not exactly at the same time but take ur time and reply.. previously i had asked about adding liveries to 777 300 er model no one replied or even acknowledged that ur reply has been received. I hope to get a reply here atleast.  I would like to know when u will add A350 and more liveries in 777-300er model ( would love to see air india, jet airways, china southern, china eastern, jal, ana, korean air, alitalia).. please add this liveries.. it will be awesome

If you love flight or you're a total aviation geek like myself. Infinite Flight is the app for you. Take a chance and fly anywhere around the world with dozen of aircraft for your choosing. You won't regret it. What are you waiting for ? Stop reading this and install 😁

Played this game since the beginning, one of the biggest updates has only been made to those who have to pay an extortionate amount.  Feel robbed really and the fact I can't play the game offline, seriously? ffs what a waste.

Well this is a bit atrocious. I feel entirely missold, was shown this app with the ability to fly pretty much from and to anywhere on the planet. I even had it on a previous phone and did such. Now I buy it and oh guess what? It was updated so one can't fly from one city to another, let alone another country. I mean it's pretty pointless at this point, don't think I can justify the additional £75 (per year) to enable me to actually use this and salvage some fun out of it -_-   Tl;Dr? I almost want my £5 back bc it was used for about 5 minutes - may as well build paper planes as they go further.
description: Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices, whether you are a curious novice or a decorated pilot. Explore high definition scenery in regions from around the world with our diverse inventory of detailed aircraft, tailoring each flight by choosing your time of day, weather conditions, and aircraft weight configuration. Features:• Dozens of aircraft in a diverse fleet of airliners, general aviation and military aircraft (free and paid add-ons)• Multiple regions featuring high definition satellite imagery, accurate topography and all major airports with precise runway and taxiway layouts• Customizable time of day and weather conditions (real time or custom)• Realistic atmospherics with the sun, moon, and stars• Autopilot (supports control of all flight parameters, NAV mode to follow your flight plan, and auto land on select aircraft)• Easy-to-use flight planning system with accurate fixes and Navigational Aids• Engine startup and shutdown• Instrument Landing System (ILS)• Advanced replay system• Weight and balance configurationSubscribe to Infinite Flight Pro for an all-access experience which allows you to fly anywhere in the world with live weather and our entire fleet of aircraft. Join thousands of other pilots and air traffic controllers for the most engaging online flight simulator available today! Infinite Flight Pro subscription benefits:• Join thousands of other pilots for a global multiplayer experience• Fly the world with millions of square miles of high definition scenery with access to over 25,000 airports (no region lock-in)• Enjoy all available aircraft • Act as an Air Traffic Controller• Fly through live weather and winds aloft • Subscription Options: 1 Month, 6 Months, and 12 Months• Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase• Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off before the end of the current period• Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Infinite Flight Play Store page after purchaseNote: Internet connection (WiFi or Cellular) is required to use Infinite Flight.Privacy Policy and Terms of Service:https://goo.gl/zBteBg
descriptionHTML:
Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices, whether you are a curious novice or a decorated pilot. Explore high definition scenery in regions from around the world with our diverse inventory of detailed aircraft, tailoring each flight by choosing your time of day, weather conditions, and aircraft weight configuration.

Features:

• Dozens of aircraft in a diverse fleet of airliners, general aviation and military aircraft (free and paid add-ons)
• Multiple regions featuring high definition satellite imagery, accurate topography and all major airports with precise runway and taxiway layouts
• Customizable time of day and weather conditions (real time or custom)
• Realistic atmospherics with the sun, moon, and stars
• Autopilot (supports control of all flight parameters, NAV mode to follow your flight plan, and auto land on select aircraft)
• Easy-to-use flight planning system with accurate fixes and Navigational Aids
• Engine startup and shutdown
• Instrument Landing System (ILS)
• Advanced replay system
• Weight and balance configuration

Subscribe to Infinite Flight Pro for an all-access experience which allows you to fly anywhere in the world with live weather and our entire fleet of aircraft. Join thousands of other pilots and air traffic controllers for the most engaging online flight simulator available today!

Infinite Flight Pro subscription benefits:
• Join thousands of other pilots for a global multiplayer experience
• Fly the world with millions of square miles of high definition scenery with access to over 25,000 airports (no region lock-in)
• Enjoy all available aircraft
• Act as an Air Traffic Controller
• Fly through live weather and winds aloft

• Subscription Options: 1 Month, 6 Months, and 12 Months
• Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off before the end of the current period
• Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Infinite Flight Play Store page after purchase

Note:
Internet connection (WiFi or Cellular) is required to use Infinite Flight.

comments: With every patch they nerf useful pirate(resource) spawns.... I guess they REALLY want you to throw cash at the game to even have a chance of surviving.... I know it's a beta, but I'm fast losing patience. It's also laggy, buggy, and slows my phone down like no other app....

Players leaving this game since updates have put up resource costs. Slowly but surely turning into a p2w game. Game is also glitchy and support do nothing to help.  It could be a great game,  don't kill it before it leaves beta.

Seemed great then I realised that the 'beta' has been non progressive forever, the updates only include small pirate gathering and fleet adjustment,  never the main things like resource sharing and reinforcement which are the big things people actually want aswell as convenient random fleet losses that either you get no reports for or none of your ships are saved by the warp which is purely for that purpose.  Play by all means but don't expect to advance unless your pockets are deep.
Loving it so far. Not quite sure what's going on but it follows the basic premise of many games, it looks good and handles well.
I don't usually play these type games but I'm enjoying learning this one Controls are easy to use and it guides you through early stages of building colony enjoyable game
Brilliant game, my only complaint is it's a little hard to see the writing and ships on my phone,but that's all, thanks fo a  excellent  game

comments: I absolutely LOVE this game!! The stories of each character are amazing! I just wish they had more suitors. And I wish they made more games exactly like this but with a completely new story line and characters. Like, I love the voice animations and how long the chapters are and how long the story line of each person is. I also love how your character talks like a modern day girl when she's at the sengoku era. You don't have to pay to see more about each person either. It's amazing. I Love this app. Please make more!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

So, this is my third update. That's how much I love this game 😂. Thank you for giving us castle and closet space via game events. Very helpful. I don't have anymore lag issues. And I appreciate the diversity in storylines. No route is the same, unlike other Otome games. Also, the relationship development is fantastic - not too slow or fast. The main character actually talks like a real person and less like a "character". Art is beautiful, too. I just feel bad that I can't say much about the music or voice acting, as I usually have my phone on vibrate.

Idk what to say, but one thing for sure I really loveee this game!!!! Is so awesome, the chara omg so magnificent. I don't mind spending much money on this game hahaha it's so freaking beautiful!!! And I really love the MC she's so strong and cute, it's just like I want to have a route for MC too. But rn I'm waiting for KENSHIN UESUGI route, I hope it will come out soon. Damn, Cybird always make such a beautiful otome game. Thank you for making this game, it just made my life💗💗💗💗

I couldn't resist to do a newer version of the review, so here it is. I've been playing this game for nearly three months now, and that's saying something. First of all, the story is really engaging. The characters are really sweet, and I love how we don't need to spend money to enjoy it, unlike other otome games. Shout-out to the people who made Ieyasu's route a dream come true.

There are only a few routes out currently but they are wonderful all the same. The main character is funny and reacts realistically to situations! Not to mention the voice acting is impeccable like wow I don't speak a word of Japanese but everytime Nobunaga speaks I'm just nodding along. Also this game has an adorable animated series and it is the best

The most romantic and sweetest experience of falling in love game..  I feel like I'm truly falling in love with Masamune date.. Love his playful side, his sweetness,  fierce yet gentle  sometimes.. The only reason I CANNOT RATE 5 STAR is I cant read back the route chosen even though I have spent actual money..  Its like I'm purchasing the story,  but the fact is,  I'm not.. This is frustrating..  Atleast after having spending so much money,  we can keep the story to be read again afterwards..  Please reconsider this..  Thank you
description: You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan! After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）
descriptionHTML:
You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan!

After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?

Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!

■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!
Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)
Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)
Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)
Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)
Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)
Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)
Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)
Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)
Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)
Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)
Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)

■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!
With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!

■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!
Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.
Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!
Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.

■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!
In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!
Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!
Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!


*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）

comments: AWESOME!!! LOVE THE FACT IT'S ANIME! Also, if you haven't already done a spirited away or soul eater collaboration, I suggest you do it. Oh, and are people supposed to curse here? Because they curse a lot. Oh, and a Bleach collaboration would be nice if you haven't done that one either. THESE HATERS DO NOT UNDERSTAND THE AMAZING BEAUTY IN THIS GAME!!!

Since recently you have been doing Anime collabs, I was wondering if one of the next ones could be Voltron? I admire the work you put into the characters in the games style but also looking like the characters. ^.^

Really Ateam? So I have two monsters that require the awakening ninoyu to awaken. The small pack for me is 27,99$ and the big one 42,99$. Keep in mind I've never bought one before. Yet my friend only needs 24,99$ for the small one and 37,99$ for the big pack. Really?? Why??

the art style is nice and cute, it is a really fun game to play specially if your a hardcore gamer, and you can fully costumize your characters appearance which is one reason i really like this game, i recommend this game if you like grinding your character and other stuff, and for the story it is also good.
Started playing for the Fairy Tail event.  Already have Lucy and Zeref from just my first day playing, and level 40 character after just a few hours.  Warning, highly addicting.
Took me 45-50 mins to even make the character but just before I could play ,the game froze . It looked good but not that good if it freezes over and over again

descriptionHTML:
Journey to the world's most beautiful destinations and fish for real in paradise!

Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!
Know nothing about fishing? It's okay! You'll be able to catch the Blue Pointer with just a tap!
Download Ace Fishing now to travel all over the world and fish at the most famous fishing spots!

1. Fishing Made Easy
- Get hooked on fishing with simple, one-touch controls!
- Who says fishing is boring? Just 3 seconds is all it takes before heart-pounding action!
- Complete the tutorial and practice in the Practice Room to master the skills and even get rewards!

2. Jaw-dropping 3D Graphics
- Interact with catches so life-like they could fly off your screen!
- Perfectly recreated physics of fishing means you'll be able to feel the excitement of fishing at your fingertips!

3. It doesn't get any more real than this!
- Fishing rods customizable with fishing lines of varying length and tension strength!
- Hang in there- tire out the fish through epic struggles!
- Fish movements and characteristics captured with stunning realism!
- Complicated mechanisms made easy to bring the most realistic fishing experience to mobile gaming!

4. Travel the World
- From Hanauma Bay to the Amazon River, and China! No place is off-limits!
- Hundreds of exotic fish native to different areas! Venture through the entire map to catch them all!

5. Global Rankings
- Reel in the biggest fish and break records! Compete in fishing tournaments held by the hour and go head-to-head against users from around the globe!
- Prepare the lure for the target fish through Lure Crafting System to rank higher!
- Your records are automatically saved every time you fish, so you can aim to break them!

6. More to Enjoy!
- Equip Accessories on your rod for more power! Use the Pearl Powders to Power-up your Accessories!
- Utilize the special Fever Mode! Fever Mode will increase your stats to the MAX so you can catch the fish you've always dreamed of!

7. Shh! It's a Secret!
- A special League Ranking to show off your skills is coming soon!

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

* Language support: English, Deutsch, français, 한국어, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Português, Español, Русский, Bahasa Indonesia, Tiếng Việt, and ไทย!

description: THE CULT FIGHTING GAME IS BACK!Experience the adrenaline rush of classic KOF fights combined with the exciting & addictive gameplay of collectible card games! Choose from an expansive roster of classic characters straight out of the best SNK games, assemble the ultimate tag team and chain-up your fighters’ special move in battle to unleash devastating combos onto your challengers.==Key Features ==>>DECK BUILDING<<Unlock, recruit and collect fighters from a roster of 70+, including fan-favorite Terry Bogart, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui and many more. Select up to 6 fighters in your dream team, set them in formation, then get ready for a hell of a fight! 1, QTE COMBOSKusanagi Serpent, Maiden Masher, and Haoh Shoko Ken…unleash your fighters’ incredibly powerful attacks at a tap of your finger. But with KOF98’s unique QTE system, it takes the right timing and skills to chain up the perfect combo and KO your challengers!2, RPG PROGRESSIONTrain your fighters, upgrade their equipment and level them up to their maximum potential to unlock their most powerful passive and active abilities, and their deadliest attacks.3, CAMPAIGN & PVPFight your way through the 70+-level campaign that follows the classic storyline of the games, and a multitude of PVE challenge modes. Then take on players from all over the world in a variety PVP modes and tournaments, to eventually claim the real “King of Fighters” title! 4, AUTHENTIC KOF EXPERIENCE All the classic fighters, battle arenas, iconic special moves, sound effects and even the Japanese voices from the original game. descriptionHTML:
THE CULT FIGHTING GAME IS BACK!

Experience the adrenaline rush of classic KOF fights combined with the exciting & addictive gameplay of collectible card games! Choose from an expansive roster of classic characters straight out of the best SNK games, assemble the ultimate tag team and chain-up your fighters’ special move in battle to unleash devastating combos onto your challengers.

==Key Features ==

>>DECK BUILDING<<
Unlock, recruit and collect fighters from a roster of 70+, including fan-favorite Terry Bogart, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui and many more. Select up to 6 fighters in your dream team, set them in formation, then get ready for a hell of a fight!

1, QTE COMBOS
Kusanagi Serpent, Maiden Masher, and Haoh Shoko Ken…unleash your fighters’ incredibly powerful attacks at a tap of your finger. But with KOF98’s unique QTE system, it takes the right timing and skills to chain up the perfect combo and KO your challengers!

2, RPG PROGRESSION
Train your fighters, upgrade their equipment and level them up to their maximum potential to unlock their most powerful passive and active abilities, and their deadliest attacks.

3, CAMPAIGN & PVP
Fight your way through the 70+-level campaign that follows the classic storyline of the games, and a multitude of PVE challenge modes. Then take on players from all over the world in a variety PVP modes and tournaments, to eventually claim the real “King of Fighters” title!

4, AUTHENTIC KOF EXPERIENCE
All the classic fighters, battle arenas, iconic special moves, sound effects and even the Japanese voices from the original game. A must-play for the fans!

comments: Just started and it is quite full of ads. At least they let you end the ad after 5 to 8 seconds. I wish therr was a way to go back and do the tutorial again and I accidently pressed during the first one and missed how to land. Lots of trial and error on that one. Also would be nice to know how the scoring exactly works.

It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Fantastic concept and artwork and potentially amazing game ruined by a half arsed tutorial and lack of information, pure laziness.  The fun of the game turns to frustration as you get good distance and terrible scores, but why? You assume landings but the game gives you no information on correct technique. Also same for takeoff and mid air lift.   Come on devs its lazy and ruining a game with huge potential. Uninstalled...

By level 4 no matter what score i get the bots always get about 15 higher. 1 game i would get 130 and the bots would get 145. Then when i get 160 they still get 175 showing this is rigged. That makes it so annoying with a lack of help from the developers make it annoying otherwise would b 5 stars if these issues were fixed

The game has a great Idea to it, but it really needs so tweaking in the physics deparment of the game, on certain Stages I go further with a Bad Jump then a Excellent one, and the wind doesnt really play that much of an effect in the game. But overall great and fun game, amd very addictive.

This game is actually very good, I play a lot of mobile games as its normally all I have time for and this is challenging and fun, the career mode is good and also like the upgrades..  I will definitely be keeping this one on my phone for a while because it is a really cool game. If you don't like ads then click you back button to get rid of it from time wasting or spend the buck to lose them forever.. Well done on a cool game, make some more like it!!

Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Can you dig it?

Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure!

Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

comments: It's okay. The graphics are endearing. Controls and gameplay are smooth and easy to understand. A freemium game to be sure. It openly offers over-priced items like they are a great deal (they aren't). Most of it's purchase items are more expensive than other games. It has a gem subscription but for only 10 days, most simular games offer it for the full month for the same price, while offering more gems.

OMG THIS IS AWESOME PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY ARE MISSING THE GRAPHICS AND CONTROLS AND EVERYTHING ABOUT IT IS GREAT!!!!!! Except for the part when you raid somebody and the opponent's team always kills you before you kill them. ANYWAYS IT'S STILL THE BEST keep the updates coming IT IS SO FUN DESPITE NOBODY I KNOW EXCEPT FOR MY FAMILY EVEN KNOWS IT EXISTS GREATEST GAME EVEEEERRRRRR!!!

Multitude of heroes to make your team. Not stingy about giving the player stuff. Potential fun for all, as casual game. Has PvP elements. Energy bar system replenishes when level up and even progresses in size as you advance. Should not be an issue until you get farther in, random energy gains also occur on maps with a little luck. Short tutorial at game beginning is torture to endure but is over in under 5 min. Great free game!

Love the game so far. You could say I'm a try hard because I've only been playing the game for a month and a week and I'm already level 52. With 100% win rate and 83% defense rate  have one of the best teams in the game. And like I said before love it so far but for the next update. You'll should add friendly battles. Such as battling with your friends, clan mates, random players. Etc.

Pretty fun game but I had an issue happy pretty quickly into the game and I'm hoping devs see this and help out.  I bought ten common portals for the 100k gold, after opening the first one the game decided to crash and I am no longer able to redeem my 9 other chest. I change to 5 star if we can this resolved. Thanks

Hi, I don't know if it is a hack or what BUT even if my defenders WON then still it minus my POINTS and it shows that I LOST? Whereas the replay is different.
