comments: This is probably the best horse game I have found so far. The porportions and the way the horses move are very accurate. A lot of horses in games I have seen have disporortionate bodies and are, over all, very unattractive.  The art style is similar to Spirit. Which was a big head-turner for me.

Can't log back in to my old account which I spent money on. Can't get the game to log back into my Facebook and I'm on the same Google account. The game crashes. All the time. When are the problems going to be fixed. This is worse then my beta tester games. Very unhappy also don't expect Ubisoft to help u

I'm playing this game for almost two years, and never get bored. I uninstalled a lot of game's on this time except Horse Haven: World Adventures. At this moment I think we need a Grand Stable for fantasy land, and another land for exclusive horse's, they are so much now on the game. Thank you Ubisoft for this awesome game. ❤️

I would definitely recommend this game to horse lovers. However, it doesn't satisfy me and the quite some Dutch players since it has our neighbouring countries Germany and France but not our own. It feels as if our country is just being neglected. It would be great if someone could do something about this issue.

So i have a problem with the app.......... After we race we should get the pieces to unlock the horses  the amount depends on the which place u get cuz im mostly at my mums but i only have a ipad at my grans (its hers) kind regards Me and my family 😄😁🤗😂😉💙💙💙💙💙🐎🐎🐎 So... i try to activate the horse breeds for 10 diamonds i have 15.. It says i dont have enough FIX IT NOW 😠

It's a great game, I love that I get to interact with the horses and the graphics is good then only down fall is I can't earn money that much and you run out of it quick, and you can't make enough for crops or upgrading, since you have to upgrade alot to get food for the horses.
description: THE WORLD IS YOURS, MAKE IT THE PERFECT HORSE HAVEN! Create and manage a dream horse farm spanning multiple exotic sites all over the world. description: Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! ◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro! The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News ▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade ▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo ▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro ▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint ▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play ▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN ◈◈◈Features: ● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed) ● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management) ● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful) ● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?) ● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!) ● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved) ● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements ● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon) P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references! Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!◈◈◈Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

comments: Bad physics are bad. The trucks always roll. You have to grind the first stage over and over and over and over to upgrade your truck. Even after you unlock stage 2 you can't get any points from it because your truck is so bad. It makes this game frustrating rather than challenging. The only way to go faster is to upgrade truck.  Not a huge fan.

Great game for killing time.. Having an issue with sound though.. Sound is fine with no headphones or wired head phones but the moment I try to play with my wireless headphones the sound gets choppy and one second of sound take 5 seconds to play.. This needs to get fixed please

DO NOT import gt. All it does is reset your progress and give you 1 more upgrade slot. So stupid. I uninstalled after this. Disgusting to lose a couple days progress to false advertising such as this.
Great game, but one level seriously needs to be looked at. Snow: Mayhem Marathon 1 is nearly impossible to beat. It's 99 percent luck on that level. Fix that and I'll give the game 5 stars all day.
The game is great. Anyone else have problems with beating pro racers I with the apc in under 57 secs? Stuck on that one...

Developer forces you to watch ads which is excessive considering most people will choose to watch ads for free items. Plain greedy. Stop wasting my time with your ads on good games. Let the player choose to watch the ads for rewards.

comments: It's a fun game but pvp is a big part and can take a week building up an army just to have it crushed when you log on. Has caused me to not play for a day or two because of this but also what makes me come back it offers that challenge that is often lost in most games like this where is the fun of there is no risk. Not to many tedious tasks after about day 5 no longer logging in every 3 hours to start a build project or something.

Other people might think its a boring game, but this game really fits for someone who doesnt want to get stressed out in a game.. really love the concept. Been a player here for almost 6 years now.. tried other games but still going back to this game.

Should add a few features like: 1. Able to share your battle report with other players. 2. Cancel troops in training. 3.See incoming attack on Hamlets you're holding (Or add a lost art which helps to see it).
My most resource hungry app on the tablet. Need to buy too many stuff to be a top level player. Lately, more stuff to buy and twice as expensive. Don't recommend this game.
Complex empire builder, takes time to learn. Definitely a pay to win. Lots of people with alts and coin hacks. Still lots to do. It's fun, but not worthy of serious commitment.
Reviving soldiers for sapphires must be the most ridiculous idea of all. My handful of soldiers need 2000 of those that are already impossible to acquire. :(
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of fantasy and myth! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ delivers epic battles in one of the most challenging and popular MMO strategy games available. The empire of Stormfall has fallen, and rival warlords join the battle across the continent as an ancient evil rises once again. You have been chosen to defend and protect the lands of Darkshine, and lead your people and your army through these dark times and into the light. For the first time, this popular free strategy game has been brought to mobile as a standalone, epic, multiplayer adventure, featuring groundbreaking graphics and genre-defining gameplay. Attack enemies, forge alliances and gather resources as you defend your castle from constant enemy attacks whilst simultaneously building and expanding your empire. Carefully plan your strategy and join clans in order to defeat rival leagues in this ultimate MMORPG.    NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Stormfall: Rise of Balur™FEATURES✔ FREE TO PLAY✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Portuguese and Russian✔ Exceptional artwork, graphics and gameplay✔ Recruit giant armies, raid endless castles and defend your empire ✔ Exciting PVP battles – pit your armies against other players from around the world, master strategy, diplomacy and join forces with great League to defeat your rivals. ✔ Popular MMORPG free to play with thousands of clans to join.  ✔ Forge diplomatic and strategic alliances with millions of online players, from around the world, all in real time. ✔ Raid, attack and defend in order to defeat your enemies in ongoing battles and wars. ✔ Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day. ✔ Role playing game adventures and missions, deep level strategy NOTE! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ is a standalone mobile game and is completely independent from the web and social Stormfall servers.Please give us your feedback to help us make it even better!Support: https://plarium-mobile-support.zendesk.com/hc/categories/115000198969 Community: https://www.facebook.com/Stormfall-Rise-of-Balur-1491465477787736/Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.😒you either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.
description: Is-it Love? Drogo - Vampire is a otome in English interactive.Like for television series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.This love story (Romance game) is free to download. Story :"You have decided to move to Mystery Spell to follow the exciting and esoteric course of its unusual university. Engaged as an au pair for the Bartholy family, you are in charge of looking after little Lorie.Your hosts, Two rich and quite eccentric brothers, arouse the curiosity and fear of the inhabitants of the city who see them as evil ... description: The best block-building app for creative friends! Join our world and build your own multiplayer games or join the millions of funny games crafted by other players. Make a name for yourself and become one of the biggest stars on BlockStarPlanet.- DREAM up a unique BlockStar to represent the unique you!- CREATE awesome Worlds for you and your friends to play in!- EXPLORE millions of wonderful creations made by other players!- REMIX your own BlockStar and Worlds using parts shared by others!- HANG OUT, chat, play multiplayer games with your friends - and make new friends!BlockStarPlanet offers a unique way to share creativity between friends, even between countries. Don't be surprised if thousands of other players from all over the world suddenly use your creations - making you a star on top of that. On BlockStarPlanet you can create and share and mix your dreams with the funny, wacky, and wonderful dreams of thousands of other players.Welcome to BlockStarPlanet - Share your creativity!For parents:While playing on our secure servers, the children can chat safely with their friends in their own language, all of it monitored by our advanced chat filtering safeguards. The game is free to play, but we do offer VIP subscriptions for an enhanced experience and access to bonus features.
descriptionHTML:
The best block-building app for creative friends! Join our world and build your own multiplayer games or join the millions of funny games crafted by other players. Make a name for yourself and become one of the biggest stars on BlockStarPlanet.

- DREAM up a unique BlockStar to represent the unique you!

- CREATE awesome Worlds for you and your friends to play in!

- EXPLORE millions of wonderful creations made by other players!

- REMIX your own BlockStar and Worlds using parts shared by others!

- HANG OUT, chat, play multiplayer games with your friends - and make new friends!

BlockStarPlanet offers a unique way to share creativity between friends, even between countries. Don't be surprised if thousands of other players from all over the world suddenly use your creations - making you a star on top of that. On BlockStarPlanet you can create and share and mix your dreams with the funny, wacky, and wonderful dreams of thousands of other players.

Welcome to BlockStarPlanet - Share your creativity!

For parents:
While playing on our secure servers, the children can chat safely with their friends in their own language, all of it monitored by our advanced chat filtering safeguards. The game is free to play, but we do offer VIP subscriptions for an enhanced experience and access to bonus features.

recentChanges: MAJOR CHANGES IN 3.15:
TIME FOR A SWIM!
We have added WATER to the game! Add it to your World with the new Water-tool, raise or lower its level, and change its color! Happy swimming!

description: Enjoy one minute of explosive match-3 fun from PopCap Games! Detonate as many gems as you can, 60 action-packed seconds at a time, in the hit puzzle game played by over 125 million people worldwide. Match three or more and create cascades of awesome with Flame gems, Star gems, and Hypercubes. Use powerful Rare Gems and upgradable Boosts to compete against friends, or challenge other players and top the global leaderboards.DISCOVER EXPLOSIVE EXCITEMENTCollect special Boosts like Scrambler to scramble the board, or Detonator to blast all special gems, and add extra power and fun to each match. Then upgrade them up to 10 times for scores that reach the stratosphere! Use Boosts any time and without spending Coins. Boosts never expire, so you can focus on upgrading the ones that work for you. PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY WITH RARE GEMSAmazing and unique Rare Gems like Sunstone and Plume Blast provide big scores and even more excitement. Combine them with Boosts to achieve unbelievably high scores. Play your way when you create mighty combinations of glittering Rare Gems and three Boosts to develop your own personal approach. TOP THE LEADERBOARDSChallenge your friends to beat your best 60-second score or compete with players worldwide in local and global leaderboards. Track your performance with helpful tips on how to improve your game. And, compare your strategies with top players by looking at their Rare Gem and Boost combos. SPARKLING NEW CONTENTFeast your eyes on fresh visuals and enjoy remixed audio that has been overhauled to improve your experience. Play live events with players around the world and complete special tasks each week to earn exclusive rewards. Plus, get in the game faster than ever with a rebuilt user experience and simplified navigation."Important Consumer Information. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comVisit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiriesEA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates

I had been playing this game for almost 4-5 years already.  With my issues being resolved I would say I love this game so much.  Much recommended.  😘

What is the point for new players to start from 120 lvl? How this can be fun?But never mind, I never understood the games which do that. Sorry, but I didnt find this game interesting for me.

Wow, what do I think? I think this game is all hype took 4hrs plus change to download the game after installing it so to even play it was a joke, then when I finally was able, it froze on the log in screen and took me back out to my home page on my phone screen, only to then tell me the game had not been installed!!! Not very good I'm not happy, I will try again before uninstalling this game if I manage to get in the game, obviously the review will change get but until then it's 1 star ass I can not go any lower. I wonder if there will be transcended busters in the future. Or perhaps the current arch buster will be the 'warrior' type and there will 1 of each type for us to mount. Looking forward to the overlord release though!

Love the game been playing for over 2 1/2 years. Only one probably lately and that is my WB scores have been down substantially along with other users. I dont understand how going from a few archs' to having 6 and new gear makes my score down 14 trillion? Im bot the only one this is happening to so im a bit confused on what the problem is. Other than that great game play it everyday. Just dont like losing rewards on my wb% when it should be higher.

After massive update and huge changes, I have to change my rating from 2 to 5.Such a big improvement toward all player,either f2p or whales.Congrats Gamevil, hopefully the community will grow as we see now in this game itself.

comments: This game is quite good. The graphics are pretty nice for a kid's game, and I do appreciate how there are vents to win power up. That is a very nice update. It seems like Disney took the kids element a little more into consideration.  The later stages do get understandable harder. But after the 100th stage is almost impossible for kid's standerard, but I don't mind it since other games do the same thing.

The game WAS great..spin the wheel, watch an ad, get a gameplay reward.  Great. But OMG now there's an BETWEEN squares AND for  rewards??!!! After you refused to give me back lost features  & said "Disney had NO INTENTION of doing that in the future", I had to think whether to uninstall the game, or suck it up & gimp along. Think you guys made the decision for. Too bad, I really enjoyed the game. Thx for what USED TO BE fun.

This may not mean much to most. After suffering from a head injury, my memory was terrible. Level 250, memory coming back strong. I play daily on 2 devices. Just wish you could win gems, you have  to buy them except 22 in beginning. All in all 3-4 stars.

I love love love this game!  BUT....THE ONLY THING I HATE IS THAT YOU CANNOT SAVE YOUR PROGRESS...IVE HAD TO REINSTALL THIS GAME 3x's AND LOST ALL PROGRESS! Maybe if i wasn't on level 280 it wouldn't be an issue! You should have this as a feature by now! UGH! 😠😭

Impossible to save or synchronize progress! As mentioned in many other reviews, it is not possible to save game progress, even if you link to your Facebook account. App support website confirms this functionality is simply not supported. Absolutely unbelievable. Just unbelievable. Don't waste your time on this game - it really will be _wasted_ time.

This is a great game and you can have fun for hours. I'd rate it 5 stars if a few things were changed. First, you need to be able to sync on other devices, especially if connecting to Facebook. I have other games that sync, no reason why this game can't get with that technology. Just got a new phone, was at level 346, and now have to start over on new phone. Luckily old phone will still be used. Second, it's impossible to earn gems. There should be special events to earn gems. Yes, you can spin to win, but the odds aren't in your favor to earn them. Third, there should be more opportunities to earn helps. The event to pass 5 levels is extremely difficult and there aren't many other opportunities to earn helps. I'm not spending money on this game. Take tips from Farm Heroes! Overall, this is a fun game and the graphics are cute.
description: WINNER OF GOOGLE PLAY’S BEST OF 2015 APPS! From the creators of Frozen Free Fall and Where’s My Water?, Disney Interactive brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on the hit Disney•Pixar film, Inside Out!   Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her Emotions — Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. Join Riley's Emotions on a journey to match, sort and burst memory bubbles, as you travel through unique locations inspired by the film — Family Island, Dream Productions, Boy Band Island, Imagination Land, Train Yard, and more! Play this bubble shooter that twists the puzzle genre inside out! • SHOOT & MATCH memories• UNLOCK characters and play over 1000 levels• UNLEASH POWER-UPS – Create sunbursts with Joy, let the rain pour with Sadness, blaze a fiery path with Anger, repel matching memories with Disgust, and scatter orbs in frantic fun with Fear!• OVERCOME obstacles like Brain Freezes and jump ahead using boosters like Brain Storms! • CONNECT to Facebook to gift and receive free lives, and to see how you stack up against your friends!• IMMERSE yourself in the world of the film through stunning 3D animation and gameplay featuring voice actors from the film!Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests.  You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).   • In-app purchases that cost real money• The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content• Location-based services• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards• As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of CompaniesVisit the official Inside Out Thought Bubbles website – http://games.disney.com/inside-out-thought-bubbles-app	Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.comChildren’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com

descriptionHTML:
Ultimate Match-3 game in the jewel world with addictive and exciting adventures!

Jewels Legend (from LinkDesks Inc.) is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere! Be the Jewel Star and unlock all castles in this jewel saga game.

HOW TO PLAY
★ Match 3 or more jewels in a line to crush them.
★ Match 4 jewels to create special lightning jewels. Lightning jewels can make a blast to destroy all jewels in a row or column.
★ Match 5 jewels with T or L shape to create special jewels bomb. The jewels bomb can destroy all jewels around it.
★ Match 5 jewels in a line to create special color jewels. Color jewels can destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .
★ Match 6 jewels can create a more powerful lightning jewel.It can destroy all jewels in a row AND a column.
★ Combine 2 special jewels together to make different kinds of fantastic effects to help you pass the level.
★ Reach different level target to pass levels in your adventure.

JEWEL LEGEND MATCH 3 PUZZLE FEATURES
★ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
★ More than 550 addictive jewel quest levels - more added regularly.
★ More than 150 challenging castle levels.
★ 5 completely different best match 3 games types.
★ Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.
★ Daily free bonus in best jewel games.
★ Auto hint when you jewel quest but could not find one match.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
★ Connect to Facebook and play with friends!
★ See your friends on the map!
★ Synchronize the game on multiple devices and platforms!

EASY AND FUN PLAY
★ Easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!
★ Just swap & match with your single finger!

NO TIME LIMIT
★ Play at your own pace!

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
★ Games you can play offline.

Classic Match3 games in Google Play. It is simple and fun, but also quite challenging. Easy to play, difficult to master. All levels are designed attentively. Your mission is to win the Jewels Stars. Pass these match 3 jewel levels and try to get all jewel stars in each level to unlock castles.

This best Jewel match-3 game is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or jewel quest hints or lives will require payment.

Contact us for any problem: JewelLegend@linkdesks.com.

Match 3 Jewels and never stop!

comments: Played this on PC, and really enjoyed it for its simple, quirky playstyle. While it does trail off at the end when you've mastered everything, the entertainment value is still strong. Particularly like going back to this title every now and again for a no-pressure, casual simulation game. Surprisingly, Game Dev Tycoon is pretty smooth on mobile, so kudos to the devs!

Just gave this game 5 star everything. When this game first came out on PC I couldn't afford it, so I pirated it. Sorry Greenheart! Now I have the chance to purchase your game and I'm glad I have. I know I'm going to play this for hours on end. It is definitely the best indie game I've ever played. Looking forward to your next project Greenheart!!

Loving the game! Not sure where else to try to contact the devs, but I am having an issue. My auto save is from Year 15. I am currently in year 22, and so is my manual save. However, whenever I try to load my manual save, it only takes me back to the year 15 autosave. I know it's just a game but it's pretty upsetting to not be able to access that lost progress, so any tips or response would be awesome. Great game!

It's good. 80 hours on PC version. This has some extra bits. Just want to support Dev, but am looking forward to playing it more on phone. Haven't had a bug yet either. Controls are great, they really lended themselves to mobile!

Played for days on the PC version. This one is just like it, except in the palm of your hands. No micro transactions, coins, or loot boxes. One price for the full game. Amazing!  In Game Dev Tycoon, you make games and build a company to from your parents garage, to a fully fledged AAA Studio. The controls are awesome. Your first games will be tests to how and what gamers like. You'll develop games for real life hardware (with names changed for licensing issues). Eventually, when you get to late game, you can create your own console and compete with other companies, releasing exclusive titles of your own, and dominating the market share.   You'll easily lose if you're not careful with your finances, but the game is so addicting that you'll keep coming back to it. Like I did.

I don't ever rate games, but this one deserves it. Only been playing an hour and I love it. I'm already excited to start over and try things differently. Totally worth the money and I highly suggest this for any sim fans. Great time killer as well. Good job guys.
description: Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.Create games your wayYour success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.Grow your companyOnce you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.Features🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s✍ Design and create games💡 Gain new insights through game reports 👁 Research new technologies ⚙ Create custom game engines 🏢 Move into bigger offices 👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team 🔬 Unlock secret labs📈 Become a market leader💚 Gain worldwide fans🥇 Unlock achievementsThe full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.The mobile version introduces☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode📰 An updated storyline👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games📱 New UI optimized for phones and tabletsA game with 💚Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.

Create games your way
Your success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.

Grow your company
Once you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.

Features
🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s
✍ Design and create games
💡 Gain new insights through game reports
👁 Research new technologies
⚙ Create custom game engines
🏢 Move into bigger offices
👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team
🔬 Unlock secret labs
📈 Become a market leader
💚 Gain worldwide fans
🥇 Unlock achievements

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.

The mobile version introduces
☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode
📰 An updated storyline
👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games
📱 New UI optimized for phones and tablets

A game with 💚
Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!

comments: This game should be avoided. They don't care about what the players think and refuse to make improvements or adjustment players suggest. Progress is slow and even if you spend real money your odds of getting what you want is low.  Avoid starting at a costs. It is not worth your time.

It is impossible to have a good team without spending lots of money.  In order to have a good team you need 4 star level robots which even when you do get a chance to get one, you will end up with a duplicate which will be liquidated for just about nothing. Hence better players get better and lower level players stay at the bottom. Also players that spend alot tend to get better chances on draws that are supposed to be random. Wow that's a surprise

This game is a lot of fun. Great time killer. The only thing I think could be improve is the fact that you can't upgrade your bots with duplicates you get in the space bridge. And possibly better mechanics to see the bots you have walking around your base. Other than that. It's amazing.

Slow, VERY SLOW You have to wait for everything.  After each battle, the Autobots need 7 minutes to recover for the next battle, but I have enough fuel for battle.  And, as your robots get more stars, the more you have to wait.  So it is about 20 minutes per game for me. Slow  Then if you accidentally switch to another apps or shut the screen off for a second, you will have to wait for the game to reload for another 2 or 3 minutes.  slow  Graphics is beautiful, but story suck, and wait time is horrible

Updated. Games are supposed to be fun, if u play this game be prepared for a complete lack of respect for its user Base from the devs and a lack of fun events. Even those spending 1000s are bored  Don't start spending as the game is dying Don't expect good support from the game makers either who seem to be on a mission to put off it's older users to the point of stopping them playing the game. Ps dont expect many players as a deception. Pps #saveferal

First off, if you do not want duplicates, do _not_ spend any money on anything other than maybe another builder bot and don't waste any of your cyber coins on crystals until you get all of your builder bots.   So long as you don't care about getting dupes the game is fun. And you will get so very many many many dupes, often times the same bot in a row. Fortunately, the somewhat new cores help take away the pain of getting dupes.  Personally, I enjoy the strategic and alliance parts of this game a lot and the events are fun so long as you don't care about placement on the leaderboard. Having a good alliance helps a lot by the way. Don't be afraid to look around for ones that boot leaches.

A ruler would be very useful for projections over 24 hrs. But I am enjoying myself, even if my wife doesn't understand why I should wake up at 4 am to check my course.

A good improvement. My only beef is it cost money to change your boat colour. Be prepared to spend if you need to win. Find a few friends to race against and have fun without spending. Since last update keeps eating auto sail cards but only stays on for a few mimutes

Getting close to perfection, need to keep the update of wind to closer to ugrib actual, but very happy with true effect and updates, like the new features of wind display, much better for present and future course determination.  Please look to make driving dial a bit larger, and a bit less sensitive, and possibly a 1 degree up or down feature, like the arrows  but a +1 or minus 1, as feature on present dial is too sensitive and does not adjust so refined.  From a Canadian point of view, can you look to include some races like Vic-maui, Transpac or even more amazing and local to west coast of North America, races such as Swiftsure or Southern Straights... short but very technically sweet races that are very challenging.
Shame you can buy your way to the front of the fleet otherwise good fun.  So I have crossed the finish line 3 time but just keeps saying I have run aground ?? Hopeless

Is lots of fun and surprisingly addictive.  I do mostly just the Volvo Ocean Race.  Would be nice to have an option to overlay exclusion zones.  Don't need to be enforceable, but more fun for those trying to beat the actual fleet.
Great game, but I do get frustrated by it saying wrong sail, after I close the app, and after setting the sail properly.

description: Garnering Critical Acclaim from Around the World!Dark Summoner, a Dark Fantasy Social Game Gem!Downloaded over 9 million times worldwide!Overwhelming Quality Recognized Around the Globe![Game Introduction]Dark Summoner is set in a multidimensional world known as "Triaterra",where a war between rival factions has plunged everything into chaos...In the role of a Summoner, you must call forth Monsters and creatures from distant dimensions to join your army and fight for you in Missions and Events.Battle other players in the Arena and make friends in Clans, where you cooperate with your Clan comrades to fight your way to the No. 1 spot and the glory that comes with supremacy![Gorgeous Monster Illustrations!] Dark Summoner boasts Monster illustrations of outstanding quality by many famous Japanese and international artists! More than 5,000 Monsters available! Realistic, alluring, grotesque... A myriad of awesome Monsters to acquire![Command Great "Sentinels" in the Clan League!] Battle alongside your Clan mates against enemy Clans in the Clan League! Combine your Monsters with those of your Clan comrades to create giant "Sentinels". Utilize various Abilities you learn as you skill up and knock out your opponents' Sentinel!  Dominate the frequently held "Ranked Brawls" to acquire both handsome reward and glorious honor![Strategic Battles] Bolster your army with the Monsters of your choice and lead them into Battle! Combos, Skills, and equippable Items known as "Relica" are just some of the keys to victory! Find your own strategy and out-play your opponents![Frequently Held Events] Battle, Raid, Foraging, and many more exciting Events held frequently! Join Events for a chance to win exclusive Monsters and lots of Monster enhancement Items!************************************************************ This game will run on Android 2.2 and higher, but some display issues may arise on devices running other OS versions.* The game's initial load time may take a few minutes in areas with a weak network connection.In such cases, please wait for the load to complete and do not close the application.* A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for the optimal Dark Summoner experience.* The game may not run smoothly in certain conditions.This can sometimes be improved by restarting the application or rebooting your device.
descriptionHTML:
Garnering Critical Acclaim from Around the World!
Dark Summoner, a Dark Fantasy Social Game Gem!
Downloaded over 9 million times worldwide!
Overwhelming Quality Recognized Around the Globe!

[Game Introduction]

Dark Summoner is set in a multidimensional world known as "Triaterra",
where a war between rival factions has plunged everything into chaos...

In the role of a Summoner, you must call forth Monsters and creatures from distant dimensions to join your army and fight for you in Missions and Events.
Battle other players in the Arena and make friends in Clans, where you cooperate with your Clan comrades to fight your way to the No. 1 spot and the glory that comes with supremacy!

[Gorgeous Monster Illustrations!]
Dark Summoner boasts Monster illustrations of outstanding quality by many famous Japanese and international artists!
More than 5,000 Monsters available!
Realistic, alluring, grotesque... A myriad of awesome Monsters to acquire!

[Command Great "Sentinels" in the Clan League!]
Battle alongside your Clan mates against enemy Clans in the Clan League!
Combine your Monsters with those of your Clan comrades to create giant "Sentinels".
Utilize various Abilities you learn as you skill up and knock out your opponents' Sentinel!

Dominate the frequently held "Ranked Brawls" to acquire both handsome reward and glorious honor!

[Strategic Battles]
Bolster your army with the Monsters of your choice and lead them into Battle!
Combos, Skills, and equippable Items known as "Relica" are just some of the keys to victory!
Find your own strategy and out-play your opponents!

[Frequently Held Events]
Battle, Raid, Foraging, and many more exciting Events held frequently!
Join Events for a chance to win exclusive Monsters and lots of Monster enhancement Items!

***********************************************************

* This game will run on Android 2.2 and higher, but some display issues may arise on devices running other OS versions.

* The game's initial load time may take a few minutes in areas with a weak network connection.
In such cases, please wait for the load to complete and do not close the application.

* A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for the optimal Dark Summoner experience.

* The game may not run smoothly in certain conditions.
This can sometimes be improved by restarting the application or rebooting your device.

comments: Enjoyable mental break. Wish there were fewer ads or at least more variety of ads.  Response about getting no ads with any purchase. This actually isn't valid as I just looked at each option to buy and none give the option of no ads. Plus I've made purchases and still nothing. I just updated the app and received the option of no ads. I clicked it and paid to no avail. Email has already been sent about it.

I really love this game. I downloaded it for mindless stress relief in between classes and it has not disappointed. Some of the levels are really tricky, I think in an attempt to get you to buy more balls. But that's not too much of a complaint. I bought the full version and it's worth it to be add free.

Hi there! I love this game! Im on level1839 and my hubby says i have a problem bahaha. The only thing ive noticed is the levels seem to have stopped introducing challenges and are sometimes just not possible to beat without serious coin. But that doesn't mean I plan to stop anytime soon hahaha.
It's an ok bubble blaster game, it has a lot of pop up ads. When you beat one level and move to the next there is always a 15 sec video. If your not on WiFi this will drag at your data
While its addicting its quite easy. I've gotten 3 stars on every level and I've played over 200 levels already. Ive only had to replay a level that failed 3 or 4 times.

This was fun... Until level 100 when they take away the ability to switch colors of the ball you're shooting. It makes it too difficult. I'm missing clearing it by one ball each time so then I'm watching ad after ad to avoid restarting the level. It's really disappointing how much that one thing has made me abandon the game and uninstall.
description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop bubbles in the best shooter game! Unlock cool boosts & win coins!Power Pop Bubbles is an addictive, exciting, brain-training puzzle game with thousands of fun levels packed with awesome challenges, power-ups, and effects. Play for free today and join the bubble popping mania!  Shoot and burst all the colorful balls and solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up. Make combinations of 3 or more identically colored balls to pop the group and blast the bubbles away. Aim carefully to hit the target, strike and drop big groups of bubbles and clear the board. With cool new items and effects, powerful boosters and tons of puzzle levels, you just won’t put it down- Try it out today!COOL FEATURES Addictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Thousands of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, just tap on your bubble to change its color.Awesome features and effects.Classic and most addicting gameplay. Easy to learn and super fun to play.Test your matching skills in thousands of exciting levels.No wifi connection is needed so you can enjoy an unlimited bubble popping fun!  This amazing shooter game will test your strategy and planning skills in thousands of exciting puzzles and brain-teasers. Download now and play for hours! Get it now and enjoy this fun puzzle game designed to keep your brain sharp and active. TIP: Drop the big groups of bubbles first so you can clear a path. See which bubble color you are getting next so you can work out a strategy to pop your way to victory and remove all the bubbles from the board. You can restart any level without having to wait for lives, as they are unlimited! comments: Amazing game!! I have purchased 1 or 2 bikes already, I would even pay to get new bikes, but it is very expensive. Please consider lowering to prices or making better bikes more accessible. Ive been stuck on the same level for 5 weeks. I want to continue playing but im loosing intrest not being able to advance. Maybe you could trade your old bikes in to get something in return for a newer bike. Im sure you will never read this, but you do have something special here! Thanks

Very fun BMX pump game. Seen a few reviews say it's gets impossible after level 3 when it becomes pay to win. I don't agree I've just reached level 8 in a few hours. If you ride bikes off road and understand how to pump you'll love it

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

I loved this game for 3 days. Then it got to the point where I couldn't beat a level without upgrading my bike, but I couldn't upgrade my bike without spending real money. So disappointing. Don't waste your time if you don't want to spend real money!

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

It was fun for a while - until it becomes impossible to beat any opponents with your current bike. The difficulty spikes around level 7 and the process of buying a new bike or upgrading your existing one becomes very frustrating, as you can't win any races to earn any money.

comments: It's a fantastic game, nothing less than what I'd expected. The graphics were fantastic, the story engaging, the characters well developed. However, it was too difficult to earn the in game currency. Perhaps you could add in a video where the players are able to earn gems? Even if it's only once it twice a day, I'm sure it'll definitely help. All in all though, this was a great game as usual. Keep up the good work!

I've been obsessed with Sherlock Holmes since I was about 7. Every incarnation of him, be it the books, the TV show or even the anime has left me completely in awe of Sherlock.  So I'm sad to say that I feel this falls short. As it's own game, it's great. I love the story and the characters are well developed. However, I went into it with a certain idea of how Sherlock should act, and it's not what I got. I understand why though, and it's not too distracting from the game. With that being said, I thoroughly enjoyed myself. The puzzles were a fun mechanic (a little easy for my liking, but still enjoyable) and the art style is really pleasing. Overall, I do think it's a game worth downloading.

I really love it. Just like the other "shall we date" games you guys made. However, twice already did i not get my free SH points after doing the required action for it. Is there anything for that? Also if you guys are into the idea, you can do a free small amount of gems for watching an advertisement once every day or something? All the rest in the games you guys make is awesome and i love em all.

The best Shall We Date game by far.  The characters are funny,  especially Sherlock and I love the plots.  If you can make Sebastian,  Jack, Hercule,  Jeremy and even Lestrade's routes it would be SUPER appreciated.  Omg, I think Lestrade's route would be the funniest because ALL of them would rip and mock him.  😂  Update: I still think it's the best one.

I just have to say: I love that the MC is not the usual cheerful idiot that somehow makes every guy fawn over her even though she can barely string a sentence together. This MC is portrayed as witty and intellegent as well as beautiful.  All the guys are also intellegent and quirky.  The stories are well written AND well edited. I never have trouble figuring out the plot due to poor grammar or translations.

Great game, I think it's the best game shall we date had. Female lead is independent woman who doesn't make me wonder why everyone likes her. Guys are great as well, plus I absolutely the writing. It's probably the only game were I was bothered to play more than 3 routes
description: Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT) and get useful items! Don’t miss the starter SALE to get special avatar items for FREE.◆From the creators of Otome games for FREE with <32 million DLs> comes the newest competitor, Guard Me, Sherlock!◆◆WHAT’S AN OTOME GAME?You’re the heroine - Otome - in these simulation games, experiencing the sweetest moments with hot men. Just tap your way through more easily than reading a visual novel. These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable on your devices!◆ABOUT GUARD ME, SHERLOCK!“I didn’t realize this until you showed up, but when I sleep alone, my bed is EMPTY and COLD.”You visit the office of the world’s greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes, wanting to request him something unique. There, you meet charming men with quite a colorful personality, together with whom you’ll get involved in various incidents.Do you want Sherlock to be your bodyguard and live together with him and Watson in his office at 221B Baker Street? Or do you want to go on a trip with the mysterious millionaire Professor Moriarty and catch a thief? Can you escape the “elementary” crime? Experience thrills after thrills in modern London with classic characters transformed into irresistible hotties!The British geniuses will eventually fall in love with you and whisper words of love, kissing you. Choose the path of your romance story with them, and the ending you’ll reach will be a moving one!Solve the mystery of the case and love all in one story!◆YOUR HANSOME GUARDS:Sherlock Holmes - “Do YOU have feelings for John?”Undoubtedly, the world’s greatest detective with exceptional logic. He used to only be interested in strange cases until he met you, and he’ll notice he has feelings towards you unlike any he’s ever felt before. But his best friend John H Watson has the same feelings toward you too! Where will that love triangle lead you? John H Watson - “I promise that I’ll always strive to be someone who’s good enough for you, someone who deserves you. So...will you marry me?” The best friend of Sherlock and another genius. He’s smart, gentle, and perfect - what’s the reason behind him proposing to you on the very day you meet? descriptionHTML:
Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT) and get useful items! Don’t miss the starter SALE to get special avatar items for FREE.

◆From the creators of Otome games for FREE with <32 million DLs> comes the newest competitor, Guard Me, Sherlock!◆

◆WHAT’S AN OTOME GAME?
You’re the heroine - Otome - in these simulation games, experiencing the sweetest moments with hot men. Just tap your way through more easily than reading a visual novel. These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable on your devices!

◆ABOUT GUARD ME, SHERLOCK!
“I didn’t realize this until you showed up, but when I sleep alone, my bed is EMPTY and COLD.”
You visit the office of the world’s greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes, wanting to request him something unique. There, you meet charming men with quite a colorful personality, together with whom you’ll get involved in various incidents.
Do you want Sherlock to be your bodyguard and live together with him and Watson in his office at 221B Baker Street? Or do you want to go on a trip with the mysterious millionaire Professor Moriarty and catch a thief? Can you escape the “elementary” crime? Experience thrills after thrills in modern London with classic characters transformed into irresistible hotties!
The British geniuses will eventually fall in love with you and whisper words of love, kissing you. Choose the path of your romance story with them, and the ending you’ll reach will be a moving one!
Solve the mystery of the case and love all in one story!

◆YOUR HANSOME GUARDS:
Sherlock Holmes - “Do YOU have feelings for John?”
Undoubtedly, the world’s greatest detective with exceptional logic. He used to only be interested in strange cases until he met you, and he’ll notice he has feelings towards you unlike any he’s ever felt before. But his best friend John H Watson has the same feelings toward you too! Where will that love triangle lead you?

John H Watson - “I promise that I’ll always strive to be someone who’s good enough for you, someone who deserves you. So...will you marry me?”
The best friend of Sherlock and another genius. He’s smart, gentle, and perfect - what’s the reason behind him proposing to you on the very day you meet? And what will you do when Sherlock tells you that you’re the only one that he could open his traumatized heart to?

James Moriarty - “By the time this journey is over, your life will have changed COMPLETELY.”
The Napoleon of the backstreets of London, and the biggest rival of Sherlock Holmes. Coming from a noble family and the way of the law, he plans a stage aboard the gorgeous Reichenbach Express for you. He’s never the one to hide his affection for you...but at the same time holds a horrifying secret.

◆FEATURES:

comments: Its a fun game. Still feel forced in the beginning to buy because ofbhow challenging and tough it is. But I think thats what I like about it; challenge.  but its a great game. Probably my favourite TF game. Hope to have new levels come out soon. Maybe another 100 or so? ;)  Update: I recently had to nuy a new phone. I thought meh, and started over again, but then I thought about it and I cant seem to find a way to recover my previous progression. It shows it in achievements but can not actually srart where I finished. Is there a way to do so? Thanks for the help.

Pretty fun. Some levels are very hard and it is no so obvious how to win. VERY different than 1 and 2 where there was a clear logical way to win. Tournament level: I like the idea but some levels are sooooo hard I have no clue how to beat it! Overall fun and challenging!

Freemium Alert!! The game itself is great. Until you get to around level 5 on the upgrades. Instead of coins, you start having to pay with crystals. This is where you have to start paying with real money to get crystals, to then get any further. Disappointing that you can't complete this with paying to win. Now feels like a waste of time.

I got to the point where I couldn't move forward anymore without upgrades. I can do the tournaments to get items for upgrades but the tournaments were the same every week. Then BAM! They changed up the tournament for me and made it more challenging.  I love this game!

I played this before a few years ago, have reinstalled and now it looks different but the same style.  However there are now now skull heads that instantly destroy your towers and you cant seem to avoid that.  The towers get knocked back for energy quicker than before as well.  The skull heads are the killer though as makes it impossible to win.

Is a typical tower defense game... Bit. easier to learn and has it's own unique system for tower leveling... plus watch videos to earn points for the game got stuck and could not beat any of levels up for me top play.. restarted

comments: I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.

Not bad. Sometimes freezes a little during game play but usually resolved itself. The wind is usually fair for each player's turn so that's good. Overall a good little time waster game. The only thing I would suggest is to make it a little easier/more often that gold bricks get collected. I've played for over a month now and got about 8 since starting.

Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]

comments: It's easy, enjoyable and EVERYONE from my 73yr old mum to a young adult (due to the images and content of storyline. .not suitable for kids) can play and EVERYONE can progress no matter how agile they are with their fingers or brain. LOVE IT!!! PLAY IT EVERY DAY WITHOUT FAIL😊

But unless you're willing to pay you have to wait for quite a while to get to play again. All of the Criminal Case games are the same way. Never been so blown away by a game insisting on paying money like this before. Very disappointed!

The creators aren't listening to the players and you may want to seriously consider before investing in this game.

comments: This game is so much fun. Enjoyable, challenging and addicting. However the only problem with the game is the fact that in order to play the levels, you have to collect enough tokens to unlock them. Now this is fine, if there is something else to do in the game. But there isn't. You have to wait real time in order to play anything of the game. And there is no option to watch a video to gain 10 tokens. It straight up only allows you to buy tokens with actual currency. Micro transactions can be used as long as there is a way to play the game without them. But apart from that minor flaw. I cannot recommend the game enough as it's a challenging blast. Just a shame about the tokens.

A fun game overall, but there are way too many ads. You can remove ads with a micro-transaction of buying tokens or coins, but I refuse to do that as I have more coins than I need as it is. As others have noted, it would be nice if your time-replenished tokens count was more than 10, as many puzzles cost more than 10 tokens to play. You can spend coins to replay a level and get more tokens, and there is a "super-hard" level in the main puzzle that is actually pretty easy and awards 3 tokens.

Brilliant game and the only one I have found that doesn't auto fill the 'x' as you play. Perfect. However, as you progress the chance to get tokens reduces as the cost of each level goes up which means it takes days to get enough from daily bonus to play one level.  Pay wall doesn't pay out so waste of time. Very disappointing.

The game is truly fun. Can't play very long because the tokens don't regenerate fast enough. I was winning tokens on some levels but since I purchased some tokens I haven't won a single one. Now that the tokens I paid for are gone I'm still not winning tokens (only coins, but it requires tokens to open the levels) so it's back to not being able to play very long

This game was great untill it became unplayable. Every level or square on the puzzle needs to be unlocked with tokens. As you go through the game all levels start costing more and more tokens. At the start around 4 tokens per lv now after 234 puzzles 16 tokens. That is total b.s. so at best I can play a single game a day. So only play if your not planning on finishing or playing them a lot of money.

The cells are too small to click on without accidently pressing the surrounding squares. Also, on the Galaxt S8 with the curved screen, the edge of the playing grid goes too far over the side of the phone, making it impossible to click on any of the cells in the last column.
description: Solve the puzzle to paint the picture! Now with over 1,100 fantastic Picture Cross puzzles. MASSIVE NEW UPDATE: Play 200 brand new puzzles in the 'Pet Store' and 'Restaurant' locations, and enjoy the new artwork and hidden scenes! PICTURE CROSS (also known as 'PICROSS', 'Nonograms', 'Hanjie' and 'Griddlers') is the classic picture logic puzzle enjoyed by millions worldwide. Here you'll find an epic collection of hundreds of brain-stretching Picture Cross puzzles ranging from Easy to Expert difficulty. Each puzzle you complete reveals another square of a detailed-packed Hidden Scene. Download free and start your Picture Cross adventure! HOW TO PLAY Use the number clues at the edge of the grid to determine which squares to fill in, and gradually reveal the hidden picture. We've included a quick and easy tutorial to get you started. SUPPORT Please select the HELP option from the Options menu (the gear icon in the top right corner of the game screen) if you require assistance. If you still have questions about the game or require assistance, please email: community@appynation.com World's Biggest Picture Cross is free to play, but contains optional paid items to unlock content more quickly.

description: Ordsjarme er et av de mest engasjerende ordspillene, med flott grafikk og interaksjonsdesign. Den beste måten å slå ihjel tid på, lett å spille, gir god hjernetrim og lærer deg flere nye ord. Ta en pause fra arbeidet og frisk opp hjernen med Ordsjarme! Du vil elske det! Nytt spill for lek med ordGanske enkelt sveip bokstaver for å lage ord, enkelt å lære og gøy å spille. Du kan blande bokstavene for å endre rekkefølgen. Jo flere ord du finner, jo flere mynter vil du tjene. Disse kan du bruke på senere nivåer for å få et hint når du står fast. 2000+ nivåer å spilleMer enn 2000 nivåer med stigende vanskelighetsgrad. Du vil se at det er utfordrende, men likevel interessant nok til å ville fortsette. Vi oppdaterer nivåene fra tid til annen for å gi deg løpende overraskelser. Vellaget grensesnitt med flott grafikkVårt grensesnitt er intuitivt og lett å fatte. Vi tilbyr mange bokstavtyper og bakgrunner å velge mellom slik at du aldri går trøtt. De vil jevnlig bli oppdatert slik at du alltid har noe å se frem til. Beste måten å slappe av med hjernetrimOrdsjarme trimmer hjernen og bedrer hukommelsen når du må gjøre ditt beste for å finne mange ord med gitte bokstaver. Av og til er svaret innlysende, men du kommer likevel ikke på ordet og nettopp det er noe av det som gjør spillet mest interessant.  Egenskaper•  Super grafikk og flott grensesnitt.•  Nytt spill for lek med ord: Bare koble bokstavene for å lage ord.•  2000+ nivåer for å spille med økende utfordringer.•  10+ flotte tema å velge fra.•  Daglige utfordringer gir bonus og mer moro.•  Finn så mange ord du kan og få mer bonus for ekstra ord.•  Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene•  Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder•  Du kan spille hvor som helst og når som helst med eller uten nettverk.•  Helt gratis for alle.•  Også perfekt som staveøvelser for barn. descriptionHTML:
Ordsjarme er et av de mest engasjerende ordspillene, med flott grafikk og interaksjonsdesign. Den beste måten å slå ihjel tid på, lett å spille, gir god hjernetrim og lærer deg flere nye ord. Ta en pause fra arbeidet og frisk opp hjernen med Ordsjarme! Du vil elske det!

Nytt spill for lek med ord
Ganske enkelt sveip bokstaver for å lage ord, enkelt å lære og gøy å spille. Du kan blande bokstavene for å endre rekkefølgen. Jo flere ord du finner, jo flere mynter vil du tjene. Disse kan du bruke på senere nivåer for å få et hint når du står fast.

2000+ nivåer å spille
Mer enn 2000 nivåer med stigende vanskelighetsgrad. Du vil se at det er utfordrende, men likevel interessant nok til å ville fortsette. Vi oppdaterer nivåene fra tid til annen for å gi deg løpende overraskelser.

Vellaget grensesnitt med flott grafikk
Vårt grensesnitt er intuitivt og lett å fatte. Vi tilbyr mange bokstavtyper og bakgrunner å velge mellom slik at du aldri går trøtt. De vil jevnlig bli oppdatert slik at du alltid har noe å se frem til.

Beste måten å slappe av med hjernetrim
Ordsjarme trimmer hjernen og bedrer hukommelsen når du må gjøre ditt beste for å finne mange ord med gitte bokstaver. Av og til er svaret innlysende, men du kommer likevel ikke på ordet og nettopp det er noe av det som gjør spillet mest interessant.


Egenskaper
• Super grafikk og flott grensesnitt.
• Nytt spill for lek med ord: Bare koble bokstavene for å lage ord.
• 2000+ nivåer for å spille med økende utfordringer.
• 10+ flotte tema å velge fra.
• Daglige utfordringer gir bonus og mer moro.
• Finn så mange ord du kan og få mer bonus for ekstra ord.
• Trykk på "Omstokk"-knappen for å endre rekkefølgen til bokstavene
• Trykk på "Hint"-knappen for å få ledetråder
• Du kan spille hvor som helst og når som helst med eller uten nettverk.
• Helt gratis for alle.
• Også perfekt som staveøvelser for barn.


Kontakt
Ta gjerne kontakt, og tilbakemeldinger til support@wordgame.freshdesk.com ønskes velkommen.

Takk for støtte og kjærlighet til Ordsjarme.

description: Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower• Breed pigs and sell them for profit• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth
descriptionHTML:
Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!

You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.

With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!

Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:

• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers
• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower
• Breed pigs and sell them for profit
• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool
• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood
• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice
• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment
• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber
• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth

comments: With daily events and online 3v3 matches; not to mention the addicitve meat farm and egg hatching. It's another GREAT game for the digimon fans, both new and old, to enjoy!   On a side note: I do wish they would add abit more to/continue the "story mode" but add abit of a cpu challenge to it.

I love this game, I've been on almost everyday. It looks great, there are many Digivolution paths to take, and battling is a ton of fun. My only real complaint is the chat.. my friend and I use a private chat to talk all the time while waiting for stamina to recharge, but it's pretty buggy, censoring a lot of really common, non offensive words like anything with an "ho" or "is", and for some reason the word "ready" is censored too.. if this could be fixed, it would be great.

It's a good game, really easy to play and yoy get the hang off it but one of my biggest complaint is the grind! The whole game is about grinding to get good digimon but the drop rates are so freaking low! The game would be more enjoyable if the rates were higher. I don't want to be spending so much time for me to save up stamina just for me to use it in seconds and get nothing. Hopefully they change it if not then this game is probably going to be forgotten soon

Great works. As a big fan im really looking forward if Bandai can also bring back the classic old school dot digivice game into modern one. Not mmorpg.. But just that classic nostalgic dot nostalgic game. I really like digimon unlimited that a fan made before where we raise one digimon in many ways. Too bad its not bandai work. I definitely play if u make one

The games is really fun and i love how the systems work. There are some issues however, for example WAY WAY WAY too grindy. Thats the biggest because during events you have to commit your life to the game to progress your gamestate. Additionally if you use stones in someone else's hosted co-op game they're gone despite it not being your fault and with the tiny amount of stones you get after 3 10 captures it adds up. Needs reworks but is good over all.

Most people will say that it is kinda hard to get to mega. And I think they got a point but well in my own oppinion, this game comes with its own strength and weakness. I manage to get my rosemon and wargreymon and now I'm working on my taomon. My point is. This game is good overall but it can be better if there are feature that we can do to enhance our interaction with other player. A clan or guild or something like that. Keep ap the good work and I'm looking forward to the next update.

comments: So far very interesting and entertaining. Not sure if it will require having to spend money when levels get harder. So far I've downloaded and uninstalled seven match three games because of that issue. If it requires spending money I don't have in order to go further into the game, it too will be uninstalled and I will lower the star rating.

This game is highly addictive, fun game to play!  I was on level 302 when I was cleaning out some old games and accidentally deleted Jewels Temple Quest!  To say the least I was very upset,  but I'm back on board, know what to do and am whipping through the levels!  I LOVE THIS GAME!
Lost game progress and adds back after installing on new phone despite paying for removal.   Customer support email doesn't work. Still no reply here on Google Play..how does buyer protect work?

Its a good simple game thats not overly involved.  But there seems to be no reason to keep score nor is there any real reason for the stars you get for each level. You can only buy hammers with gold which you only get TEN pieces per level no matter WHAT you score OR how many stars you get. And theres a lot of ads. Every time you you play a level.
I love playing this game and many others. This game is easy but challenging. I do not like real hard games. I am 69 yrs.old and not as quick as I used to be. This game is good for me. Thanks.

Adorable match 3. Game play seems fine. Advancing levels without glitches so far. Very addictive, so will submit a better review after some time to play. Don't like the review prompt so early in the game. Not sure yet.
